name: gss-registration-dashboard
overview: A Tableau Dashboard created against Banner, showing Student Counts, Registration Credit Hours, Section Capacity/Seats Remaining, Program Distribution, and Instructor Assignment.

acf.overview: A Tableau Dashboard created against Banner, showing Student Counts, Registration Credit Hours, Section Capacity/Seats Remaining, Program Distribution, and Instructor Assignment.

sql.sql_description: Returns Registration Information at the Student Section Level
sql.sql_code:
with
  term_seq as(
    select 
      stvterm_code as term_seq_code,
      stvterm_desc as term_seq_desc,
      stvterm_start_date as term_seq_start_date,
      stvterm_end_date as term_seq_end_date,
      stvterm_acyr_code as term_seq_acyr_code,
      stvterm_fa_proc_yr as term_seq_fa_proc_yr,
      stvterm_fa_period as term_seq_fa_period,
      stvterm_fa_end_period as term_seq_fa_end_period,
      case 
        when sysdate between stvterm_start_date and stvterm_end_date then 'Y' 
        else 'N' 
      end as term_seq_cur_term_ind,
      row_number() over(order by stvterm_code) term_seq_no
    from
      stvterm),
  term as(
    select
      tsm.term_seq_code as term_code,
      tsm.term_seq_desc as term_desc,
      tsm.term_seq_start_date as term_start_date,
      tsm.term_seq_end_date as term_end_date,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_fa_proc_year,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_period as term_fa_period,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_fa_end_period,
      case
        when sysdate between tsp.term_seq_end_date and tsm.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsm.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_cur_term_ind,
      case
        when sysdate between tsm.term_seq_end_date and tsn.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsn.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_prev_term_ind,
      case
        when sysdate between tspp.term_seq_end_date and tsp.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsp.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_next_term_ind,
      tsm.term_seq_no as term_seq_no,
      tsn.term_seq_code as term_next_term_code,
      tsn.term_seq_desc as term_next_desc,
      tsn.term_seq_start_date as term_next_start_date,
      tsn.term_seq_end_date as term_next_end_date,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_next_fa_proc_year,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_period as term_next_fa_period,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_next_fa_end_period,
      tsp.term_seq_code as term_prev_code,
      tsp.term_seq_desc as term_prev_desc,
      tsp.term_seq_start_date as term_prev_start_date,
      tsp.term_seq_end_date as term_prev_end_date,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_prev_fa_proc_year,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_period as term_prev_fa_period,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_prev_fa_end_period
    from
      term_seq tsm
      left outer join term_seq tsn 
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tsn.term_seq_no - 1
      left outer join term_seq tsp
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tsp.term_seq_no + 1
      left outer join term_seq tspp
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tspp.term_seq_no + 2),
  maxcrse as(
    select
      scbcrse_subj_code as maxcrse_subj_code,
      scbcrse_crse_numb as maxcrse_crse_numb,
      scbcrse_coll_code as maxcrse_coll_code,
      scbcrse_dept_code as maxcrse_dept_code,
      scbcrse_title as maxcrse_title,
      scbcrse_credit_hr_low as maxcrse_credit_hr,
      row_number() over(partition by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb order by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term desc, scbcrse_csta_code) as maxcrse_rev_seq
    from
      scbcrse),
  stdn_joiner as(
    select
      sgbstdn_pidm stdn_joiner_pidm,
      sgbstdn_term_code_eff as stdn_joiner_term_code_eff,
      row_number() over(partition by sgbstdn_pidm order by sgbstdn_pidm,sgbstdn_term_code_eff) as stdn_joiner_seq,
      term_seq_no as stdn_joiner_term_seq_no
    from
      sgbstdn
      inner join term
        on sgbstdn_term_code_eff = term_code),
  stdn as(
    select
      sj1.stdn_joiner_pidm as stdn_pidm,
      sj1.stdn_joiner_term_code_eff as stdn_term_code_eff,
      sj1.stdn_joiner_term_seq_no as stdn_term_from_seq,
      nvl(sj2.stdn_joiner_term_seq_no -1,9999) as stdn_term_to_seq
    from
      stdn_joiner sj1
      left outer join stdn_joiner sj2
        on sj1.stdn_joiner_pidm = sj2.stdn_joiner_pidm
        and sj1.stdn_joiner_seq = sj2.stdn_joiner_seq - 1)

select
  term_code,
  term_desc,
  term_cur_term_ind,
  term_next_term_ind,
  term_start_date,
  term_end_date,
  spriden_last_name,
  spriden_first_name,
  spriden_id,
  sgbstdn_stst_code,
  stvstst_desc,
  sgbstdn_styp_code,
  stvstyp_desc,
  sgbstdn_coll_code_1,
  stucoll1.stvcoll_desc as stucoll_desc_1,
  sgbstdn_coll_code_2,
  stucoll2.stvcoll_desc as stucoll_desc_2,
  sgbstdn_admt_code,
  sgbstdn_admt_code_2,
  sgbstdn_program_1,
  pr1.smrprle_program_desc as program_desc_1,
  sgbstdn_program_2,
  pr2.smrprle_program_desc as program_desc_2,
  sgbstdn_camp_code,
  stucamp1.stvcamp_desc as stucamp_desc_1,
  sgbstdn_camp_code_2,
  stucamp2.stvcamp_desc as stucamp_desc_2,
  sgbstdn_levl_code,
  sgbstdn_levl_code_2,
  sgbstdn_rate_code,
  sfrstcr_rsts_code,
  sfrstcr_rsts_date,
  stvrsts_desc,
  stvrsts_voice_type,
  sfrstcr_levl_code,
  sfrstcr_camp_code,
  sfrstcr_credit_hr,
  sfrstcr_add_date,
  ssbsect_crn,
  ssbsect_ptrm_code,
  stvptrm_desc,
  ssbsect_subj_code,
  stvsubj_desc,
  ssbsect_crse_numb,
  ssbsect_seq_numb,
  ssbsect_camp_code,
  sectcamp.stvcamp_desc,
  maxcrse_title,
  maxcrse_coll_code,
  maxcrse_credit_hr,
  crsecoll.stvcoll_desc,
  maxcrse_dept_code,
  stvdept_desc
from
  term
  inner join sfrstcr
    on term_code = sfrstcr_term_code
  left outer join ssbsect
    on term_code = ssbsect_term_code
    and ssbsect_crn = sfrstcr_crn
  left outer join spriden
    on sfrstcr_pidm = spriden_pidm
    and spriden_change_ind is null
  left outer join stdn
    on sfrstcr_pidm = stdn_pidm
    and term_seq_no between stdn_term_from_seq and stdn_term_to_seq
  left outer join sgbstdn
    on sfrstcr_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
    and stdn_term_code_eff = sgbstdn_term_code_eff
  left outer join maxcrse
    on ssbsect_subj_code = maxcrse_subj_code
    and ssbsect_crse_numb = maxcrse_crse_numb
    and maxcrse_rev_seq = 1
  left outer join stvptrm
    on ssbsect_ptrm_code = stvptrm_code
  left outer join stvsubj
    on ssbsect_subj_code = stvsubj_code
  left outer join stvcamp sectcamp
    on ssbsect_camp_code = sectcamp.stvcamp_code
  left outer join stvssts
    on ssbsect_ssts_code = stvssts_code
  left outer join stvcoll crsecoll
    on maxcrse_coll_code = crsecoll.stvcoll_code
  left outer join stvdept
    on maxcrse_dept_code = stvdept_code
  left outer join stvrsts
    on sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
  left outer join stvcamp stucamp1
    on sgbstdn_camp_code = stucamp1.stvcamp_code
  left outer join stvcamp stucamp2
    on sgbstdn_camp_code_2 = stucamp2.stvcamp_code
  left outer join stvcoll stucoll1
    on sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = stucoll1.stvcoll_code
  left outer join stvcoll stucoll2
    on sgbstdn_coll_code_2 = stucoll2.stvcoll_code
  left outer join stvstst
    on sgbstdn_stst_code = stvstst_code
  left outer join stvstyp
    on sgbstdn_styp_code = stvstyp_code
  left outer join smrprle pr1
    on sgbstdn_program_1 = pr1.smrprle_program
  left outer join smrprle pr2
    on sgbstdn_program_2 = pr2.smrprle_program
where
  term_cur_term_ind = 'Y' or term_next_term_ind = 'Y'

with
  term_seq as(
    select 
      stvterm_code as term_seq_code,
      stvterm_desc as term_seq_desc,
      stvterm_start_date as term_seq_start_date,
      stvterm_end_date as term_seq_end_date,
      stvterm_acyr_code as term_seq_acyr_code,
      stvterm_fa_proc_yr as term_seq_fa_proc_yr,
      stvterm_fa_period as term_seq_fa_period,
      stvterm_fa_end_period as term_seq_fa_end_period,
      case 
        when sysdate between stvterm_start_date and stvterm_end_date then 'Y' 
        else 'N' 
      end as term_seq_cur_term_ind,
      row_number() over(order by stvterm_code) term_seq_no
    from
      stvterm),
  term as(

      tsm.term_seq_start_date as term_start_date,
      tsm.term_seq_end_date as term_end_date,

      end as term_prev_term_ind,
      case
        when sysdate between tspp.term_seq_end_date and tsp.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'

      tsn.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_next_fa_end_period,
      tsp.term_seq_code as term_prev_code,
      tsp.term_seq_desc as term_prev_desc,
      tsp.term_seq_start_date as term_prev_start_date,
      tsp.term_seq_end_date as term_prev_end_date,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_prev_fa_proc_year,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_period as term_prev_fa_period,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_prev_fa_end_period
    from
      term_seq tsm
      left outer join term_seq tsn 
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tsn.term_seq_no - 1
      left outer join term_seq tsp
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tsp.term_seq_no + 1
      left outer join term_seq tspp
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tspp.term_seq_no + 2),
  maxcrse as(
    select
      scbcrse_subj_code as maxcrse_subj_code,
      scbcrse_crse_numb as maxcrse_crse_numb,
      scbcrse_coll_code as maxcrse_coll_code,
      scbcrse_dept_code as maxcrse_dept_code,
      scbcrse_title as maxcrse_title,
      row_number() over(partition by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb order by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term desc, scbcrse_csta_code) as maxcrse_rev_seq
    from
      scbcrse)
select
  term_code,
  term_desc,
  term_cur_term_ind,
  term_next_term_ind,
  term_start_date,
  term_end_date,
  ssbsect_crn,
  ssbsect_ptrm_code,
  stvptrm_desc,
  ssbsect_subj_code,
  stvsubj_desc,
  ssbsect_crse_numb,
  ssbsect_seq_numb,
  ssbsect_camp_code,
  stvcamp_desc,
  ssbsect_enrl,
  spriden_last_name,
  spriden_first_name,
  spriden_id,
  ssbsect_ssts_code,
  stvssts_desc,
  maxcrse_title,
  maxcrse_coll_code,
  stvcoll_desc,
  maxcrse_dept_code,
  stvdept_desc
from
  term
  inner join sirasgn
    on term_code = sirasgn_term_code
  left outer join ssbsect
    on sirasgn_term_code = ssbsect_term_code
    and sirasgn_crn = ssbsect_crn
  left outer join spriden
    on sirasgn_pidm = spriden_pidm
    and spriden_change_ind is null
  left outer join maxcrse
    on ssbsect_subj_code = maxcrse_subj_code
    and ssbsect_crse_numb = maxcrse_crse_numb
    and maxcrse_rev_seq = 1
  left outer join stvptrm
    on ssbsect_ptrm_code = stvptrm_code
  left outer join stvsubj
    on ssbsect_subj_code = stvsubj_code
  left outer join stvcamp
    on ssbsect_camp_code = stvcamp_code
  left outer join stvssts
    on ssbsect_ssts_code = stvssts_code
  left outer join stvcoll
    on maxcrse_coll_code = stvcoll_code
  left outer join stvdept
    on maxcrse_dept_code = stvdept_code
where
  term_cur_term_ind = 'Y' or term_next_term_ind = 'Y'

with

      stvterm_desc as term_seq_desc,
      stvterm_start_date as term_seq_start_date,
      stvterm_end_date as term_seq_end_date,
      stvterm_acyr_code as term_seq_acyr_code,
      stvterm_fa_proc_yr as term_seq_fa_proc_yr,
      stvterm_fa_period as term_seq_fa_period,
      stvterm_fa_end_period as term_seq_fa_end_period,
      case 
        when sysdate between stvterm_start_date and stvterm_end_date then 'Y' 
        else 'N' 
      end as term_seq_cur_term_ind,
      row_number() over(order by stvterm_code) term_seq_no
    from
      stvterm),
  term as(
    select
      tsm.term_seq_code as term_code,
      tsm.term_seq_desc as term_desc,
      tsm.term_seq_start_date as term_start_date,
      tsm.term_seq_end_date as term_end_date,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_fa_proc_year,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_period as term_fa_period,
      tsm.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_fa_end_period,
      case
        when sysdate between tsp.term_seq_end_date and tsm.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsm.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_cur_term_ind,
      case
        when sysdate between tsm.term_seq_end_date and tsn.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsn.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_prev_term_ind,
      case
        when sysdate between tspp.term_seq_end_date and tsp.term_seq_start_date then 'Y'
        else tsp.term_seq_cur_term_ind 
      end as term_next_term_ind,
      tsm.term_seq_no as term_seq_no,
      tsn.term_seq_code as term_next_term_code,
      tsn.term_seq_desc as term_next_desc,
      tsn.term_seq_start_date as term_next_start_date,
      tsn.term_seq_end_date as term_next_end_date,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_next_fa_proc_year,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_period as term_next_fa_period,
      tsn.term_seq_fa_end_period as term_next_fa_end_period,
      tsp.term_seq_code as term_prev_code,
      tsp.term_seq_desc as term_prev_desc,
      tsp.term_seq_start_date as term_prev_start_date,
      tsp.term_seq_end_date as term_prev_end_date,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_proc_yr as term_prev_fa_proc_year,
      tsp.term_seq_fa_period as term_prev_fa_period,

    from

      left outer join term_seq tspp
        on tsm.term_seq_no = tspp.term_seq_no + 2),
  maxcrse as(
    select

      row_number() over(partition by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb order by scbcrse_subj_code||scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term desc, scbcrse_csta_code) as maxcrse_rev_seq

name: extract-program-for-emergency-contact-system-everbridge

title.rendered: Extract Program for Emergency Contact System (EverBridge)

overview: The Extract Program for Emergency Contact System (EverBridge) provides the Senior Director of Communications News and Media Relations the ability to extract a file of all the members of the University to upload to an external application (EverBridge) from which urgent messages, school closings, severe weather alerts etc can be communicated to the University community seamlessly. The extract provides three file outputs.  One file gets uploaded into the application, the second is a Summary file that includes a count by College of ‘Compliant’ and ‘Missing’ Phone numbers and a third that lists names, FIDN, email address and incomplete, incorrect, invalid or missing phone numbers. The Director can further breakdown the population he/she is interested in communicating with into the following groups: “Faculty”, “Staff”, “Students”, Guests”, or “Others”.

acf.overview: The Extract Program for Emergency Contact System (EverBridge) provides the Senior Director of Communications News and Media Relations the ability to extract a file of all the members of the University to upload to an external application (EverBridge) from which urgent messages, school closings, severe weather alerts etc can be communicated to the University community seamlessly. The extract provides three file outputs.  One file gets uploaded into the application, the second is a Summary file that includes a count by College of ‘Compliant’ and ‘Missing’ Phone numbers and a third that lists names, FIDN, email address and incomplete, incorrect, invalid or missing phone numbers. The Director can further breakdown the population he/she is interested in communicating with into the following groups: “Faculty”, “Staff”, “Students”, Guests”, or “Others”.

sql.sql_code:
-SET &ECHO=ALL;
-SET &TERM = '';
-SET &TERM_CODE1 = '';
-SET &TERM_CODE2 = '';
SET ASNAMES = ON
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE TERMSQL FOR
-INCLUDE CUSTOMSQL/TERM_W_SGBSTDN_DATING.SQL
END
TABLE FILE TERMSQL
SUM
    SPRIDEN_ID
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
    SPRIDEN_MI
    STUDENT_EMAIL
    PERSONAL_EMAIL
    STUDENT_STATUS_CODE
    STUDENT_STATUS
    STUDENT_TYPE_CODE
    STVSTST_REG_IND
    COLLEGE_ADMIT_TERM
    STUDENT_PROGRAM
    STUDENT_COLLEGE_CODE
    STUDENT_COLLEGE_DESC
    STUDENT_LEVEL_CODE
    STUDENT_LEVEL_DESC
    STUDENT_DEGREE_CODE
    STUDENT_DEGREE_DESC
    STUDENT_MAJOR_CODE
    STUDENT_MAJOR_DESC
    STUDENT_MINOR_CODE
    STUDENT_MINOR_DESC
    STUDENT_CAMPUS_CODE
    STUDENT_CAMPUS_DESC
MAX.TERM_CODE
MAX.TERM_CUR_TERM_IND
MAX.TERM_NEXT_TERM_IND
MAX.TERM_PREV_TERM_IND
  BY SFRSTCR_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
-* BY TERM_CODE
WHERE STUDENT_COLLEGE_CODE NE 'XX';
WHERE STUDENT_STATUS_CODE EQ 'AS';
WHERE (TERM_CUR_TERM_IND EQ 'Y' OR TERM_PREV_TERM_IND EQ 'Y');
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
ON TABLE HOLD AS XSZVA FORMAT ALPHA
END
-RUN
DEFINE FILE XSZVA
  XTERM_CODE/A6 = EDIT(TERM_CODE,'999999');
END

TABLE FILE XSZVA
SUM
    MIN.XTERM_CODE AS 'TERM_CODE1'
 MAX.XTERM_CODE AS 'TERM_CODE2'
WHERE TERM_CUR_TERM_IND EQ 'Y';
  ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD FORMAT ALPHA
END
-RUN
-*?FF XHOLD
-*-EXIT
-READFILE XHOLD
TABLE FILE XSZVA
PRINT
    TERM_CODE
    SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
   COMPUTE STU_LNAME/A60 = SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME, 1, 60);
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
   COMPUTE STU_FNAME/A15 = SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME, 1, 15);
    SPRIDEN_MI
   COMPUTE STU_MNAME/A15 = SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_MI, 1, 15);
      COMPUTE STU_NAME/A100 = SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME, 1, 60) || ', ' |
                           SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME, 1, 15) || ' ' |
                              SUBSTRING(SPRIDEN_MI, 1, 15);
    STUDENT_EMAIL
    PERSONAL_EMAIL
    STUDENT_STATUS_CODE
    STUDENT_STATUS
    STUDENT_TYPE_CODE
    STVSTST_REG_IND
    COLLEGE_ADMIT_TERM
    STUDENT_PROGRAM
    STUDENT_COLLEGE_CODE AS 'COLL_CODE'
    STUDENT_COLLEGE_DESC AS 'COLL_DESC'
    STUDENT_LEVEL_CODE AS 'LEVL_CODE'
    STUDENT_LEVEL_DESC AS 'LEVL_DESC'
    STUDENT_DEGREE_CODE AS 'DEGC_CODE'
    STUDENT_DEGREE_DESC AS 'DEGC_CODE'
    STUDENT_MAJOR_CODE
    STUDENT_MAJOR_DESC
    STUDENT_MINOR_CODE
    STUDENT_MINOR_DESC
    STUDENT_CAMPUS_CODE AS 'CAMP_CODE'
    STUDENT_CAMPUS_DESC AS 'CAMP_DESC'
    TERM_CUR_TERM_IND
    TERM_NEXT_TERM_IND
    TERM_PREV_TERM_IND
-* BY TERM_CODE
  BY PIDM_KEY
 ON TABLE HOLD AS REGSTU
END
-RUN
-GOTO EOJX
-*-EXIT
-GETDORM
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_HOUSING_EVERBRIDGE.FEX

TABLE FILE HHOUSING
PRINT *
BY SLRRASG_BLDG_CODE NOPRINT
ON TABLE HOLD AS GOTDORM
END
-RUN

JOIN SLRRASG_BLDG_CODE IN GOTDORM TO STVBLDG_CODE IN STVBLDG AS JBLDG
-RUN
TABLE FILE GOTDORM
PRINT SLRRASG_PIDM AS 'DPIDM'
SLRRASG_TERM_CODE AS 'DTERM'
   SLRRASG_BEGIN_DATE
   SLRRASG_END_DATE
SLBBLDG_CAMP_CODE AS 'DCAMP'
SLRRASG_BLDG_CODE AS 'DBLDG_CODE'
STVBLDG_DESC AS 'DBLDG_NAME'
SLRRASG_ROOM_NUMBER/A10 AS 'DROOM'
SLBRDEF_PHONE_AREA/A03 AS 'DPHAREA'
SLBRDEF_PHONE_NUMBER/A07 AS 'DPHNUM'
SLBRDEF_KEY_NUMBER/A5 AS 'DKEYNUM'
BY SLRRASG_TERM_CODE NOPRINT
BY SLRRASG_PIDM NOPRINT
-*WHERE SLRRASG_PIDM EQ 810173;
ON TABLE HOLD AS DRMHLD
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-* get the dorm building name info. then take out ' and @ characters etc.
DEFINE FILE DRMHLD
BLDG_TRAN /A30 = CTRAN (30,DBLDG_NAME,39,115,'A30');
BLDG_TRAN /A30 = CTRAN (30,BLDG_TRAN,38,110,'A30');
DNME/A25 = EDIT( BLDG_TRAN,'9999999999999999999999999');
DM_NAME/A40 = (( EDIT (DBLDG_CODE,'99')) | ' - ' | DNME ) ;
DPHONE/A20 = IF DPHAREA NE ' ' OR '000' AND DPHNUM NE ' ' OR '0000000' THEN ( DPHAREA || DPHNUM ) ELSE ' ' ;
END

TABLE FILE DRMHLD
PRINT
DTERM DCAMP DBLDG_CODE DBLDG_NAME
DM_NAME DROOM DKEYNUM DPHONE
BY DTERM NOPRINT
BY DPIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS DRMINFO
END
-RUN
JOIN CLEAR *
JOIN LEFT_OUTER TERM_CODE AND PIDM_KEY IN REGSTU TO ALL DTERM AND DPIDM IN DRMINFO AS JDM
-RUN
TABLE FILE REGSTU
PRINT DTERM *
BY PIDM_KEY
ON TABLE HOLD AS CURDRM
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
END
-RUN
-EXIT
PRINT TERM_CODE FIDN STU_LNAME STU_FNAME STU_MNAME
COLL_CODE COLL_DESC CAMP_CODE CAMP_DESC
-*
DTERM DCAMP DBLDG_CODE DBLDG_NAME DM_NAME
DROOM DKEYNUM DPHONE
BY PIDM_KEY
ON TABLE HOLD AS CURDRM
END
-RUN
-EXIT
-EOJX

sql.sql_code:
-DEFAULTH &LAS_DEV='N';
-* this is not a template, therefore set LAS_DEV to "N".
-SET &LAS_DEV_SQL=IF &LAS_DEV.EVAL EQ 'N' THEN ' ' ELSE 'AND ROWNUM < 200';
-SET &LAS_DEV_HOLD=IF &LAS_DEV.EVAL EQ 'N' THEN ' ' ELSE 'APP HOLDMETA leapahead_developer_holds';

-********************* start your program with this:

APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-*******************************************************
-MRNOEDIT -INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*******************************************************


-*File emailblast.fex
-*As per Amanda Hickey, she is not using any of the activity
-*and school columns that were in Jeffrey's report. Removed all those columns
-*SET &ECHO=ALL;
-*08/01/2007 added columns to list the name separately
-*SET &ECHO='ALL';
-SET &FMT='EXL2K';
-DEFAULT &REPORT = 'LST';
SET ASNAMES = ON
SET XRETRIEVAL = ON

-SET &SQL_LINE = IF &REPORT EQ 'LST' THEN 'AND SPRIDEN_ID >= ' | '''' | 'A04000000' | '''' ELSE
- 'AND SPRIDEN_ID <' | ''''| 'A04000000' | '''';

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUTX0 FOR
SELECT
     SPRIDEN_PIDM,
     SPRIDEN_ID,
     (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
           FROM GOREMAL
          WHERE GOREMAL_PREFERRED_IND = 'Y'
            AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
            AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) PREFERRED_EMAIL,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
            FROM GOREMAL
           WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'PERS'
             AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
             AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) PERSONAL_EMAIL,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
            FROM GOREMAL
           WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'BUSI'
             AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
             AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) BUSINESS_EMAIL
-IF &REPORT EQ 'PRNT' GOTO PRNT_EXT;
FROM SPRIDEN, GOREMAL
WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
&LAS_DEV_SQL.EVAL
&SQL_LINE.EVAL
-GOTO END_SQL

-PRNT_EXT
FROM SPRIDEN, GOREMAL, APRCATG

WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM AND
      SPRIDEN_PIDM = APRCATG_PIDM AND
      APRCATG_DONR_CODE IN ('PRNT', 'PRNS')
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL

-END_SQL
;
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE SQLOUTX0
SUM
     PREFERRED_EMAIL
     PERSONAL_EMAIL
     BUSINESS_EMAIL
     SPRIDEN_ID
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
WHERE ((PREFERRED_EMAIL NE '') OR
       (PERSONAL_EMAIL NE '') OR
       (BUSINESS_EMAIL NE ''));
-*-IF &REPORT EQ 'PRNT' GOTO NO_ID_TST;
-*-IF &REPORT EQ 'LST' GOTO LST_ID_TST;
-*WHERE SPRIDEN_ID GE 'A00000000' AND SPRIDEN_ID LT 'A04000000'
-*-GOTO NO_ID_TST
-*-LST_ID_TST
-*WHERE SPRIDEN_ID GE 'A04000000'
-*-NO_ID_TST
ON TABLE HOLD AS HSPID
END
-RUN

JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO ALL APRCATG_PIDM IN APRCATG AS JCAT
END
-RUN
TABLEF FILE HSPID
PRINT
APRCATG_DONR_CODE
COMPUTE
CTR/I3 = IF (APRCATG_PIDM EQ LAST APRCATG_PIDM) THEN CTR + 1 ELSE 1;
BY APRCATG_PIDM
BY APRCATG_DONR_CODE NOPRINT
ON TABLE HOLD
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE HOLD
PRINT
COMPUTE
DONR1/A8 = IF CTR EQ 1 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
DONR2/A8 = IF CTR EQ 2 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
DONR3/A8 = IF CTR EQ 3 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
DONR4/A8 = IF CTR EQ 4 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
DONR5/A8 = IF CTR EQ 5 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
DONR6/A8 = IF CTR EQ 6 THEN APRCATG_DONR_CODE ELSE ' ';
BY APRCATG_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD
END
-RUN
TABLE FILE HOLD
SUM
MAX.DONR1
MAX.DONR2
MAX.DONR3
MAX.DONR4
MAX.DONR5
MAX.DONR6
BY APRCATG_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
ON TABLE SET ASNAMES ON
ON TABLE HOLD AS HDONR1
END

TABLE FILE HDONR1
SUM
COMPUTE DONR_STR/A55 = DONR1 | ' ' | DONR2 | ' ' | DONR3 | ' ' | DONR4 | ' ' | DONR5 | ' ' | DONR6;
BY PIDM_KEY
ON TABLE SET ASNAMES ON
ON TABLE HOLD AS HDONR
END

JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO ALL APRADEG_PIDM IN APRADEG AS JDEG
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE HSPID
PRINT
COMPUTE
DEG_CODE/A4 = APRADEG_COLL_CODE || EDIT (APRADEG_ACYR_CODE, '$$99');
COMPUTE
CTR/I3 = IF (APRADEG_PIDM EQ LAST APRADEG_PIDM) THEN CTR + 1 ELSE 1;
BY APRADEG_PIDM
BY APRADEG_ACYR_CODE
WHERE APRADEG_COLL_CODE IS-NOT MISSING AND APRADEG_ACYR_CODE IS-NOT MISSING;
ON TABLE HOLD
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE HOLD
PRINT
COMPUTE
COLL1/A8 = IF CTR EQ 1 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
COLL2/A8 = IF CTR EQ 2 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
COLL3/A8 = IF CTR EQ 3 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
COLL4/A8 = IF CTR EQ 4 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
COLL5/A8 = IF CTR EQ 5 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
COMPUTE
COLL6/A8 = IF CTR EQ 6 THEN DEG_CODE ELSE ' ';
BY APRADEG_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD
END
-RUN
TABLE FILE HOLD
SUM
MAX.COLL1
MAX.COLL2
MAX.COLL3
MAX.COLL4
MAX.COLL5
MAX.COLL6
BY APRADEG_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
ON TABLE SET ASNAMES ON
ON TABLE HOLD AS HCOLL1
END

TABLE FILE HCOLL1
SUM
COMPUTE COLL_STR/A55 = COLL1 | ' ' | COLL2 | ' ' | COLL3 | ' ' | COLL4 | ' ' | COLL5 | ' ' | COLL6;
BY PIDM_KEY
ON TABLE SET ASNAMES ON
ON TABLE HOLD AS HCOLL
END

JOIN CLEAR *
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO ALL APREXCL_PIDM IN APREXCL AS JEXCL
END
-RUN

TABLEF FILE HSPID
SUM APREXCL_EXCL_CODE
BY APREXCL_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
WHERE APREXCL_EXCL_CODE EQ 'NOC' OR 'EMC'
ON TABLE HOLD AS NOEXCL
END
-RUN

JOIN CLEAR *
SET ALL = ON
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO PIDM_KEY IN NOEXCL AS J1
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO PIDM_KEY IN HDONR AS J2
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO PIDM_KEY IN HCOLL AS J3
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO APBCONS_PIDM IN APBCONS AS J4
JOIN SPRIDEN_PIDM IN HSPID TO SPBPERS_PIDM IN SPBPERS AS J5
-RUN
DEFINE FILE HSPID
EMAIL_ADDRESS/A60V = IF (PREFERRED_EMAIL NE ' ') AND (PREFERRED_EMAIL IS NOT MISSING) THEN PREFERRED_EMAIL ELSE
                    IF (PERSONAL_EMAIL NE ' ') AND (PERSONAL_EMAIL IS NOT MISSING) THEN PERSONAL_EMAIL ELSE
                    IF (BUSINESS_EMAIL NE ' ') AND (BUSINESS_EMAIL IS NOT MISSING) THEN BUSINESS_EMAIL ELSE ' ';
DONR_STR/A120 = IF SPBPERS_DEAD_IND EQ 'Y' THEN 'D ' | DONR_STR | ' ' | COLL_STR ELSE 'L ' | DONR_STR | ' ' | COLL_STR;
END

&LAS_DEV_HOLD.EVAL
TABLE FILE HSPID
SUM
EMAIL_ADDRESS AS 'Preferred Email'
APBCONS_PREF_CLAS AS 'Preferred Year'
APBCONS_COLL_CODE_PREF AS 'Preferred College Code'
DONR_STR AS 'Descriptor'
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM AS 'PIDM'
BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'ID'
WHERE APREXCL_EXCL_CODE NE 'NOC' OR 'EMC' OR APREXCL_EXCL_CODE EQ ' ' OR APREXCL_EXCL_CODE IS MISSING;
WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND EQ 'N' OR ' ' OR SPBPERS_DEAD_IND IS MISSING;
WHERE HDONR.PIDM_KEY GT 0;
-IF &REPORT EQ 'PRNT' GOTO PRNT_DESC;
WHERE DONR_STR OMITS 'STUD' OR 'SENR';
WHERE DONR_STR NE 'L PRNP PRNT' OR 'L PRNT' OR 'L PRNS' OR 'L PRNP';
-*WHERE DONR_STR OMITS 'STUD' OR 'SENR' OR 'PRNP PRNT' OR 'PRNT' OR 'PRNS' OR 'PRNP' OR SPRIDEN_ID EQ 'A06937893';
-GOTO END_REP
-PRNT_DESC
WHERE DONR_STR OMITS 'STUD' OR 'SENR'
WHERE DONR_STR CONTAINS 'PRNT' OR 'PRNS';
-END_REP
WHERE EMAIL_ADDRESS NE ' '
ON TABLE HOLD AS TMPCAS FORMAT FOCUS INDEX SPRIDEN_PIDM
END
-RUN
-GOTO L_STATS


-********************* end your program with this:

-L_STATS

-*******************************************************
-MRNOEDIT -INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-*******************************************************

name: adjustments-report
overview: Adjustments Report

acf.overview: Adjustments Report

sql.sql_code:
-* File fin_adjustment.fex
-*Programmer: Jose Deleon
-*DATE : 5/19/09
-*DESC :This is an adjustment report that was developed by Joli Patino in Access.
-* I have used his sql code below to actually run it through WebFocus.
-* Note: The original SQL code consisted of two queries one that created the adjustments1
-* table and the other that used that adjustment1 table and joined it to ADBDESG.
-* I adjusted the sql to do the same task using a nested query to perform the same task
-* in one statement. I also change the output for the dates so that the format is in
-* MM/DD/YYYY.
-************************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-***************************************
-*SET &ECHO = ALL;
-DEFAULT &DATEFROM = '7/10/2008';
-DEFAULT &DATETO = '7/13/2009';
-*IF &DATEFROM EQ &DATETO THEN GOTO NOREC;


ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT FOR
 SELECT adjustments1.AGRAGDS_PIDM ,
  adjustments1.SPRIDEN_ID ,
  adjustments1.SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME ,
  adjustments1.SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME ,
  adjustments1.SPRIDEN_MI ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_GIFT_NO ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_AGIF_SEQ_NO ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_SEQ_NO ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_DESG ,
  adjustments1.GL_NO ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_AMT ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_USER ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_DESG_ADJ ,
  ADBDESG.ADBDESG_GL_NO_CREDIT ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_AMT_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_USER_ADJ ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE_ADJ,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_NEED_TO_FEED_IND ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FEED_IND_ADJ ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FEED_DATE_ADJ,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_FEED_DATE_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FEED_DOC_CODE_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_FINAL_IND_ADJ ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_USER_CASH ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_CASH,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_CASH ,
  adjustments1.AGRAGDS_SESSION_NUMBER ,
  TO_CHAR(adjustments1.AGRAGDS_ACTIVITY_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AGRAGDS_ACTIVITY_DATE
   FROM
  (SELECT AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_PIDM ,
    SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_ID ,
    SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME ,
    SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME ,
    SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_MI ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_NO ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_AGIF_SEQ_NO ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_SEQ_NO ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_DESG ,
    ADBDESG.ADBDESG_GL_NO_CREDIT AS GL_NO,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_AMT ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_USER ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_DESG_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_AMT_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_USER_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_NEED_TO_FEED_IND ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FEED_IND_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FEED_DATE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FEED_DOC_CODE_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_FINAL_IND_ADJ ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_USER_CASH ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_CASH ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_SESSION_NUMBER ,
    AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_ACTIVITY_DATE
     FROM SPRIDEN
  INNER JOIN ( AGRAGDS
  INNER JOIN ADBDESG
       ON AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_DESG = ADBDESG.ADBDESG_DESG)
       ON SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM = AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_PIDM
    WHERE (((AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ)>=TO_DATE('&DATEFROM.EVAL', 'MM/DD/YYYY')
  AND ( AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ) <= TO_DATE('&DATETO.EVAL', 'MM/DD/YYYY'))
  AND (( AGRAGDS.AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE_ADJ) < TO_DATE('&DATEFROM.EVAL', 'MM/DD/YYYY'))
  AND (( SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND) IS NULL))
  ) adjustments1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ADBDESG
     ON adjustments1.AGRAGDS_DESG_ADJ = ADBDESG.ADBDESG_DESG;
END



TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT
     AGRAGDS_PIDM
     SPRIDEN_ID
     SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
     SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
     SPRIDEN_MI
     AGRAGDS_GIFT_NO
     AGRAGDS_AGIF_SEQ_NO
     AGRAGDS_SEQ_NO
     AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO
     AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN
     AGRAGDS_DESG
     GL_NO
     AGRAGDS_AMT
     AGRAGDS_USER
     AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE
     AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE
     AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE
     AGRAGDS_PLEDGE_NO_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_CAMPAIGN_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_DESG_ADJ
     ADBDESG_GL_NO_CREDIT
     AGRAGDS_AMT_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_USER_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_GIFT_DATE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_FISC_CODE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_GIFT_CODE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_NEED_TO_FEED_IND
     AGRAGDS_FEED_IND_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_FEED_DATE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_FEED_DOC_CODE_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_FINAL_IND_ADJ
     AGRAGDS_USER_CASH
     AGRAGDS_ENTRY_DATE_CASH
     AGRAGDS_SESSION_NUMBER
     AGRAGDS_ACTIVITY_DATE
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL

-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLSKIP;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
-GOTO OTHERSKIP
-EXLSKIP
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-OTHERSKIP

ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=PORTRAIT,
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',
     SIZE=9,
  TITLETEXT = 'Adjustment Report',
$
TYPE=TITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABHEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABFOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=HEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=FOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBHEAD,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBFOOT,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE,
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=GRANDTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN


-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLS;
-GOTO ENDRPT
-EXLS

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT2 FOR
SELECT * FROM STVTERM;
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT2
PRINT
    STVTERM_CODE NOPRINT
WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Adjustment Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"From:<+0>&DATEFROM"
"To:<+0>&DATETO"
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE

sql.sql_code:
-* File fin_pay_receipt.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: ban_finance
-* Name: E-Visions Receipt
-* Purpose: A student form letter for tracking payment receipts
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: FIDN Number, Transaction Number
-* Execution: Reporting Menu
-* Comments: PDF Output ONLY
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20121109 | JAH - Initial development
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
-DEFAULTH &FIDN_NBR = ' '
-DEFAULTH &IBIMR_USER = ' '
-DEFAULTH &TRAN_NBR = ' '
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*************************************************
SET BYDISPLAY = ON
SET ALL = ON
SET EMPTYREPORT = ON
-*SET NODATA = ' '
-*
-SET &ECHO= OFF;
-SET &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-SET &CURRDATE = &DATEtrMDYY;
-SET &TODAY_DATE = EDIT(&DATE, '$$$$$$99');
-SET &NEXTYR = &TODAY_DATE + 1;
-SET &FINYR = &TODAY_DATE||&NEXTYR;

-********************** Defaluts ****************
-*-DEFAULT &FIDN_NBR = 'A10437896'
-*-DEFAULT &TRAN_NBR = '8'
-******************************** AMOUNT PAID BY STUDENT ****************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
SQL SQLORA PREPARE PAYMENT FOR
SELECT
 SPRIDEN_PIDM,
    SPRIDEN_ID,
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME,
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,
      (CASE
            WHEN spriden_first_name IS NOT NULL AND spriden_mi IS NOT NULL THEN
                 spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_mi || ' ' || spriden_last_name
            ELSE spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_last_name
        END) AS NAME,
  TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER,
  TBRACCD_TERM_CODE,
  TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE,
  TBRACCD_USER,
  TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE,
  TBRACCD_AMOUNT,
  TBRACCD_DESC,
  TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER,
  TBRACCD_BALANCE,
  STVTERM_START_DATE,
  STVTERM_END_DATE,
  STVTERM_DESC

FROM SPRIDEN,TBRACCD,STVTERM
WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = TBRACCD_PIDM
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
  AND SPRIDEN_ID = UPPER ('&FIDN_NBR')
  AND TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER = '&TRAN_NBR'
  AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE = STVTERM_CODE

;
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE PAYMENT
PRINT
 SPRIDEN_ID
 NAME
 TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER
 TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE
 TBRACCD_USER
 TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE
 TBRACCD_AMOUNT
 TBRACCD_DESC
 TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER
 STVTERM_DESC
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
BY TBRACCD_TERM_CODE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H1
END
-RUN
-****************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NO_RECORDS;
-****************
JOIN
 SPRIDEN_PIDM AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE IN H1 TO ALL
 TBRACCD_PIDM AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE IN TBRACCD AS J1
END
-****************
TABLE FILE H1
SUM
 TBRACCD_BALANCE
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS H2
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-****************
JOIN CLEAR
-****************
JOIN LEFT_OUTER SPRIDEN_PIDM IN H1 TO SPRIDEN_PIDM IN H2 AS J2
-****************
TABLE FILE H1
PRINT
 SPRIDEN_ID
 NAME
 TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER
 TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE
 TBRACCD_USER
 TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE
 TBRACCD_AMOUNT
 TBRACCD_DESC
 TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER
 STVTERM_DESC
 SPRIDEN_PIDM
 TBRACCD_BALANCE
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
BY TBRACCD_TERM_CODE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H3
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-****************
JOIN
 SPRIDEN_PIDM AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE IN H3 TO ALL
 TBRMEMO_PIDM AND TBRMEMO_TERM_CODE IN TBRMEMO AS J3
END
-****************

TABLE FILE H3
SUM
 LST.SPRIDEN_ID
 LST.NAME
 LST.TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER
 LST.TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE
 LST.TBRACCD_USER
 LST.TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE
 LST.TBRACCD_AMOUNT
 LST.TBRACCD_DESC
 LST.TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER
 LST.STVTERM_DESC
 LST.SPRIDEN_PIDM
 LST.TBRACCD_BALANCE
 LST.TBRMEMO_AMOUNT
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
BY TBRACCD_TERM_CODE
BY TBRMEMO_DETAIL_CODE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H4
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT

DEFINE FILE H4
TRANS_DATE/trMDYY = HDATE(TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE, 'MDYY');
ATBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER/A9 = EDIT(TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER, '999999999');
ATBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER2/A9 = TRIM('L', ATBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER, 9, '0', 8, 'A9');
PAID_AMOUNT/A17 = FPRINT(TBRACCD_AMOUNT, 'D12.2M', PAID_AMOUNT);
PAID_AMOUNT2/A17 = TRIM('L', PAID_AMOUNT, 17, ' ', 16, 'A17');
BAL_DUE/D12.2M = TBRACCD_BALANCE;
RECEIPT_NUM/A9 = FPRINT(TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER,'P9',RECEIPT_NUM);
ARECEIPT_NUM/A9 = IF (TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER EQ '.') THEN ' ' ELSE RECEIPT_NUM;
ARECEIPT_NUM2/A9 = TRIM('L', ARECEIPT_NUM, 9, ' ', 7, 'A9');
TBRMEMO_AMOUNT2/D12.2M = TBRMEMO_AMOUNT;
END

TABLE FILE H4
SUM
 LST.SPRIDEN_ID
 LST.NAME
 LST.TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER
 LST.TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE
 LST.TBRACCD_USER
 LST.TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE
 LST.TBRACCD_AMOUNT
 LST.TBRACCD_DESC
 LST.TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER
 LST.STVTERM_DESC
 LST.SPRIDEN_PIDM
 LST.TBRACCD_BALANCE
 TBRMEMO_AMOUNT
 LST.ATBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER2
 LST.PAID_AMOUNT2
 LST.BAL_DUE
 LST.ARECEIPT_NUM2
 LST.TRANS_DATE
 TBRMEMO_AMOUNT2
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
BY TBRACCD_TERM_CODE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H5
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT

DEFINE FILE H5
TOTAL_DUE/D12.2M = (BAL_DUE - TBRMEMO_AMOUNT);
END

TABLE FILE H5
PRINT
 SPRIDEN_ID
 NAME
 TBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER
 TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE
 TBRACCD_USER
 TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE
 TBRACCD_AMOUNT
 TBRACCD_DESC
 TBRACCD_RECEIPT_NUMBER
 STVTERM_DESC
 SPRIDEN_PIDM
 TBRACCD_BALANCE
 TBRMEMO_AMOUNT
 ATBRACCD_TRAN_NUMBER2
 PAID_AMOUNT2
 BAL_DUE
 ARECEIPT_NUM2
 TRANS_DATE
 TBRMEMO_AMOUNT2
 TOTAL_DUE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H8
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT

PRINT
     H8.H8.STVTERM_DESC NOPRINT

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_bdfile_lkp.fex
-*************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*************************************************
-DEFAULT &FIDN1 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN2 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN3 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN4 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN5 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN6 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN7 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN8 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN9 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN10 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN11 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN12 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN13 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN14 = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &FIDN15 = 'FOC_NONE';

-SET &ECHO = OFF;
-SET &QT = '''';
-SET &FIDN1 = IF EDIT(&FIDN1, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN1 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN2 = IF EDIT(&FIDN2, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN2 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN3 = IF EDIT(&FIDN3, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN3 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN4 = IF EDIT(&FIDN4, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN4 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN5 = IF EDIT(&FIDN5, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN5 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN6 = IF EDIT(&FIDN6, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN6 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN7 = IF EDIT(&FIDN7, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN7 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN8 = IF EDIT(&FIDN8, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN8 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN9 = IF EDIT(&FIDN9, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN9 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN10 = IF EDIT(&FIDN10, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN10 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN11 = IF EDIT(&FIDN11, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN11 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN12 = IF EDIT(&FIDN12, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN12 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN13 = IF EDIT(&FIDN13, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN13 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN14 = IF EDIT(&FIDN14, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN14 ELSE '';
-SET &FIDN15 = IF EDIT(&FIDN15, '9$$$$$$$$') EQ 'A' THEN &FIDN15 ELSE '';

-SET &FIDNWH = '(' || &QT || &FIDN1 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN2 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN3 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN4 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN5 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN6 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN7 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN8 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN9 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN10 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN11 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN12 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN13 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN14 || &QT || ','
- || &QT || &FIDN15 || &QT
- || ')';

-*-SET &FMT = 'EXCEL';

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE BDFILE FOR
select
 banner_id,
 spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name fullname,
 term,
 CASE substr(term, 5, 1)
  WHEN 'S' THEN substr(term, 1, 4) || 'A'
  WHEN 'M' THEN substr(term, 1, 4) || 'B'
  ELSE term
 END terms,
 subcode,
 tran_seq,
 tran_chrg_pay,
 subcode_desc,
 tran_amt,
 to_char(bd_effective_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') as bd_eff_date,
 to_char(bill_dt,'mm/dd/yyyy') as bill_date,
 to_char(tran_paid_dt,'mm/dd/yyyy') as paid_dt,
 (SELECT COUNT (*)
    from BDSISPLUS.bdsis_trans, spriden c
   where banner_id = c.spriden_id (+)
     and spriden_change_ind is null
     and c.spriden_pidm = a.spriden_pidm) as RECCNT
from BDSISPLUS.bdsis_trans, spriden a
where banner_id in &FIDNWH
and banner_id = spriden_id (+)
and spriden_change_ind is null
order by spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name, banner_id,
 CASE substr(term, 5, 1)
  WHEN 'S' THEN substr(term, 1, 4) || 'A'
  WHEN 'M' THEN substr(term, 1, 4) || 'B'
  ELSE term
 END, to_char(bd_effective_date,'mm/dd/yyyy')
;
END

-IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'HTML' OR 'AHTML' GOTO LBLRPTPDF;

-*-------------- Excel Format Code --------------------

TABLE FILE BDFILE
HEADING
"Fordham University Account Statement"
"&DATEMDYY"
"Student Name: <FULLNAME"
"ID: <BANNER_ID"
" "
PRINT TERM
      SUBCODE
      TRAN_SEQ
      TRAN_CHRG_PAY
      SUBCODE_DESC
      TRAN_AMT
      BD_EFF_DATE
      BILL_DATE
      PAID_DT
BY FULLNAME NOPRINT
BY TERMS NOPRINT
ON FULLNAME SUBFOOT
"*** TOTAL *** BALANCE<+0><ST.TRAN_AMT<+0> <+0>"
" "
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     PAGESIZE='Letter',
     LEFTMARGIN=0.500000,
     RIGHTMARGIN=0.500000,
     TOPMARGIN=0.2500000,
     BOTTOMMARGIN=0.2500000,
     ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='Arial',
     SIZE=9,
     COLOR='BLACK',
     BACKCOLOR='NONE',
     STYLE=NORMAL,
     LEFTGAP=.01,
     TITLETEXT='BDFile Look Up',
$
TYPE=HEADING,
 SIZE=10,
 STYLE=BOLD,
 JUSTIFY=CENTER,
$
TYPE=TITLE,
 STYLE=BOLD,
 SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
 STYLE=BOLD,
$
ENDSTYLE
ON FULLNAME NOSPLIT PAGE-BREAK
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ON
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
TABLE FILE BDFILE
PRINT FULLNAME NOPRINT
WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"BDFile Look Up"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"FIDN(s):<+0>&FIDN1"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN2"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN3"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN4"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN5"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN6"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN7"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN8"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN9"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN10"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN11"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN12"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN13"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN14"
"<+0> <+0>&FIDN15"


ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN



-*--------------- PDF Format Code -------------------
-LBLRPTPDF;

DEFINE FILE BDFILE
CNT/I5 = IF LAST BANNER_ID EQ BANNER_ID THEN (LAST CNT) + 1 ELSE 1;
TOTREM/I5 = IMOD(RECCNT, 52, TOTREM);
TOTPAGE/I5 = IF TOTREM GT 0 THEN (RECCNT - TOTREM)/52 + 1 ELSE RECCNT/52;
CURREM/I5 = IMOD(CNT, 52, CURREM);
CURPAGE/I5 = IF CURREM GT 0 THEN (CNT - CURREM)/52 + 1 ELSE CNT/52;
END

TABLE FILE BDFILE
PRINT TERM
      SUBCODE
      TRAN_SEQ
      TRAN_CHRG_PAY
      SUBCODE_DESC
      TRAN_AMT
      BD_EFF_DATE
      BILL_DATE
      PAID_DT
      RECCNT NOPRINT
      TOTPAGE NOPRINT
      CNT NOPRINT
      CURREM NOPRINT
      CURPAGE NOPRINT
BY FULLNAME NOPRINT
BY BANNER_ID NOPRINT
BY TERMS NOPRINT
BY BD_EFF_DATE NOPRINT
HEADING
"Fordham University Account Statement"
"&DATEMDYY"
"Student Name: <FULLNAME"
"ID: <BANNER_ID"
" "
FOOTING
"<CURPAGE of <TOTPAGE"
ON BANNER_ID SUBFOOT
"*** TOTAL *** BALANCE<+0><ST.TRAN_AMT<+0> <+0>"
" "
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     PAGESIZE='Letter',
     LEFTMARGIN=0.500000,
     RIGHTMARGIN=0.500000,
     TOPMARGIN=0.2500000,
     BOTTOMMARGIN=0.2500000,
     ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='TIMES NEW ROMAN',
     SIZE=9,
     COLOR='BLACK',
     BACKCOLOR='NONE',
     STYLE=NORMAL,
     LEFTGAP=.01,
     TITLETEXT='Rpt',
$
TYPE=HEADING,
 SIZE=10,
 STYLE=BOLD,
 JUSTIFY=CENTER,
$
TYPE=TITLE,
 STYLE=BOLD,
 SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
 STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=FOOTING,
     LINE=1,
     JUSTIFY=CENTER,
$
ENDSTYLE
ON BANNER_ID NOSPLIT PAGE-BREAK
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ON
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-**************************************************
-ENDRPT
-INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-MRNOEDIT END
-EXIT

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_prevcoll.fex
-********************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-********************************
-SET &ECHO = OFF;
-SET &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-DEFAULT &TERM = '201110';
-DEFAULT &GRADTERM = 'FOC_NONE';
-DEFAULT &COLL = 'GL';
-DEFAULT &LEVL = 'FOC_NONE';

-SET &SZVWHR = 'SELECT SGBSTDN_PIDM FROM SGBSTDN S1 WHERE S1.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = (SELECT MAX (SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF)' |
-' FROM SGBSTDN S2 WHERE S2.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF <= ''&TERM.EVAL'' AND S1.SGBSTDN_PIDM = S2.SGBSTDN_PIDM) AND S1.SGBSTDN_STST_CODE = ''AS''';

TYPE &SZVWHR
SET BYDISPLAY = ON

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE GAPPSQL FOR
    SELECT learner.sorlcur_pidm,
           learner.sorlcur_seqno,
           (CASE WHEN gapp.shbgapp_pidm IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END)
              app_bool
    FROM sorlcur outcome
              INNER JOIN
                 sorlcur learner
              ON outcome.sorlcur_seqno = learner.sorlcur_rolled_seqno
                 AND outcome.sorlcur_pidm = learner.sorlcur_pidm
           INNER JOIN
              shbgapp gapp
           ON outcome.sorlcur_pidm = gapp.shbgapp_pidm
              AND outcome.sorlcur_gapp_seqno = gapp.shbgapp_seqno
   WHERE learner.sorlcur_pidm IN (&SZVWHR)
ORDER BY learner.sorlcur_pidm, learner.sorlcur_seqno
END

TABLE FILE GAPPSQL
PRINT
     APP_BOOL
BY SORLCUR_PIDM
BY SORLCUR_SEQNO
ON TABLE HOLD AS GAPP
END
-RUN

-*GET THE PREVIOUS COLLEGE INFORMATION
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE PRECOLLSQL FOR
  SELECT SORPCOL_PIDM,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 1 THEN STVSBGI_DESC ELSE '' END) PRECOLL_1,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 1 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_CODE ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_1,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 1 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_1,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 2 THEN STVSBGI_DESC ELSE '' END) PRECOLL_2,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 2 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_CODE ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_2,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 2 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_2,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 3 THEN STVSBGI_DESC ELSE '' END) PRECOLL_3,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 3 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_CODE ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_3,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 3 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_3,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 4 THEN STVSBGI_DESC ELSE '' END) PRECOLL_4,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 4 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_CODE ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_4,
           MAX (CASE WHEN RNK = 4 THEN SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR ELSE '' END)
              PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_4
    FROM (SELECT sorpcol_pidm,
                     stvsbgi_code,
                     stvsbgi_desc,
                     SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR,
                     SORDEGR_DEGC_CODE,
                     DENSE_RANK ()
                        OVER (
                           PARTITION BY sorpcol_pidm
                           ORDER BY
                              SORDEGR_DEGC_YEAR DESC, STVSBGI_CODE NULLS LAST
                        )
                        rnk
              FROM SORPCOL
                        INNER JOIN
                           STVSBGI
                        ON SORPCOL_SBGI_CODE = STVSBGI_CODE
                     LEFT OUTER JOIN
                        SORDEGR
                     ON SORPCOL_PIDM = SORDEGR_PIDM
                        AND SORPCOL_SBGI_CODE = SORDEGR_SBGI_CODE)
   WHERE SORPCOL_PIDM IN
                 (&SZVWHR.EVAL)
GROUP BY SORPCOL_PIDM;
END

TABLE FILE PRECOLLSQL
PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS PRECOLL
END
-RUN

-*Get curricula record for students

-INCLUDE FORDHAM_SZVACUR

TABLE FILE SZVA
PRINT *
WHERE SZVACUR_STST_CODE EQ 'AS';
WHERE SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_GRAD EQ &GRADTERM;
WHERE SZVACUR_LEVL_CODE EQ &LEVL;
WHERE SZVACUR_COLL_CODE EQ &COLL;
WHERE SZVACUR_COLL_CODE NE 'XX';
ON TABLE HOLD AS SZVAHLD
END
-RUN

JOIN LEFT_OUTER SZVACUR_PIDM IN SZVAHLD TO SORPCOL_PIDM IN PRECOLL AS J1

TABLE FILE SZVAHLD
PRINT
   PRECOLL_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_1
   PRECOLL_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_2
   PRECOLL_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_3
   PRECOLL_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_4
BY SZVACUR_PIDM
BY SZVACUR_SEQNO
BY SZVACUR_ID
BY STUDENT_NAME_LFM
ON TABLE HOLD AS SZVAHLD2
END
-RUN

JOIN LEFT_OUTER SZVACUR_PIDM AND SZVACUR_SEQNO IN SZVAHLD2 TO SORLCUR_PIDM AND SORLCUR_SEQNO IN GAPP AS J2


TABLE FILE SZVAHLD2
PRINT
   PRECOLL_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_1
   PRECOLL_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_2
   PRECOLL_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_3
   PRECOLL_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_4
   APP_BOOL AS 'APPLICATION EXISTS FLAG'
   COMPUTE NEWCOLL_1/A120 = LCWORD(120,PRECOLL_1,NEWCOLL_1);
   COMPUTE NEWCOLL_2/A120 = LCWORD(120,PRECOLL_2,NEWCOLL_2);
   COMPUTE NEWCOLL_3/A120 = LCWORD(120,PRECOLL_3,NEWCOLL_3);
   COMPUTE NEWCOLL_4/A120 = LCWORD(120,PRECOLL_4,NEWCOLL_4);
BY SZVACUR_ID AS 'FIDN'
BY STUDENT_NAME_LFM
ON TABLE HOLD AS SZVAHLD3
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE SZVAHLD3
PRINT
   NEWCOLL_1 AS PRECOLL_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_1
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_1
   NEWCOLL_2 AS PRECOLL_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_2
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_2
   NEWCOLL_3 AS PRECOLL_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_3
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_3
   NEWCOLL_4 AS PRECOLL_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_CODE_4
   PRECOLL_DEGR_YEAR_4
   APP_BOOL AS 'APPLICATION EXISTS FLAG'
BY SZVACUR_ID AS 'FIDN'
BY STUDENT_NAME_LFM
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN


-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLSKIP;

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
-GOTO OTHERSKIP
-EXLSKIP

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-OTHERSKIP
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
 UNITS=IN, SQUEEZE=ON, TITLETEXT='Previous College', $
TYPE=REPORT, ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,GRID=OFF, FONT='ARIAL', SIZE=9, RIGHTGAP=0.125000,$
TYPE=TITLE, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=TABHEADING, SIZE=12, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=TABFOOTING, SIZE=12, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=HEADING, SIZE=12, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=FOOTING, SIZE=12, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=SUBHEAD, SIZE=10, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=SUBFOOT, SIZE=10, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE, SIZE=9,$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE, STYLE=BOLD,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-IF &RECORDS EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN GOTO PARAM1;
-GOTO ENDRPT
-PARAM1

TABLE FILE SZVAHLD2
PRINT SZVACUR_ID NOPRINT
WHERE READLIMIT EQ 1
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Previous College Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"Term:<+0>&TERM_TEXT"
"Graduation Term:<+0>&GRADTERM_TEXT"
"College:<+0>&COLL_TEXT"
"Level:<+0>&LEVL_TEXT"

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN


-GOTO ENDRPT
-********************************
-NOREC
-INCLUDE ADV_NORECMSG
-*-EXIT
-********************************
-ENDRPT
-INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-MRNOEDIT END
-EXIT

sql.sql_code:
-***************************************************************
-* File stu_fr_immunization.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: BAN STU
-* Name: Freshman Immunization Report - Not Registered
-* Purpose: Gives various statistical report for immunization.
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Term, College
-* Execution: Reporting Menu
-* Comments:
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20090415 | Jose DeLeon - Initial development
-* 20111018 | JOse DeLeon - Added RPT18 and RPT19 for Cathy Buescher - Magic Ticket #208167
-* Got rid of ALL the HOLD FORMAT FOCUS files
-* Created &XCOLL for selecting ALL Colleges, only extracting current active colleges
-* Add Style Attributes for Rpts 14, 15, 16 & 17
-* 20120727 | JAH - Modification of STVCOLL for College of PC
-*******************************************************************************
-*APP HOLD FOCCACHE
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME; 
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-DEFAULTS &TERM = '201310', &TERM_TEXT = '201310-Fall 2012', &RPTTYPE = 'RPT20', &FMT = 'EXL2K', &RPTTYPE_TEXT = 'Non-Complied - Not Reg.'
-***************************************************************************************
-* Comment this out to run stand-alone
-SET &TERM = STRREP(&TERM.LENGTH, &TERM, 1 , '''', 0 ,'X',6, 'A6');
-* UNCOMMENT this out to run stand-alone
-****************************************************************************************
-SET &ECHO = OFF; 
-SET &QT = '''';
-*-SET &FMT = 'EXL2K';
-SET &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-SET &TITLE = '';
-SET &PAGESIZE = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' THEN 'PAGESIZE=LETTER' ELSE '';
-SET &GRADFILT = EDIT(&TERM, '9999') |'20';
-SET &ADDRTYP1 = 'MA';
-SET &ADDRTYP2 = 'FOC_NONE';
-SET &ADDRTYP3 = 'FOC_NONE';
-SET &ADDRTYP4 = 'FOC_NONE';
-SET &ADDRTYP5 = 'FOC_NONE';
-SET &XCOLL = IF &COLLEGE EQ 'FOC_NONE' THEN
- &QT || 'CB' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'CE' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'CL' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'FC' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GA' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GB' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GE' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GL' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GR' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'GS' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'LS' || &QT | ' OR ' |
- &QT || 'LT' || &QT
- ELSE &COLLEGE;
-SET &COLLW1 = IF &XCOLL.LENGTH LE 4 THEN &XCOLL ELSE STRREP(&XCOLL.LENGTH, &XCOLL, 4 , ' OR ', 4 ,',',&XCOLL.LENGTH, 'A&XCOLL.LENGTH');
-SET &WHRCOL = IF &XCOLL NE 'FOC_NONE' THEN ' AND (s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 IN (' || (&COLLW1) ||
- ') OR s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_2 IN (' || (&COLLW1) ||
- ') OR s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_dual IN (' || (&COLLW1) || ')))' ELSE '';
-TYPE &WHRCOL
-SET &SZVWHR = 'SELECT distinct sgbstdn_pidm FROM sgbstdn s1 WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff = (SELECT MAX (sgbstdn_term_code_eff) FROM sgbstdn s2' |
- ' WHERE s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= ' | '&TERM.EVAL' | ' AND s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm'| &WHRCOL;
-SET &ADDRWH1 = &SZVWHR;
-TYPE &SZVWHR
-SET &SZVONLY = 'Y';
-SET &OPEN = IF (&FMT EQ EXL2K) THEN ' ' ELSE '-*';

-**********************************************
SET ASNAMES = ON, KEEPDEFINES=ON
-**********************************************
-* GOTO TOM_START1
-**********************************************
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_TERMTABLE
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_SZVACUR

TABLEF FILE SZVA
PRINT *
BY SZVACUR_PIDM NOPRINT
BY LOWEST 1 SZVACUR_PRIORITY_NO NOPRINT
ON TABLE HOLD AS HLDTMP
END
-RUN
-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;

DEFINE FILE HLDTMP
STU_STATUS/A11 = IF ('&TERM' EQ SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_ADMIT) THEN 'NEW STUDENT' ELSE 'RETURNING';
FULLNAME/A50 = SZVACUR_LAST_NAME | ',' | SZVACUR_FIRST_NAME | ' '| SZVACUR_MI;
FULLNAME_ID/A70 = FULLNAME||SZVACUR_ID;
END

-*GET THE SSN AND BIRTHDATE FOR THOSE BORN AFTER 1956

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SPB FOR
  SELECT spbpers_pidm,
           spbpers_birth_date,
           spbpers_ssn,
           (CASE
               WHEN (EXTRACT (YEAR FROM spbpers_birth_date) > 1956) OR (spbpers_birth_date is null) THEN 'Y'
               ELSE 'N'
            END) bdyear
    FROM spbpers

ORDER BY spbpers_pidm
;
END

TABLEF FILE SPB
PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS SPBPER
END
-RUN
-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;

TABLE FILE HRSSZVA
PRINT *
BY SPBPERS_PIDM NOPRINT
ON TABLE HOLD AS HRSSZVBD1
END

-* THE ABOVE CODE GENERATES A LIST OF STUDENTS WITH THEIR DATA THAT SHOULD BE INCLUDED IN THIS REPORT.
-* THEY ARE STUDENTS WHICH HAVE A CURRENT_ATTEMPTED_HOURS GE 1 FOR NONE GB AND GE 1 FOR GB AND WHERE BORN AFTER
-* 1/1/1957.
-SET &ECHO = 'ALL';

JOIN CLEAR *
-RUN
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE
SQL SQLORA PREPARE GORIMM FOR
  SELECT t4.gorimmu_pidm,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmeas) >= 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmpmeas,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmumps) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmpmumps,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmprub) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmprub,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmeng) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmpmeng,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmengv) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmpmengv,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmengw) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) tmpmengw,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.medical) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) medical,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.religious) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) religious,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tmpmeas) = 1 THEN 'PARTIAL' ELSE '' END) meascnt,
           TO_CHAR(MAX (T4.MEASDATE),'MM/DD/YYYY') LASTMEASDATE,
           MAX (T4.MEASPART) MEASPART,
           MAX (t4.meng_imstattmp) meng_imstattmp,
           MAX (t4.mengwvtmp) mengwvtmp,
           (CASE WHEN SUM (t4.tot_meng_imstat) >= 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
              tot_meng_imstat,
           MAX (t4.mengvaccine) mengvaccine
    FROM (SELECT gorimmu_pidm,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'MEASLES')
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('V', 'Y')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            (CASE
                                WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'MEASLES')
                                     AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('A', 'T', 'D')
                                THEN
                                   2
                                ELSE
                                   0
                             END)
                      END)
                        tmpmeas,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'MEASLES')
                         THEN
                            gorimmu_immu_date
                      END)
                        measdate,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'MEASLES')
                              AND (gorimmu_imst_code = 'P')
                         THEN
                            gorimmu_imst_code
                      END)
                        measpart,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'MUMPS')
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN
                                       ('D', 'T', 'V', 'Y', 'A')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tmpmumps,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code = 'RUBELLA')
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('D', 'T', 'V', 'Y', 'A')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tmprub,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                     ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS'))
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('V', 'W', 'A')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tmpmeng,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                     ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS'))
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('V')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tmpmengv,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                     ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS'))
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('W')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tmpmengw,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                     ('MENO',
                                      'MENA',
                                      'MENINGITIS',
                                      'MUMPS',
                                      'RUBELLA',
                                      'MEASLES'))
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('R')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        religious,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN (gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                     ('MENO',
                                      'MENA',
                                      'MENINGITIS',
                                      'MUMPS',
                                      'RUBELLA',
                                      'MEASLES'))
                              AND gorimmu_imst_code IN ('H')
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        medical,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                    ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS')
                         THEN
                            (CASE
                                WHEN (gorimmu_immu_date IS NOT NULL)
                                     AND (gorimmu_imst_code NOT IN
                                                ('W', 'V', 'T', 'Y', 'A'))
                                THEN
                                   'Dated BlnkStat'
                                ELSE
                                   (CASE gorimmu_imst_code
                                       WHEN 'V' THEN 'Complied'
                                       WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Complied'
                                       WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waived'
                                       WHEN 'T' THEN 'Titer'
                                       ELSE 'Non-Complied'
                                    END)
                             END)
                         ELSE
                            ''
                      END)
                        meng_imstattmp,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                    ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS')
                         THEN
                            (CASE
                                WHEN (gorimmu_immu_date IS NOT NULL)
                                     AND (gorimmu_imst_code NOT IN
                                                ('W', 'V', 'T', 'Y', 'A'))
                                THEN
                                   'Dated BlnkStat'
                                ELSE
                                   (CASE gorimmu_imst_code
                                       WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vaccinated'
                                       WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Complied'
                                       WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waived'
                                       WHEN 'T' THEN 'Titer'
                                       ELSE 'Non-Complied'
                                    END)
                             END)
                         ELSE
                            ''
                      END)
                        mengwvtmp,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                    ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS')
                              AND ( (gorimmu_imst_code IN ('W', 'V', 'Y', 'A'))
                                   OR ( (gorimmu_imst_code IS NULL)
                                       AND (gorimmu_immu_date IS NOT NULL)))
                         THEN
                            1
                         ELSE
                            0
                      END)
                        tot_meng_imstat,
                     (CASE
                         WHEN gorimmu_immu_code IN
                                    ('MENO', 'MENA', 'MENINGITIS')
                         THEN
                            gorimmu_immu_code
                         ELSE
                            ''
                      END)
                        mengvaccine
              FROM gorimmu
WHERE NOT EXISTS
     (select 'x'
         from sfrstcr
        where sfrstcr_pidm = gorimmu_pidm
          and sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM')) t4
-* and sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
-* and stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')) t4

-* (SELECT shrtckn_pidm
-* FROM shrtckn
-* WHERE shrtckn_term_code = '&TERM'
-* AND shrtckn_pidm = gorimmu_pidm)) t4

GROUP BY t4.gorimmu_pidm;
END


TABLE FILE GORIMM
PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS GORIMM2
END
-RUN

SET KEEPDEFINES = ON
JOIN SZVACUR_PIDM IN RT201 TO GORIMMU_PIDM IN GORIMM2 AS J3

DEFINE FILE RT2011
  XCOLL1/A2 = EDIT(SZVACUR_COLL_CODE,'99');
  MEASLES/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMEAS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MUMPS/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMUMPS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RUBELLA/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPRUB EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MENG/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMENG EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RMEDICAL/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF MEDICAL EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RRELIGIOUS/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF RELIGIOUS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MEASD /A1 = IF MEASPART EQ 'P' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
END

TABLE FILE RT2011
PRINT
   FULLNAME
   SZVACUR_COLL_CODE
   SZVACUR_TERM_CODE
   SZVACUR_CAMP_CODE
   SZVACUR_PIDM
   SZVACUR_ID
   SZVACUR_FIRST_NAME
   SZVACUR_LAST_NAME
   MEASCNT
   LASTMEASDATE
   MEASD
   MEASLES
   MUMPS
   RUBELLA
   MENG
   RMEDICAL
   RRELIGIOUS
   STU_STATUS
   SZVACUR_STDN_STYP_CODE
     COMPUTE TOTIMUN /I05 = IF (TMPMEAS EQ 1) AND (TMPMUMPS EQ 1) AND (TMPRUB EQ 1) AND (TMPMENG EQ 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0;
     COMPUTE IMUNSTAT/A12 = IF (TOTIMUN EQ 1) OR (RELIGIOUS EQ 1) OR (MEDICAL EQ 1) THEN 'Complied' ELSE 'Non-Complied';
     COMPUTE IMLABFLG/A01 = IF (TOTIMUN EQ 1) OR (RELIGIOUS EQ 1) OR (MEDICAL EQ 1) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y';
     COMPUTE MENGWV/A20 = IF MENGWVTMP EQ '' THEN 'Non-Complied' ELSE MENGWVTMP;
     COMPUTE MENG_IMSTAT/A20 = IF MENG_IMSTATTMP EQ '' THEN 'Non-Complied' ELSE MENG_IMSTATTMP;

-*SZVACUR_ID SZVACUR_LAST_NAME SZVACUR_FIRST_NAME SZVACUR_MI SZVACUR_SEQNO SZVACUR_LMOD_CODE SZVACUR_LMOD_DESC SZVACUR_TERM_CODE SZVACUR_TERM_DESC SZVACUR_KEY_SEQNO SZVACUR_PRIORITY_NO SZVACUR_ROLL_IND SZVACUR_CACT_CODE SZVACUR_CACT_DESC SZVACUR_USER_ID SZVACUR_DATA_ORIGIN SZVACUR_ACTIVITY_DATE SZVACUR_LEVL_CODE SZVACUR_LEVL_DESC SZVACUR_COLL_CODE SZVACUR_COLL_DESC SZVACUR_DEGC_CODE SZVACUR_DEGC_DESC SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_CTLG SZVACUR_TERM_DESC_CTLG SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_END SZVACUR_TERM_DESC_END SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_MATRIC
-*SZVACUR_TERM_DESC_MATRIC SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_ADMIT SZVACUR_TERM_DESC_ADMIT SZVACUR_ADMT_CODE SZVACUR_ADMT_DESC SZVACUR_CAMP_CODE SZVACUR_CAMP_DESC SZVACUR_PROGRAM SZVACUR_START_DATE SZVACUR_END_DATE SZVACUR_CURR_RULE SZVACUR_ROLLED_SEQNO SZVACUR_ROWID SZVACUR_ORDER SZVACUR_ACTIVE_IND SZVACUR_STDN_ROWID SZVACUR_STDN_TERM_CODE_EFF SZVACUR_STDN_TERM_DESC_EFF SZVACUR_STYP_CODE_STDN SZVACUR_STYP_DESC_STDN SZVACUR_SITE_CODE SZVACUR_SITE_DESC SZVACUR_RATE_CODE SZVACUR_RATE_DESC SZVACUR_STYP_CODE SZVACUR_STYP_DESC SZVACUR_LEAV_CODE SZVACUR_LEAV_DESC SZVACUR_LEAV_FROM_DATE SZVACUR_LEAV_TO_DATE SZVACUR_EXP_GRAD_DATE SZVACUR_TERM_CODE_GRAD SZVACUR_TERM_DESC_GRAD SZVACUR_ACYR_CODE SZVACUR_ACYR_DESC SZVACUR_APPL_KEY_SEQNO SZVACUR_APPL_SEQNO SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_1 SZVACUR_DEPT_CODE_1 SZVACUR_DEPT_DESC_1 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_MAJR_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_2 SZVACUR_DEPT_CODE_2 SZVACUR_DEPT_DESC_2 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_MAJR_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_MINR_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_MINR_1 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_MINR_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_MINR_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_MINR_2 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_MINR_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_CONC_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_CONC_1 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_CONC_1 SZVACUR_ATTACH_MAJR_CONC_1 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_CONC_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_CONC_2 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_CONC_2 SZVACUR_ATTACH_MAJR_CONC_2 SZVACUR_MAJR_CODE_CONC_3 SZVACUR_MAJR_DESC_CONC_3 SZVACUR_CURR_RULE_CONC_3

SQL SQLORA PREPARE POPNOTONL FOR
SELECT
     SPRIDEN_ID,
  SPRIDEN_PIDM,
     SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || SPRIDEN_MI NAME,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
           FROM GOREMAL
          WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'FUST'
            AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
            AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) FUST,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
            FROM GOREMAL
           WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'PERS'
             AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
             AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) PERS1
FROM SPRIDEN
WHERE SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
;
END
TABLE FILE POPNOTONL
PRINT
    FUST
    PERS1
  BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
 ON TABLE HOLD AS POPNONL FORMAT FOCUS INDEX SPRIDEN_PIDM
END

-* ------------------------ Phone Numbers -------------------------------
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
SQL SQLORA PREPARE PHNUMT FOR
select
  p1.sprtele_pidm PH_PIDM,
   listagg( nvl2(sprtele_phone_number, stvtele_desc||': ', '') ||
            nvl2(sprtele_phone_area, '(', '') ||
            sprtele_phone_area ||
            nvl2(sprtele_phone_area, ') ', '') ||
            sprtele_phone_number ||
            nvl2(sprtele_phone_ext, 'x', '') ||
            sprtele_phone_ext, ', '
          )
    WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY sprtele_activity_date desc) PH_NUM
from sprtele p1, stvtele
where p1.sprtele_status_ind is null
 and p1.sprtele_tele_code in ('MA', 'CP', 'WK', 'B', 'N1', 'P1')
 and stvtele_code = p1.sprtele_tele_code
 and p1.sprtele_seqno =
                          (
                               select min(p2.sprtele_seqno)
                                 from sprtele p2
                               where p1.sprtele_pidm = p2.sprtele_pidm
                                 and p1.sprtele_tele_code = p2.sprtele_tele_code
                                 and p2.sprtele_status_ind is null
                          )
 and sprtele_pidm IN (&SZVWHR.EVAL)
group by p1.sprtele_pidm
order by p1.sprtele_pidm;
END
TABLE FILE PHNUMT
SUM
    MAX.PH_NUM
BY PH_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS PHNUMH
END
-RUN

DEFINE FILE RPT16A
  MEASLES/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMEAS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MUMPS/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMUMPS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RUBELLA/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPRUB EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MENG/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF TMPMENG EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RMEDICAL/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF MEDICAL EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  RRELIGIOUS/A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
                  IF RELIGIOUS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  MEASD /A1 = IF MEASPART EQ 'P' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
  PART_COMP/A3 = IF MEASLES EQ 'Y' OR MUMPS EQ 'Y' OR RUBELLA EQ 'Y' OR
                     MENG EQ 'Y' OR RMEDICAL EQ 'Y' OR RRELIGIOUS EQ 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No';
  ST_NAME/A43 = SUBSTR(240, SZVACUR_LAST_NAME, 1, 25, 25, 'A25') || (', ' | SUBSTR(240, SZVACUR_FIRST_NAME, 1, 15, 15, 'A15'));
END
