ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
SQL SQLORA PREPARE CRSLSTSQL FOR
  SELECT t12.sfrstcr_pidm,
         t12.sfrstcr_rsts_code,
         t1.ssbsect_crn,
         t1.ssbsect_term_code,
         t1.ssbsect_camp_code,
         t1.ssbsect_enrl,
         t1.ssbsect_max_enrl,
         t1.ssbsect_schd_code,
         t1.ssbsect_ssts_code,
         t1.ssbsect_gmod_code,
         t1.ssbsect_ptrm_code,
            t1.ssbsect_subj_code
         || '-'
         || t1.ssbsect_crse_numb
         || '-'
         || t1.ssbsect_seq_numb
            crsnum,
         (CASE
             WHEN t1.ssbsect_crse_title IS NULL THEN t2.scbcrse_title
             ELSE t1.ssbsect_crse_title
          END)
            title,
         (CASE
             WHEN t11.ssrmeet_credit_hr_sess IS NULL
             THEN
                (CASE
                    WHEN t1.ssbsect_credit_hrs IS NULL
                    THEN
                       t2.scbcrse_credit_hr_low
                    ELSE
                       t1.ssbsect_credit_hrs
                 END)
             ELSE
                t11.ssrmeet_credit_hr_sess
          END)
            credithrs,
         t2.scbcrse_dept_code,
         t2.scbcrse_credit_hr_low,
         t2.scbcrse_credit_hr_high,
         t11.sirasgn_category,
         t11.ssrmeet_catagory,
         t11.sirasgn_crn,
         (CASE
             WHEN t11.sirasgn_category = t11.ssrmeet_catagory
             THEN
                (CASE
                    WHEN t11.instname1 IS NULL THEN 'TBA'
                    ELSE t11.instname1
                 END)
             ELSE
                'TBA'
          END)
            finstname1,
         (CASE
             WHEN t11.sirasgn_category = t11.ssrmeet_catagory
             THEN
                (CASE WHEN t11.instname2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE t11.instname2 END)
             ELSE
                ''
          END)
            finstname2,
         t11.ssrmeet_crn,
            t11.ssrmeet_sun_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_mon_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_tue_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_wed_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_thu_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_fri_day
         || t11.ssrmeet_sat_day
            meetday,
         (CASE
             WHEN t11.ssrmeet_bldg_code IS NULL THEN 'TBA'
             ELSE t11.ssrmeet_bldg_code
          END)
            building,
         t11.ssrmeet_room_code room,
         SUBSTR (
            (CASE
                WHEN (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1300
                                                                   AND 2199)
                     OR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 0000
                                                                      AND 0999)
                THEN
                   '0'
                   || (CASE
                          WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) <= 1299
                          THEN
                             TO_CHAR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER))
                          ELSE
                             TO_CHAR (
                                CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) - 1200)
                       END)
                ELSE
                   (CASE
                       WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) <= 1299
                       THEN
                          TO_CHAR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER))
                       ELSE
                          TO_CHAR (
                             CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) - 1200)
                    END)
             END),
            1,
            2)
         || ':'
         || SUBSTR (
               (CASE
                   WHEN (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1300
                                                                      AND 2199)
                        OR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 0000
                                                                         AND 0999)
                   THEN
                      '0'
                      || (CASE
                             WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) <=
                                     1299
                             THEN
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER))
                             ELSE
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER)
                                   - 1200)
                          END)
                   ELSE
                      (CASE
                          WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) <= 1299
                          THEN
                             TO_CHAR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER))
                          ELSE
                             TO_CHAR (
                                CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) - 1200)
                       END)
                END),
               3,
               2)
         || (CASE
                WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_begin_time AS INTEGER) < 1200 THEN 'AM'
                ELSE 'PM'
             END)
         || ' - '
         || SUBSTR (
               (CASE
                   WHEN (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1300
                                                                    AND 2199)
                        OR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 0000
                                                                       AND 0999)
                   THEN
                      '0'
                      || (CASE
                             WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) <=
                                     1299
                             THEN
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER))
                             ELSE
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER)
                                   - 1200)
                          END)
                   ELSE
                      (CASE
                          WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) <= 1299
                          THEN
                             TO_CHAR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER))
                          ELSE
                             TO_CHAR (
                                CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) - 1200)
                       END)
                END),
               1,
               2)
         || ':'
         || SUBSTR (
               (CASE
                   WHEN (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1300
                                                                    AND 2199)
                        OR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 0000
                                                                       AND 0999)
                   THEN
                      '0'
                      || (CASE
                             WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) <=
                                     1299
                             THEN
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER))
                             ELSE
                                TO_CHAR (
                                   CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER)
                                   - 1200)
                          END)
                   ELSE
                      (CASE
                          WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) <= 1299
                          THEN
                             TO_CHAR (CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER))
                          ELSE
                             TO_CHAR (
                                CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) - 1200)
                       END)
                END),
               3,
               2)
         || (CASE
                WHEN CAST (t11.ssrmeet_end_time AS INTEGER) < 1200 THEN 'AM'
                ELSE 'PM'
             END)
            times
    FROM ssbsect t1
         INNER JOIN (SELECT c1.scbcrse_subj_code,
                            c1.scbcrse_crse_numb,
                            c1.scbcrse_title,
                            c1.scbcrse_dept_code,
                            c1.scbcrse_credit_hr_low,
                            c1.scbcrse_credit_hr_high,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_1,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_2,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_3,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_4,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_5,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_6,
                            c3.CRS_LEVEL_7
                       FROM scbcrse c1
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN
                               ( SELECT scrlevl_subj_code,
                                         scrlevl_crse_numb,
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 1
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_1",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 2
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_2",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 3
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_3",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 4
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_4",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 5
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_5",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 6
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_6",
                                         MAX (
                                            CASE
                                               WHEN cnts = 7
                                               THEN
                                                  scrlevl_levl_code
                                               ELSE
                                                  NULL
                                            END)
                                            AS "CRS_LEVEL_7"
                                    FROM ( SELECT l1.scrlevl_subj_code,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_crse_numb,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_eff_term,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_levl_code,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_activity_date,
                                                   DENSE_RANK ()
                                                   OVER (
                                                      PARTITION BY l1.scrlevl_subj_code,
                                                                   l1.scrlevl_crse_numb
                                                      ORDER BY
                                                         l1.scrlevl_subj_code,
                                                         l1.scrlevl_crse_numb,
                                                         l1.SCRLEVL_LEVL_CODE)
                                                      cnts
                                              FROM scrlevl l1
                                             WHERE l1.scrlevl_eff_term =
                                                      (SELECT MAX (
                                                                 l2.scrlevl_eff_term)
                                                         FROM scrlevl l2
                                                        WHERE l2.scrlevl_eff_term <=
                                                                 '&TERM'
                                                              AND l1.scrlevl_subj_code =
                                                                     L2.SCRLEVL_SUBJ_CODE
                                                              AND l1.scrlevl_crse_numb =
                                                                     L2.SCRLEVL_CRSE_NUMB)
                                          ORDER BY l1.scrlevl_subj_code,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_crse_numb,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_eff_term,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_levl_code,
                                                   l1.scrlevl_activity_date)
                                GROUP BY scrlevl_subj_code, scrlevl_crse_numb) c3
                            ON c3.scrlevl_subj_code = c1.scbcrse_subj_code
                               AND c3.scrlevl_crse_numb = c1.scbcrse_crse_numb
                      WHERE c1.scbcrse_eff_term IN
                               (SELECT MAX (c2.scbcrse_eff_term)
                                  FROM scbcrse c2
                                 WHERE c2.scbcrse_eff_term <= '&TERM'
                                       AND c1.scbcrse_subj_code =
                                              c2.scbcrse_subj_code
                                       AND c1.scbcrse_crse_numb =
                                              c2.scbcrse_crse_numb)) t2
            ON t1.ssbsect_subj_code = t2.scbcrse_subj_code
               AND t1.ssbsect_crse_numb = t2.scbcrse_crse_numb
         INNER JOIN sfrstcr t12
            ON t1.ssbsect_crn = t12.sfrstcr_crn
               AND t1.ssbsect_term_code = t12.sfrstcr_term_code
         LEFT OUTER JOIN ssbdesc t3
            ON t1.ssbsect_term_code = t3.ssbdesc_term_code
               AND t1.ssbsect_crn = t3.ssbdesc_crn
         LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT t1.ssrmeet_term_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_crn,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_catagory,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_begin_time,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_end_time,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_bldg_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_room_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_sun_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_mon_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_tue_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_wed_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_thu_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_fri_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_sat_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_schd_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_credit_hr_sess,
                                 t2.sirasgn_term_code,
                                 t2.sirasgn_crn,
                                 t2.sirasgn_category,
                                 t2.instpidm1,
                                 t2.instname1,
                                 t2.instpidm2,
                                 t2.instname2
                            FROM saturn.ssrmeet t1
                                 LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                    ( SELECT t1.sirasgn_term_code,
                                              t1.sirasgn_crn,
                                              t1.sirasgn_category,
                                              t1.sirasgn_pidm instpidm1,
                                              t1.instname instname1,
                                              t2.sirasgn_pidm instpidm2,
                                              t2.instname instname2
                                         FROM (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                                         sirasgn_crn,
                                                         sirasgn_category,
                                                         sirasgn_pidm,
                                                         (SELECT spriden_last_name
                                                                 || ', '
                                                                 || spriden_first_name
                                                                 || (CASE
                                                                        WHEN spriden_mi
                                                                                IS NULL
                                                                        THEN
                                                                           ''
                                                                        ELSE
                                                                           ' '
                                                                           || SUBSTR (
                                                                                 spriden_mi,
                                                                                 1,
                                                                                 1)
                                                                           || '.'
                                                                     END)
                                                            FROM spriden
                                                           WHERE spriden_pidm =
                                                                    sirasgn_pidm
                                                                 AND spriden_change_ind
                                                                        IS NULL)
                                                            instname
                                                    FROM sirasgn) t1
                                              LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                                 (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                                         sirasgn_crn,
                                                         sirasgn_category,
                                                         sirasgn_pidm,
                                                         (SELECT spriden_last_name
                                                                 || ', '
                                                                 || spriden_first_name
                                                                 || (CASE
                                                                        WHEN spriden_mi
                                                                                IS NULL
                                                                        THEN
                                                                           ''
                                                                        ELSE
                                                                           ' '
                                                                           || SUBSTR (
                                                                                 spriden_mi,
                                                                                 1,
                                                                                 1)
                                                                           || '.'
                                                                     END)
                                                            FROM spriden
                                                           WHERE spriden_pidm =
                                                                    sirasgn_pidm
                                                                 AND spriden_change_ind
                                                                        IS NULL)
                                                            instname
                                                    FROM sirasgn) t2
                                              ON t1.sirasgn_term_code =
                                                    t2.sirasgn_term_code
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_crn =
                                                        t2.sirasgn_crn
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_category =
                                                        t2.sirasgn_category
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_pidm <>
                                                        t2.sirasgn_pidm
                                     GROUP BY t1.sirasgn_term_code,
                                              t1.sirasgn_crn,
                                              t1.sirasgn_category,
                                              t1.sirasgn_pidm,
                                              t1.instname,
                                              t2.sirasgn_pidm,
                                              t2.instname
                                       HAVING (t1.instname < t2.instname)
                                              OR (t2.instname IS NULL)) t2
                                 ON t2.sirasgn_term_code = t1.ssrmeet_term_code
                                    AND t2.sirasgn_crn = t1.ssrmeet_crn
                                    AND t2.sirasgn_category =
                                           t1.ssrmeet_catagory
                          UNION
                          SELECT t2.sirasgn_term_code,
                                 t2.sirasgn_crn,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_catagory,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_begin_time,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_end_time,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_bldg_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_room_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_sun_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_mon_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_tue_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_wed_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_thu_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_fri_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_sat_day,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_schd_code,
                                 t1.ssrmeet_credit_hr_sess,
                                 t2.sirasgn_term_code,
                                 t2.sirasgn_crn,
                                 t2.sirasgn_category,
                                 t2.instpidm1,
                                 t2.instname1,
                                 t2.instpidm2,
                                 t2.instname2
                            FROM ( SELECT t1.sirasgn_term_code,
                                              t1.sirasgn_crn,
                                              t1.sirasgn_category,
                                              t1.sirasgn_pidm instpidm1,
                                              t1.instname instname1,
                                              t2.sirasgn_pidm instpidm2,
                                              t2.instname instname2
                                         FROM (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                                         sirasgn_crn,
                                                         sirasgn_category,
                                                         sirasgn_pidm,
                                                         (SELECT spriden_last_name
                                                                 || ', '
                                                                 || spriden_first_name
                                                                 || (CASE
                                                                        WHEN spriden_mi
                                                                                IS NULL
                                                                        THEN
                                                                           ''
                                                                        ELSE
                                                                           ' '
                                                                           || SUBSTR (
                                                                                 spriden_mi,
                                                                                 1,
                                                                                 1)
                                                                           || '.'
                                                                     END)
                                                            FROM spriden
                                                           WHERE spriden_pidm =
                                                                    sirasgn_pidm
                                                                 AND spriden_change_ind
                                                                        IS NULL)
                                                            instname
                                                    FROM sirasgn) t1
                                              LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                                 (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                                         sirasgn_crn,
                                                         sirasgn_category,
                                                         sirasgn_pidm,
                                                         (SELECT spriden_last_name
                                                                 || ', '
                                                                 || spriden_first_name
                                                                 || (CASE
                                                                        WHEN spriden_mi
                                                                                IS NULL
                                                                        THEN
                                                                           ''
                                                                        ELSE
                                                                           ' '
                                                                           || SUBSTR (
                                                                                 spriden_mi,
                                                                                 1,
                                                                                 1)
                                                                           || '.'
                                                                     END)
                                                            FROM spriden
                                                           WHERE spriden_pidm =
                                                                    sirasgn_pidm
                                                                 AND spriden_change_ind
                                                                        IS NULL)
                                                            instname
                                                    FROM sirasgn) t2
                                              ON t1.sirasgn_term_code =
                                                    t2.sirasgn_term_code
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_crn =
                                                        t2.sirasgn_crn
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_category =
                                                        t2.sirasgn_category
                                                 AND t1.sirasgn_pidm <>
                                                        t2.sirasgn_pidm
                                     GROUP BY t1.sirasgn_term_code,
                                              t1.sirasgn_crn,
                                              t1.sirasgn_category,
                                              t1.sirasgn_pidm,
                                              t1.instname,
                                              t2.sirasgn_pidm,
                                              t2.instname
                                       HAVING (t1.instname < t2.instname)
                                              OR (t2.instname IS NULL)) t2
                                 LEFT OUTER JOIN
                                    saturn.ssrmeet t1
                                 ON t2.sirasgn_term_code = t1.ssrmeet_term_code
                                    AND t2.sirasgn_crn = t1.ssrmeet_crn
                                    AND t2.sirasgn_category =
                                           t1.ssrmeet_catagory) t11
            ON t1.ssbsect_term_code = t11.ssrmeet_term_code
               AND t1.ssbsect_crn = t11.ssrmeet_crn
   WHERE t12.sfrstcr_rsts_code IN (SELECT stvrsts_code
                                     FROM stvrsts
                                    WHERE stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
         AND t12.sfrstcr_pidm in (&SZVWHR)
   AND t12.sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
ORDER BY sfrstcr_pidm, ssbsect_crn, ssbsect_term_code;
END
-*APP HOLD BAN_STU
-*-RUN

TABLE FILE CRSLSTSQL

BY SFRSTCR_PIDM NOPRINT

-*DEFINE FILE FOCCACHE/RT301

MEASLES /A1 = IF GORIMMU_PIDM IS MISSING THEN 'N' ELSE
              IF TMPMEAS EQ 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT OPEN

$

$

 ON TABLE SAVE

                        MENG EQ 'Y' OR RMEDICAL EQ 'Y' OR RRELIGIOUS EQ 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No';
   V_BUILDROOM/A8 = BUILDING||ROOM;
   V_TIMES1/A7 = SUBSTR(17, TIMES, 1, 7, 7, V_TIMES1);
   V_TIMES2/A7 = SUBSTR(17, TIMES, 11, 17, 7, V_TIMES2);
   ST_NAME/A43 = SUBSTR(240, SZVACUR_LAST_NAME, 1, 25, 25, 'A25') || (', ' | SUBSTR(240, SZVACUR_FIRST_NAME, 1, 15, 15, 'A15'));

TYPE=REPORT,

$
TYPE=TITLE,

$

name: freshman-project-report
overview:
The Freshman Project Report is used by the Enrollment Group as part of the Freshman Registration process. The report contains the Group Code, Student ID, Student PIDM, Student Name,College, College Description, Major Code, Major Description and Student Attributes.

The User selects the Curricula Effective Term, the Name of the POPSEL file and Attributes. They also selects the Output Format of the report.

acf.overview:
The Freshman Project Report is used by the Enrollment Group as part of the Freshman Registration process. The report contains the Group Code, Student ID, Student PIDM, Student Name,College, College Description, Major Code, Major Description and Student Attributes.

The User selects the Curricula Effective Term, the Name of the POPSEL file and Attributes. They also selects the Output Format of the report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_fr_project_rpt.fex
-*************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2012 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*************************************************************************
-* Program: stu_fr_project_rpt.fex
-* Author: Ellucian - TF
-* Date: 07/20/2012
-* Description: Freshman Project Report
-* Called By: stu_fr_project_rpt.htm
-* Output: EXCEL
-*************************************************************************
-* Tables: Many
-*************************************************************************
-* -Include(s):
-*************************************************************************
-*************************************************************************
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description of Change(s) - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------
-* 20120720 TJF PROD
-*************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-***************************
-*'FCRH_FR_SURVEY',
-*'FCRH_HONORS_FR_SURV',
-*'CBA_FR_SURVEY',
-*'FCLC_FR_SURVEY'
-*TABLE FILE SGRSATT
-*PRINT DST.SGRSATT_ATTS_CODE
-*WHERE SGRSATT_ATTS_CODE LIKE 'FR%';
-*END
-*-EXIT
-SET &ECHO = ALL;
-DEFAULTS &TERM = '201510', &SURVEY = '''CBA_LC_SURVEY''', &ATTRIBUTE = '''AUNE''', &FMT = 'EXL2K'
-*-SET &QT = '''';
-*-*-SET &ATTRIBUTE = &QT | 'AUNE' | &QT | ' OR ' | &QT | 'FRQC' | &QT;
-*-*-SET &ATTRIBUTE = &QT | 'AUNE' | &QT ;
-*-SET &SURVEY = '''FCRH_FR_SURVEY''' | ',' | '''FCRH_HONORS_FR_SURV''' | ',' | '''CBA_FR_SURVEY''';
-SET &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-SET &XSURVEY = IF &SURVEY CONTAINS ' OR ' THEN STRREP(&SURVEY.LENGTH, &SURVEY, 4, ' OR ', 1 , ',', &SURVEY.LENGTH, 'A&SURVEY.LENGTH') ELSE &SURVEY;
-SET &ATTRIBUTE = IF &ATTRIBUTE CONTAINS 'ALL' THEN 'FOC_NONE' ELSE &ATTRIBUTE;
-TYPE &ATTRIBUTE

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUTX FOR
SELECT
       spriden_id,
       spriden_pidm,
       spriden_last_name,
       spriden_first_name,
       sgb.sgbstdn_coll_code_1,
       sgb.stvcoll_desc,
       sgb.sgbstdn_majr_code_1,
       sgb.stvmajr_desc,
       szkc003.f_get_student_group (spriden_pidm, '&TERM') placement_group,
       attribute1,
       attribute2,
       attribute3,
       attribute4,
       attribute5,
       attribute6,
       attribute7,
       attribute8,
       attribute9,
       attribute10,
       attribute11,
       attribute12,
       attribute13,
       attribute14
  FROM spriden
       LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT t1.sgbstdn_pidm,
                               t1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1,
                               t1.sgbstdn_majr_code_1,
                               stvcoll_desc,
                               stvmajr_desc
                          FROM sgbstdn t1
       LEFT OUTER JOIN stvcoll
                    ON stvcoll_code = t1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1
       LEFT OUTER JOIN stvmajr
                    ON stvmajr_code = t1.sgbstdn_majr_code_1
                         WHERE t1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                   (SELECT MAX (t2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                                         FROM sgbstdn t2
                                        WHERE t1.sgbstdn_pidm = t2.sgbstdn_pidm
                                          AND t2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                                          AND t1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS') sgb
                                           ON sgb.sgbstdn_pidm = spriden_pidm
       LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT spc3.sgrsatt_pidm,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 1 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute1,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 2 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute2,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 3 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute3,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 4 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute4,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 5 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute5,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 6 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute6,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 7 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute7,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 8 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute8,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 9 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute9,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 10 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute10,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 11 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute11,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 12 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute12,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 13 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute13,
                                 MAX (CASE WHEN rnk = 14 THEN spc3.sgrsatt_atts_code ELSE NULL END) attribute14
               FROM (SELECT
                      sgrsatt_pidm,
                      sgrsatt_atts_code,
                       RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY sgrsatt_pidm
                       ORDER BY sgrsatt_atts_code) rnk
               FROM (SELECT
                      sgrsatt_pidm,
                      sgrsatt_atts_code
                        FROM sgrsatt b
                          WHERE sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                           (SELECT MAX (sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                              FROM sgrsatt a
                             WHERE a.sgrsatt_pidm = b.sgrsatt_pidm
                               AND a.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                               AND (sgrsatt_atts_code LIKE 'FR%'
                                OR sgrsatt_atts_code IN ('ACHN','ALHN','ARHN','ARQC','AU32','AUDN','AUEL','AUFP','AUHE',
                                                         'AUHL','AUHS','AUMD','AUMR','AUNE','AUPL','AUTC','AUVT','AUMR')))) spc3
                          GROUP BY spc3.sgrsatt_pidm) spc4
               ON spriden_pidm = spc4.sgrsatt_pidm
WHERE spriden_change_ind IS NULL
-* AND sgb.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL'
         AND EXISTS
            (SELECT 'x'
               FROM glbextr
              WHERE glbextr_selection IN (&XSURVEY)
                AND glbextr_key = sgb.sgbstdn_pidm)
         AND EXISTS
            (SELECT sgrsatt_pidm
               FROM sgrsatt b
              WHERE sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                  (SELECT MAX (sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                      FROM sgrsatt a
                     WHERE a.sgrsatt_pidm = b.sgrsatt_pidm
                       AND a.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                AND spriden_pidm = sgrsatt_pidm)
;
END

-SET &CNTR = 1;
-SET &COL_NAME = '';
DEFINE FILE SQLOUTX
  SZVGROP_CODE/A25V = PLACEMENT_GROUP;
  ATTR1/A4 = ATTRIBUTE1;
  ATTR2/A4 = ATTRIBUTE2;
  ATTR3/A4 = ATTRIBUTE3;
  ATTR4/A4 = ATTRIBUTE4;
  ATTR5/A4 = ATTRIBUTE5;
  ATTR6/A4 = ATTRIBUTE6;
  ATTR7/A4 = ATTRIBUTE7;
  ATTR8/A4 = ATTRIBUTE8;
  ATTR9/A4 = ATTRIBUTE9;
  ATTR10/A4 = ATTRIBUTE10;
  ATTR11/A4 = ATTRIBUTE11;
  ATTR12/A4 = ATTRIBUTE12;
  ATTR13/A4 = ATTRIBUTE13;
  ATTR14/A4 = ATTRIBUTE14;
  ALL_ATTR/A56 = ATTR1 || ATTR2 ||ATTR3 || ATTR4 || ATTR5 || ATTR6 || ATTR7 ||
                 ATTR8 || ATTR9 ||ATTR10 || ATTR11 || ATTR12 || ATTR13 || ATTR14;
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUTX
PRINT
  SZVGROP_CODE
  SPRIDEN_ID
  SPRIDEN_PIDM
  SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
  SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
  SGBSTDN_COLL_CODE_1

  ATTRIBUTE3
  ATTRIBUTE4

  ATTRIBUTE6
  ATTRIBUTE7
  ATTRIBUTE8
  ATTRIBUTE9
  ATTRIBUTE10
  ATTRIBUTE11
  ATTRIBUTE12
  ATTRIBUTE13
  ATTRIBUTE14
  BY SZVGROP_CODE NOPRINT
  BY SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
-IF &ATTRIBUTE EQ 'FOC_NONE' OR 'ALL' GOTO ATTR_FILTER;
WHERE ATTRIBUTE1 EQ &ATTRIBUTE
-REPEAT ATTR_FILTER 13 TIMES
-SET &ATTR_FILTER = IF &CNTR EQ 13 THEN &ATTRIBUTE || ';' ELSE &ATTRIBUTE;
-SET &CNTR = &CNTR + 1;
-SET &COL_NAME = 'ATTRIBUTE' || &CNTR;
  OR &COL_NAME.EVAL EQ &ATTR_FILTER
-ATTR_FILTER
-DO_HOLD
-* ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD1
ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD1
-*FORMAT FOCUS INDEX SZVGROP_CODE
END
-RUN
-**************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-**************************************************
MATCH FILE XHOLD1

  SPRIDEN_ID
  SPRIDEN_PIDM
  SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
  SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME

  ATTRIBUTE6

  ATTRIBUTE8

  ATTRIBUTE10
  ATTRIBUTE11
  ATTRIBUTE12
  ATTRIBUTE13
  ATTRIBUTE14
 BY SZVGROP_CODE NOPRINT
RUN
FILE SZVGROP
PRINT
    SZVGROP_DESC
 BY SZVGROP_CODE
 AFTER MATCH HOLD AS XHOLD1A OLD
END
-RUN
TABLE FILE XHOLD1A PRINT *
     COMPUTE X_DESC/A60 = IF SZVGROP_DESC NE '' THEN SZVGROP_DESC ELSE LAST X_DESC;
  ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD2
END
-RUN
-GOTO NEXT_STEP

-DO_JOIN
-**************************************************
JOIN SZVGROP_CODE IN SZVGROP TO ALL SZVGROP_CODE IN XHOLD1 AS J1
-RUN
-**************************************************
-*-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-**************************************************
TABLE FILE SZVGROP
PRINT
    SZVGROP_CODE
    SZVGROP_DESC
    SPRIDEN_ID
    SPRIDEN_PIDM
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
    SGBSTDN_COLL_CODE_1
    STVCOLL_DESC
    SGBSTDN_MAJR_CODE_1
    STVMAJR_DESC

    ATTRIBUTE12
    ATTRIBUTE13
    ATTRIBUTE14
  BY SPRIDEN_PIDM NOPRINT
 ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD2

-RUN
-NEXT_STEP
TABLE FILE XHOLD2
PRINT
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME AS 'Student Last Name'
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME AS 'Student First Name'

  BY SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME NOPRINT

-*WHERE SGBSTDN_COLL_CODE_1 NE 'XX';
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLSKIP;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
-GOTO OTHERSKIP
-EXLSKIP
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-OTHERSKIP

-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLS;

SUM

WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1;

name: english-rule-analysis-report
overview:
The English Rule Analysis Report provides a detail analysis of the S07, A01 and A07 Scores for entering freshmen students in Fordham College (Rose Hill-FC) and Gabelli School of Business (CB). It gives individual Tabs that includes a complete Distribution Analysis including Average S07 Score with a Standard Deviation, a Histogram of each score (S07, A07, A01) and a Detail Tab which includes the Students FIDN, Name and Scores for each School.

The User can select the TERM, and CAMPUS as Parameters for the report.

acf.overview:
The English Rule Analysis Report provides a detail analysis of the S07, A01 and A07 Scores for entering freshmen students in Fordham College (Rose Hill-FC) and Gabelli School of Business (CB). It gives individual Tabs that includes a complete Distribution Analysis including Average S07 Score with a Standard Deviation, a Histogram of each score (S07, A07, A01) and a Detail Tab which includes the Students FIDN, Name and Scores for each School.

The User can select the TERM, and CAMPUS as Parameters for the report.

sql.sql_code:
-**************************************
-* File stu_frenglrule.fex
-* 2013-07-24 TJF Added Test Score A01
-* 2014-05-08 TJF Added Campus as Main selection
-*********************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*********************************************************
-SET &ECHO = ALL;
-DEFAULTS &TERM = '201510', &CAMP = 'R'
-SET &CNT = 1;
-REPEAT LOOP1 2 TIMES;
-SET &POPSEL = IF &CAMP EQ 'R' AND &CNT EQ 1 THEN '(''FCRH_FR_SURVEY'',''FCRH_HONORS_FR_SURV'')' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'R' AND &CNT EQ 2 THEN '(''CBA_FR_SURVEY'')' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'L' AND &CNT EQ 1 THEN '(''CBA_LC_SURVEY'')' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'L' AND &CNT EQ 2 THEN '(''FCLC_FR_SURVEY'')' ELSE '';
-SET &ATTS = IF &CAMP EQ 'R' THEN '(''ARHN'',''AUMR'',''FRMN'',''AUNE'')' ELSE '(''FRMN'', ''AUMR'',''AUNE'')';
-SET &COLL = IF &CAMP EQ 'R' AND &CNT EQ 1 THEN 'FC' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'R' AND &CNT EQ 2 THEN 'CB' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'L' AND &CNT EQ 1 THEN 'CB' ELSE
- IF &CAMP EQ 'L' AND &CNT EQ 2 THEN 'CL' ELSE '';
-SET &COLL_TXT = IF &CAMP EQ 'R' THEN 'FC'|| ',' || 'CB' ELSE 'CL' || ',' || 'CB';
-SET &OPEN = IF &CNT EQ 1 THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '';
-TYPE &COLL_TXT
-TYPE &COLL
-*********************************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT FOR
SELECT
       s07_avg,
       s07_stddev,
       devblock,
       numbers,
       (CASE
           WHEN devblock < 0 THEN s07_avg + (s07_stddev * devblock)
           ELSE s07_avg + (s07_stddev * (devblock - 1))
        END)
          lowerrange,
       s07_avg + (s07_stddev * (devblock + 1)) upperrange
  FROM ( SELECT
                 s07_avg,
                 s07_stddev,
                 (CASE
                     WHEN s07 IS NULL
                     THEN
                        NULL
                     ELSE
                        (CASE
                            WHEN s07 < s07_avg
                            THEN FLOOR ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                            ELSE CEIL ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                         END)
                  END)
                    devblock,
                 COUNT (*) numbers
            FROM sgbstdn s1
                 INNER JOIN spriden p1
                    ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
                 INNER JOIN (SELECT AVG (s07) s07_avg,
                                    STDDEV (s07) s07_stddev,
                                    MAX (s07),
                                    MIN (s07)
                               FROM sgbstdn s1
                                    INNER JOIN spriden p1
                                       ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
                                    LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                                              MAX (
                                                                 CASE
                                                                    WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                                                    THEN sortest_test_score
                                                                    ELSE NULL
                                                                 END) s07
                                                         FROM sortest
                                                        WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('S07')
                                                     GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
                                       ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
                              WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                                 (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                                      FROM sgbstdn s2
                                             WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                                               AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                                AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                                AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
           AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                                AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                                AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
                                   AND EXISTS
                                           (SELECT 'x'
                                              FROM glbextr
                                                WHERE glbextr_selection IN &POPSEL.EVAL
                                                  AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)) stats
                    ON 1 = 1
                 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                           MAX (CASE
                                                 WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                                 THEN sortest_test_score
                                                 ELSE NULL
                                              END) s07
                                      FROM sortest
                                     WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('S07')
                                    GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
                               ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
           WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                        (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                           FROM sgbstdn s2
                          WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                            AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                            AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                            AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                            AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
                            AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
                 AND EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           FROM glbextr
                          WHERE glbextr_selection IN &POPSEL.EVAL
                            AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           from stvrsts, sfrstcr
                          WHERE sfrstcr_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
                            AND sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
                            AND stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                            (SELECT 'x'
                               FROM sgrsatt a1
                              WHERE a1.sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                                           (SELECT MAX (a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                                              FROM sgrsatt a2
                                             WHERE a1.sgrsatt_pidm = a2.sgrsatt_pidm
                                               AND a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                                               AND a1.sgrsatt_atts_code IN &ATTS.EVAL
                                               AND a1.sgrsatt_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
        GROUP BY s07_avg,
                 s07_stddev,
                 (CASE
                     WHEN s07 IS NULL
                     THEN
                        NULL
                     ELSE
                        (CASE
                            WHEN s07 < s07_avg
                            THEN
                               FLOOR ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                            ELSE
                               CEIL ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                         END)
                  END)
        ORDER BY s07_avg,
                 s07_stddev,
                 (CASE
                     WHEN s07 IS NULL
                     THEN
                        NULL
                     ELSE
                        (CASE
                            WHEN s07 < s07_avg
                            THEN
                               FLOOR ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                            ELSE
                               CEIL ( (s07 - s07_avg) / s07_stddev)
                         END)
                  END));
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT
DEVBLOCK AS 'STANDARD DEVIATION'
NUMBERS AS 'COUNTS'
LOWERRANGE AS 'STDDEV LOWER RANGE'
UPPERRANGE AS 'STDDEV UPPER RANGE'
FOOTING
"AVERAGE S07 SCORE = <S07_AVG"
"STDDEV = <S07_STDDEV"
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K &OPEN
ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ANSI
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=PORTRAIT,
     TITLETEXT = '&COLL - DistributionAnalysis',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=TITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABHEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABFOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=HEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=FOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBHEAD,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBFOOT,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE,
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=GRANDTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT3 FOR
SELECT s07, COUNT (*) NUMBERS
    FROM sgbstdn s1
         INNER JOIN spriden p1
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a07,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      s07
                              FROM sortest
                             WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('A07', 'S07')
                          GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
   WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                   FROM sgbstdn s2
                  WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                    AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
                    AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
         AND EXISTS
                (SELECT 'x'
                   FROM glbextr
                  WHERE glbextr_selection IN
                              &POPSEL.EVAL
                        AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           from stvrsts, sfrstcr
                          WHERE sfrstcr_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
                            AND sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
                            AND stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
         AND NOT EXISTS
                    (SELECT 'x'
                       FROM sgrsatt a1
                      WHERE a1.sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                                   (SELECT MAX (a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                                      FROM sgrsatt a2
                                     WHERE a1.sgrsatt_pidm = a2.sgrsatt_pidm
                                       AND a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_atts_code IN &ATTS.EVAL
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
GROUP BY s07
ORDER BY s07
;
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT3
PRINT
S07 AS 'SCORE'
NUMBERS AS 'COUNT'
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ANSI
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=PORTRAIT,
  TITLETEXT = '&COLL - S07HISTOGRAM',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=TITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABHEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABFOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=HEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=FOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBHEAD,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBFOOT,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE,
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=GRANDTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN


ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT2 FOR
  SELECT a07, COUNT (*) NUMBERS
    FROM sgbstdn s1
         INNER JOIN spriden p1
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a07,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      s07
                              FROM sortest
                             WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('A07', 'S07')
                          GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
   WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                   FROM sgbstdn s2
                  WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                    AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
                    AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
         AND EXISTS
                (SELECT 'x'
                   FROM glbextr
                  WHERE glbextr_selection IN
                            &POPSEL.EVAL
                        AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           from stvrsts, sfrstcr
                          WHERE sfrstcr_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
                            AND sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
                            AND stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
         AND NOT EXISTS
                    (SELECT 'x'
                       FROM sgrsatt a1
                      WHERE a1.sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                                   (SELECT MAX (a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                                      FROM sgrsatt a2
                                     WHERE a1.sgrsatt_pidm = a2.sgrsatt_pidm
                                           AND a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <=
                                                  '&TERM')
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_atts_code IN
                                  &ATTS.EVAL
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
         AND s07 IS NULL
GROUP BY a07
ORDER BY a07
;
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT2
PRINT
A07 AS 'SCORE'
NUMBERS AS 'COUNT'
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ANSI
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=PORTRAIT,
  TITLETEXT = '&COLL - A07HISTOGRAM',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT2A FOR
  SELECT a01, COUNT (*) NUMBERS
    FROM sgbstdn s1
         INNER JOIN spriden p1
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a07,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A01'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a01,

                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      s07
                              FROM sortest
                             WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('A07', 'S07', 'A01')
                          GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
   WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                   FROM sgbstdn s2
                  WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                    AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
                    AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
         AND EXISTS
                (SELECT 'x'
                   FROM glbextr
                  WHERE glbextr_selection IN
                            &POPSEL.EVAL
                        AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           from stvrsts, sfrstcr
                          WHERE sfrstcr_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
                            AND sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
                            AND stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
         AND NOT EXISTS
                    (SELECT 'x'
                       FROM sgrsatt a1
                      WHERE a1.sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                                   (SELECT MAX (a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                                      FROM sgrsatt a2
                                     WHERE a1.sgrsatt_pidm =
                                                  a2.sgrsatt_pidm
                                           AND a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_atts_code IN &ATTS.EVAL
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
         AND s07 IS NULL
   AND a07 IS NULL
GROUP BY a01
ORDER BY a01
;
END

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT4 FOR
SELECT
         spriden_id,
         spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ' || SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) stuname,
         s07,
         a07,
   a01
FROM sgbstdn s1
         INNER JOIN spriden p1
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = p1.spriden_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT sortest_pidm,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a07,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'A01'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      a01,

                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN sortest_tesc_code = 'S07'
                                         THEN
                                            sortest_test_score
                                         ELSE
                                            NULL
                                      END)
                                      s07
                              FROM sortest
                             WHERE sortest_tesc_code IN ('A07', 'S07', 'A01')
                          GROUP BY sortest_pidm) tests
            ON s1.sgbstdn_pidm = tests.sortest_pidm
   WHERE s1.sgbstdn_term_code_eff =
                (SELECT MAX (s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff)
                   FROM sgbstdn s2
                  WHERE s1.sgbstdn_pidm = s2.sgbstdn_pidm
                    AND s2.sgbstdn_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = '&COLL.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_CAMP_code = '&CAMP.EVAL'
                    AND s1.sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
                    AND p1.spriden_change_ind IS NULL
         AND EXISTS
                (SELECT 'x'
                   FROM glbextr
                  WHERE glbextr_selection IN
                              &POPSEL.EVAL
                        AND glbextr_key = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
                 AND NOT EXISTS
                        (SELECT 'x'
                           from stvrsts, sfrstcr
                          WHERE sfrstcr_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm
                            AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM'
                            AND sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
                            AND stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
         AND NOT EXISTS
                    (SELECT 'x'
                       FROM sgrsatt a1
                      WHERE a1.sgrsatt_term_code_eff =
                                   (SELECT MAX (a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff)
                                      FROM sgrsatt a2
                                     WHERE a1.sgrsatt_pidm = a2.sgrsatt_pidm
                                       AND a2.sgrsatt_term_code_eff <= '&TERM')
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_atts_code IN &ATTS.EVAL
                            AND a1.sgrsatt_pidm = s1.sgbstdn_pidm)
ORDER BY spriden_id
;
END

name: course-catalog
overview: The Course Catalog provides a list of the courses offered within a certain timeframe. The information is determined based on the latest information as of the TO TERM parameter value. Only courses offered within Fordham College (Rose Hill), Fordham College (Lincoln Center), Fordham College of Liberal Studies and the Gabelli School of Business are shown for the Undergraduate selection. The report contains the Department, Subject, Course Number, Credit Hours,  Course Title and Course Description.

acf.overview: The Course Catalog provides a list of the courses offered within a certain timeframe. The information is determined based on the latest information as of the TO TERM parameter value. Only courses offered within Fordham College (Rose Hill), Fordham College (Lincoln Center), Fordham College of Liberal Studies and the Gabelli School of Business are shown for the Undergraduate selection. The report contains the Department, Subject, Course Number, Credit Hours,  Course Title and Course Description.

sql.sql_code:
-* File cata.fex
-*APP PATH BAN_STU
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-*LET EXL07 = EXL2K
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-***********************************************

-SET &ECHO = ALL;
-RUN
-DEFAULT &FROMTERM = '201420';
-DEFAULT &TOTERM = '201620';
-DEFAULT &SCHOL = 'L';
-DEFAULT &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-DEFAULT &SCHD = 'Y';
-DEFAULTS &FMT = 'EXL2K';
-SET &CMTCOONEY = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'U' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTLAW = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'L' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTGA = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'A' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTGE = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'E' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTGR = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'R' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTGS = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'S' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTGB = IF '&SCHOL.EVAL' EQ 'B' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &CMTSCHD = IF '&SCHD.EVAL' EQ 'Y' THEN '' ELSE '-*';

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT FOR
  SELECT DISTINCT
           t1.scbcrse_dept_code,
           t1.scbcrse_subj_code,
           t1.scbcrse_crse_numb,
           t1.scbcrse_coll_code,
&CMTSCHD.EVAL t5.scrschd_schd_code,
           t1.scbcrse_credit_hr_low,
           t1.scbcrse_title,
           CAST (
              SUBSTR (t3.scbdesc_text_narrative, 1, 3000) AS VARCHAR2 (3000)
           )
              AS scbdesc_text_narrative
    FROM scbcrse t1
              LEFT OUTER JOIN
                 scbdesc t3
              ON t1.scbcrse_subj_code = t3.scbdesc_subj_code
                 AND t1.scbcrse_crse_numb = t3.scbdesc_crse_numb
&CMTSCHD.EVAL LEFT OUTER JOIN
&CMTSCHD.EVAL scrschd t5
&CMTSCHD.EVAL ON t1.scbcrse_crse_numb = t5.scrschd_crse_numb
&CMTSCHD.EVAL AND t1.scbcrse_subj_code = t5.scrschd_subj_code
   WHERE t1.scbcrse_eff_term =
              (SELECT MAX (t2.scbcrse_eff_term)
                 FROM scbcrse t2
                WHERE t2.scbcrse_eff_term <= '&TOTERM'
                        AND t1.scbcrse_crse_numb = t2.scbcrse_crse_numb
                        AND t1.scbcrse_subj_code = t2.scbcrse_subj_code)
           AND T3.SCBDESC_TERM_CODE_EFF =
                 (SELECT MAX (t4.scbdesc_term_code_eff)
                    FROM scbdesc t4
                   WHERE t4.scbdesc_term_code_eff <= '&TOTERM'
                           AND t1.scbcrse_crse_numb = t4.scbdesc_crse_numb
                           AND t1.scbcrse_subj_code = t4.scbdesc_subj_code)
           AND EXISTS
                 (SELECT DISTINCT ssbsect_subj_code || ssbsect_crse_numb
                    FROM ssbsect
                   WHERE ssbsect_term_code IN
                                 (SELECT STVTERM_CODE
                                    FROM STVTERM
                                   WHERE STVTERM_CODE BETWEEN '&FROMTERM'
                                                            AND '&TOTERM')
                           AND t1.scbcrse_subj_code = ssbsect_subj_code
                           AND t1.scbcrse_crse_numb = ssbsect_crse_numb
&CMTCOONEY.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code IN ('FC','CL','LS','CB')
&CMTLAW.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GL'
&CMTGA.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GA'
&CMTGE.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GE'
&CMTGR.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GR'
&CMTGS.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GS'
&CMTGB.EVAL AND ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'GB'
         )
&CMTSCHD.EVAL AND t5.scrschd_eff_term =
&CMTSCHD.EVAL (SELECT MAX (scrschd_eff_term)
&CMTSCHD.EVAL FROM scrschd s2
&CMTSCHD.EVAL WHERE t5.scrschd_subj_code = s2.scrschd_subj_code
&CMTSCHD.EVAL AND t5.scrschd_crse_numb = s2.scrschd_crse_numb
&CMTSCHD.EVAL AND s2.scrschd_eff_term <= '&TOTERM')
ORDER BY t1.scbcrse_dept_code, t1.scbcrse_subj_code, t1.scbcrse_crse_numb;
END

DEFINE FILE SQLOUT
-* DESC/TX50 = SCBDESC_TEXT_NARRATIVE;
  DESC /A2000 = SUBSTR(3000,SCBDESC_TEXT_NARRATIVE, 1, 2000, 2000, 'A2000');
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT
     SCBCRSE_DEPT_CODE AS 'DEPARTMENT'
     SCBCRSE_SUBJ_CODE AS 'SUBJECT'
     SCBCRSE_CRSE_NUMB AS 'CRSE NUM'
&CMTSCHD.EVAL SCRSCHD_SCHD_CODE AS 'SCHD CODE'
     SCBCRSE_TITLE AS 'TITLE'
     SCBCRSE_CREDIT_HR_LOW AS 'CREDIT'
     DESC AS 'CRS DESC'
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT OPEN
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=PORTRAIT,
  TITLETEXT='Course Catalog',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=TITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABHEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=TABFOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=HEADING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=FOOTING,
     SIZE=12,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBHEAD,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBFOOT,
     SIZE=10,
     STYLE=BOLD,
$
TYPE=SUBTOTAL,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(210 210 210),
$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE,
     SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD,
