name: advisor-check-report
overview:
The Advisor Check Report assigns a Primary advisor to the freshman population from the FreshReg Process by the Enrollment Group and provides information as a checklist for whether the student is missing courses, or advisors or both. It also contains the student FIDN and Name,  the courses the student is enrolled in along with the Instructor FIDN and Name.

The User inputs the TERM parameter and selects the Output format.

acf.overview:
The Advisor Check Report assigns a Primary advisor to the freshman population from the FreshReg Process by the Enrollment Group and provides information as a checklist for whether the student is missing courses, or advisors or both. It also contains the student FIDN and Name,  the courses the student is enrolled in along with the Instructor FIDN and Name.

The User inputs the TERM parameter and selects the Output format.

sql.sql_code:
-************************************************************************************
-* File ST_FRADVR.fex: Assigns Primary advisor to the freshman population from
-* freshreg process. - Khine sep17,09
-*************************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-***********************************************************************************
-DEFAULT &FMT = 'EXL2K';
-SET &XLS_TAB1= 'Advisor Check Report';

-IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'HTML' OR 'AHTML' THEN GOTO GETPHM ELSE GOTO GETXLS;

-GETXLS

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT FOR
SELECT spriden_id,
         spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' '
         || (CASE
                WHEN SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) IS NULL THEN ''
                ELSE SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) || '.'
             END)
            stuname,
         sfrstcr_pidm,
         sfrstcr_crn,
         courseid,
         f1.instid,
         f1.instpidm,
         f1.instname,
         sgradvr_pidm,
         advrpidm,
         advrid,
         advrname,
         (CASE WHEN sfrstcr_crn IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) missingcrs,
         (CASE
             WHEN NVL (instpidm, '00000') <> NVL (advrpidm, '00000') THEN 'Y'
             ELSE 'N'
          END)
            instadvrmiss,
         (CASE WHEN advrpidm IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) advrmissing,
         (CASE
             WHEN advrpidm IS NULL AND sfrstcr_crn IS NULL THEN 'Y'
             ELSE 'N'
          END)
            missingboth
  FROM sgbstdn
               INNER JOIN
                  spriden
               ON spriden_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
            LEFT OUTER JOIN
               (SELECT sfrstcr_pidm,
                         sfrstcr_crn,
                            ssbsect_subj_code
                         || ssbsect_crse_numb
                         || ssbsect_seq_numb
                            courseid,
                         inst.instid,
                         instpidm,
                         instname
                  FROM sfrstcr
                            INNER JOIN
                               ssbsect
                            ON sfrstcr_term_code = ssbsect_term_code
                               AND sfrstcr_crn = ssbsect_crn
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                            (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                      sirasgn_crn,
                                      sirasgn_pidm instpidm,
                                      spriden_id instid,
                                         spriden_last_name
                                      || ', '
                                      || spriden_first_name
                                      || ' '
                                      || (CASE
                                             WHEN SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) IS NULL
                                             THEN
                                                ''
                                             ELSE
                                                SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1)
                                                || '.'
                                          END)
                                         instname
                               FROM sirasgn
                                      INNER JOIN
                                         spriden
                                      ON spriden_pidm = sirasgn_pidm
                              WHERE spriden_change_ind IS NULL
                                      AND sirasgn_primary_ind = 'Y') inst
                         ON sfrstcr_term_code = inst.sirasgn_term_code
                            AND sfrstcr_crn = inst.sirasgn_crn
                 WHERE sfrstcr_rsts_code IN
                               (SELECT stvrsts_code
                                  FROM stvrsts
                                 WHERE stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
                         AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM.EVAL'
                         AND ssbsect_subj_code || ssbsect_crse_numb =
                               'ZZRUADVI') f1
            ON f1.sfrstcr_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN
            (SELECT sgradvr_pidm,
                      sgradvr_advr_pidm advrpidm,
                      spriden_id advrid,
                      spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' '
                      || (CASE
                             WHEN SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) IS NULL THEN ''
                             ELSE SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) || '.'
                          END)
                         advrname
               FROM sgradvr a1
                      INNER JOIN
                         spriden
                      ON spriden_pidm = a1.sgradvr_advr_pidm
              WHERE a1.sgradvr_term_code_eff =
                         (SELECT MAX (sgradvr_term_code_eff)
                            FROM sgradvr a2
                           WHERE a1.sgradvr_pidm = a2.sgradvr_pidm
                                   AND a2.sgradvr_term_code_eff <= '&TERM.EVAL')
                      AND a1.sgradvr_prim_ind = 'Y'
                      AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL) advr
         ON sgbstdn_pidm = advr.sgradvr_pidm
 WHERE sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'
         AND sgbstdn_stst_code = 'AS'
         AND sgbstdn_levl_code = 'U'
         AND sgbstdn_term_code_eff = '&TERM.EVAL'
         AND ((sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = 'FC' and sgbstdn_coll_code_2 is null) or (sgbstdn_coll_code_1 is null and sgbstdn_coll_code_2 = 'FC'))
         AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL;
END

DEFINE FILE SQLOUT
BLNK /A01 = ' ';
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT
     SPRIDEN_ID AS 'STUDENT FIDN'
     STUNAME AS 'STUDENT NAME'
     SFRSTCR_CRN AS 'CRS. CALL#'
     COURSEID AS 'COURSE ID'
     INSTID AS 'INSTRUCTOR FIDN'
     INSTNAME AS 'INSTRUCTOR NAME'
     ADVRID AS 'ADVISOR FIDN'
     ADVRNAME AS 'ADVISOR NAME'
     MISSINGCRS AS 'MISSING COURSE'
     INSTADVRMISS AS 'INSTRUCTOR TO ADVISOR MISMATCH'
     ADVRMISSING AS 'ADVISOR MISSING'
     MISSINGBOTH AS 'MISSING BOTH COURSE AND ADVISOR'
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_XLSTAB1.FEX
END
-RUN

-*-IF &RECORDS EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;
TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT BLNK AS ' '
BY MISSINGBOTH NOPRINT
"Fordham University"
"Advisor Check Report"
"For ZZRUADVI courses only and incoming freshmen only"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"Term:<+0>&TERM_TEXT"

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE

ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN


-GOTO ENDRPT

-GETPHM

            LEFT OUTER JOIN

                            courseid,
                         inst.instid,

                         instname
                  FROM sfrstcr
                            INNER JOIN
                               ssbsect
                            ON sfrstcr_term_code = ssbsect_term_code
                               AND sfrstcr_crn = ssbsect_crn
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                            (SELECT sirasgn_term_code,
                                      sirasgn_crn,
                                      sirasgn_pidm instpidm,
                                      spriden_id instid,
                                         spriden_last_name
                                      || ', '
                                      || spriden_first_name
                                      || ' '
                                      || (CASE
                                             WHEN SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) IS NULL
                                             THEN

                                          END)
                                         instname
                               FROM sirasgn
                                      INNER JOIN

                                      ON spriden_pidm = sirasgn_pidm
                              WHERE spriden_change_ind IS NULL
                                      AND sirasgn_primary_ind = 'Y') inst
                         ON sfrstcr_term_code = inst.sirasgn_term_code
                            AND sfrstcr_crn = inst.sirasgn_crn
                 WHERE sfrstcr_rsts_code IN
                               (SELECT stvrsts_code
                                  FROM stvrsts
                                 WHERE stvrsts_gradable_ind = 'Y')
                         AND sfrstcr_term_code = '&TERM.EVAL'
                         AND ssbsect_subj_code || ssbsect_crse_numb =
                               'ZZRUADVI') f1
            ON f1.sfrstcr_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN
            (SELECT sgradvr_pidm,
                      sgradvr_advr_pidm advrpidm,
                      spriden_id advrid,
                      spriden_last_name || ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' '
                      || (CASE
                             WHEN SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) IS NULL THEN ''
                             ELSE SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1) || '.'
                          END)
                         advrname
               FROM sgradvr a1
                      INNER JOIN
                         spriden
                      ON spriden_pidm = a1.sgradvr_advr_pidm
              WHERE a1.sgradvr_term_code_eff =
                         (SELECT MAX (sgradvr_term_code_eff)

 WHERE sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F'

name: check-reconciliation-report
overview:
The Check Reconciliation Report is used by the Finance Department to reconcile checks paid. It includes the Bank #, Vendor Name, FIDN, PIDM, TaxID  Check #, Date, Fund, Org Code, Prog Code, Vendor Invoice, Check Amount and the Vendor address and Telephone Number.

The user select the Calendar Year and Bank to process the report. Also select the Output Format of the report.

acf.overview:
The Check Reconciliation Report is used by the Finance Department to reconcile checks paid. It includes the Bank #, Vendor Name, FIDN, PIDM, TaxID  Check #, Date, Fund, Org Code, Prog Code, Vendor Invoice, Check Amount and the Vendor address and Telephone Number.

The user select the Calendar Year and Bank to process the report. Also select the Output Format of the report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File fin_1099_rpt.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2010 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: Banner/ODS
-* Name: fin_check_recon_rpt
-* Purpose: Check Reconciliation
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Calendar Year
-* Execution: Monthly from ReportCaster?/On Demand
-* Comments: -INCLUDE fin_check_recon_src to get source data
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - WHY??????????????? - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20101216 | TJF - PROD
-* |
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-DEFAULT &FMT = 'EXL2K', &XFY = '2010', &BANK = 'FOC_NONE', &BANK_TEXT = 'FOC_NONE'
-SET &ECHO = OFF;
-SET &BANK = '''01''' | ' OR ' | '''03''';
-SET &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-SET &QT = '''';
-SET &X_FY = EDIT(&XFY,'$9999');
-SET &PG_BRK = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN 'PAGE-BREAK' ELSE '';
-SET &BY_DISP = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN ' ' ELSE 'BYDISPLAY = ON';
-SET &NO_PRINT1 = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN 'NOPRINT' ELSE 'AS ' | &QT | 'Fiscal Year' | &QT;
-SET &NO_PRINT2 = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN 'NOPRINT' ELSE 'AS ' | &QT | 'Period' | &QT;
-SET &NO_PRINT3 = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN 'NOPRINT' ELSE 'AS ' | &QT | 'Trans Code - Description' | &QT;
-SET &NO_PRINT4 = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'PPT' THEN 'NOPRINT NOSPLIT' ELSE 'NOPRINT';
-SET &NO_PRINT5 = 'NOPRINT';
-SET &OPEN = IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN 'OPEN' ELSE ' ';
-SET &XBANKS = IF (&BANK NE FOC_NONE) AND (&BANK CONTAINS ' OR ') THEN STRREP(&BANK.LENGTH, &BANK, 4, ' OR ', 1 , ',', &BANK.LENGTH, 'A&BANK.LENGTH')
- ELSE &BANK;
-****************************************
-* Include source extract
-****************************************
-INCLUDE fin_check_recon_src.fex
-****************************************
SET ASNAMES = ON, LINES = 998, NODATA = ' ', &BY_DISP, SPACES = 1, TARGETFRAME=_blank
-RUN
DEFINE FILE SQLOUT
  FISCAL_YEAR/A4 = '20' || EDIT(FARINVA_FSYR_CODE,'99');
  FISCAL_PERIOD/A2 = EDIT(FARINVA_PERIOD,'99');
  APPR_AMT/P16.2MC = FARINVA_APPR_AMT;
  CHK_AMT/P16.2MC = FABINCK_NET_AMT;
  CHECK_NUM/A10 = EDIT(FABINCK_CHECK_NUM,'9999999999');
  INVOICE/A8 = EDIT(FARINVA_INVH_CODE,'99999999');
  CHK_DATE/MDYY = HDATE(FABINCK_CHECK_DATE,'MDYY');
  DUMMY/A1 = ' ';
  SUBT_01/A10 = 'Total ';
  SUBT_02/A20 = 'Total Period: ' | FISCAL_PERIOD;
  TOT_ALL/A20 = 'Total ';
  LINE_CNT/I6C = FARINVA_SEQ_NUM;
  VEND_NAME/A35 = SUBSTR(723,VENDOR_NAME,1,35,35,'A35');
  VEND_PIDM/A9 = PTOA(FABINVH_VEND_PIDM, '(P9)', 'A9');
  X_VENDOR/A47 = EDIT(SPRIDEN_ID,'999999999') | ' - ' | VEND_NAME;
  X_USER/A10 = EDIT(FARINVA_CREATE_USER,'9999999999');
END

TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT
  FABINVH_VEND_PIDM
  FARINVA_BANK_CODE
  FARINVA_FUND_CODE
  FARINVA_ACCT_CODE
  FARINVA_ORGN_CODE
  FARINVA_PROG_CODE
  FARINVA_POHD_CODE
  FARINVA_OPEN_PAID_IND
  FARINVA_USER_ID
  FABINVH_VEND_INV_CODE
  DOC_SCAN_NUM_1
  FABINVH_USER_ID
  FABINVH_ITYP_SEQ_CODE
  FABINVH_ATYP_SEQ_NUM_VEND
  FABINVH_ATYP_CODE
  FABINVH_ATYP_SEQ_NUM
  FABINVH_VEND_INV_CODE
  FABINCK_CHECK_NUM
  FABINCK_CHECK_DATE
  FABINCK_NET_AMT
  SPRIDEN_ID
  VENDOR_NAME
  FISCAL_YEAR
  FISCAL_PERIOD
  APPR_AMT
  CHK_AMT
  CHECK_NUM
  INVOICE
  CHK_DATE
  DUMMY
  SUBT_01
  SUBT_02
  TOT_ALL
  LINE_CNT
  VEND_NAME
  VEND_PIDM
  X_VENDOR
  X_USER
 BY FABINVH_VEND_PIDM NOPRINT
-IF XBANKS EQ 'FOC_NONE' GOTO SKIP_BANK;
WHERE FARINVA_BANK_CODE IN (&XBANKS);
-SKIP_BANK
ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD_V
END
-RUN
-********************************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-********************************************************************
DEFINE FILE XHOLD_V
  BANK_CODE/A2 = EDIT(FARINVA_BANK_CODE,'99');
END
TABLE FILE XHOLD_V
  BY BANK_CODE
 ON TABLE HOLD AS BANKS
END
-RUN
-*-SET &BANKS = &LINES;
-*-IF &BANKS LE 1 GOTO DO_RPT;
-*-SET &CNTR = 0;
-*-SET &BANK_CODE = '';
-*-REPEAT X_RPT &BANKS TIMES
-*-READ BANKS NOCLOSE &BANK_CODE.A2.
-*-SET &CNTR = &CNTR + 1;
-*-SET &OPEN = IF &CNTR EQ 1 THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '';
-********************************************************************
-DO_RPT
-********************************************************************
DEFINE FILE VENDOR
  VENDOR_PIDM/P9 = VENDOR_UID;
  ORDER_FROM_PHONE/A15 = IF ORDER_FROM_PHONE_COMBINED EQ '' THEN '' ELSE
                             EDIT(ORDER_FROM_PHONE_COMBINED,'(999) 999-9999');
END
TABLE FILE VENDOR
SUM
   ID
   TAX_ID
   ORDER_FROM_PHONE
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE1
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE2
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE3
   ORDER_FROM_CITY
   ORDER_FROM_STATE_PROVINCE
   ORDER_FROM_POSTAL_CODE
  BY VENDOR_PIDM
  BY NAME
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD01
END
-RUN

DEFINE FILE SPRTELE
  SPRTELE_PHONE_01/A15 = IF EDIT(SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,'$$$9') NE ' ' THEN
           '(' || SPRTELE_PHONE_AREA || ') ' | EDIT(SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,'999-9999') ELSE
                         IF EDIT(SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,'$$$9') EQ ' ' THEN
           '(' || SPRTELE_PHONE_AREA || ') ' | EDIT(SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,'999$-9999') ELSE ' ';
END

TABLE FILE SPRTELE
SUM
   SPRTELE_PHONE_01
 BY SPRTELE_PIDM
  ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD02
END
-RUN

JOIN VENDOR_PIDM IN HOLD01 TO SPRTELE_PIDM IN HOLD02 AS J1
-RUN

TABLE FILE HOLD01
SUM
   ID
   TAX_ID
   SPRTELE_PHONE_01
   ORDER_FROM_PHONE
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE1
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE2
   ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE3
   ORDER_FROM_CITY
   ORDER_FROM_STATE_PROVINCE
   ORDER_FROM_POSTAL_CODE
  BY VENDOR_PIDM
  BY NAME
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD03
END
-RUN

JOIN VENDOR_PIDM IN HOLD03 TO SPRADDR_PIDM IN SPRADDR AS J2
-RUN

DEFINE FILE HOLD03
  XSTREET_1/A50 = SUBSTR(255, ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE1, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  XSTREET_2/A50 = SUBSTR(255, ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE2, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  XSTREET_3/A50 = SUBSTR(255, ORDER_FROM_STREET_LINE3, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  XCITY/A30 = SUBSTR(63, ORDER_FROM_CITY, 1, 30, 30, 'A30');
  XSTATE/A2 = SUBSTR(63, ORDER_FROM_STATE_PROVINCE, 1, 2, 2, 'A2');
  XZIPCODE/A10 = SUBSTR(63, ORDER_FROM_POSTAL_CODE, 1, 10, 10, 'A10');
  YSTREET_1/A50 = SUBSTR(75, SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  YSTREET_2/A50 = SUBSTR(75, SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  YSTREET_3/A50 = SUBSTR(75, SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3, 1, 50, 50, 'A50');
  YCITY/A30 = SUBSTR(50, SPRADDR_CITY, 1, 30, 30, 'A30');
  YSTATE/A2 = SUBSTR(3, SPRADDR_STAT_CODE, 1, 2, 2, 'A2');
  YZIPCODE/A10 = SUBSTR(30, SPRADDR_ZIP, 1, 10, 10, 'A10');
  D_PHONE/A15 = IF ORDER_FROM_PHONE EQ '' THEN SPRTELE_PHONE_01 ELSE ORDER_FROM_PHONE;
  D_STREET1/A50 = IF XSTREET_1 EQ '' THEN YSTREET_1 ELSE XSTREET_1;
  D_STREET2/A50 = IF XSTREET_2 EQ '' THEN YSTREET_2 ELSE XSTREET_2;
  D_STREET3/A50 = IF XSTREET_3 EQ '' THEN YSTREET_3 ELSE XSTREET_3;
  D_CITY/A30 = IF XCITY EQ '' THEN YCITY ELSE XCITY;
  D_STATE/A2 = IF XSTATE EQ '' THEN YSTATE ELSE XSTATE;
  D_ZIPCODE/A10 = IF XZIPCODE EQ '' THEN YZIPCODE ELSE XZIPCODE;
END
TABLE FILE HOLD03
PRINT
    ID
    VENDOR_PIDM
    TAX_ID
    D_PHONE
    D_STREET1
    D_STREET2
    D_STREET3
    D_CITY
    D_STATE
    D_ZIPCODE
    NAME
  BY VENDOR_PIDM NOPRINT
  BY ID NOPRINT
 ON TABLE HOLD AS FIN_OUT
END
-RUN

JOIN VENDOR_PIDM IN FIN_OUT TO ALL FABINVH_VEND_PIDM IN XHOLD_V AS JJX
-RUN
DEFINE FILE FIN_OUT
  CHK_DATE/MDYY = HDATE(FABINCK_CHECK_DATE,'MDYY');
  DUMMY/A1 = ' ';
  VEND_NAME/A35 = SUBSTR(723,VENDOR_NAME,1,35,35,'A35');
  VEND_PIDM/A9 = PTOA(FABINVH_VEND_PIDM, '(P9)', 'A9');
  X_VENDOR/A47 = EDIT(SPRIDEN_ID,'999999999') | ' - ' | VEND_NAME;
END
TABLE FILE FIN_OUT
SUM
    APPR_AMT AS 'Check Amount'
    D_PHONE AS 'Telephone'
    D_STREET1 AS 'Address Line 1'
    D_STREET2 AS 'Address Line 2'
    D_STREET3 AS 'Address Line 3'
    D_CITY AS 'City'
    D_STATE AS 'State'
    D_ZIPCODE AS 'Zip Code'
  BY DUMMY NOPRINT
  BY FARINVA_BANK_CODE AS 'Bank'
  BY VENDOR_NAME AS 'Vendor Name'
  BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'
  BY CHECK_NUM AS 'Check #'
  BY CHK_DATE AS 'Date'
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT &OPEN
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
     TITLETEXT='&X_FY - Finance Check Summary',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='VERDANA',
     SIZE=9,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     COLOR='BLACK',
     BACKCOLOR='NONE',
     STYLE=NORMAL,
$
TYPE=REPORT, COLUMN=N3, SQUEEZE=3,$
TYPE=TITLE, JUSTIFY=LEFT, STYLE=BOLD, SIZE=10,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
TABLE FILE FIN_OUT
SUM
    APPR_AMT AS 'Check Amount'
    D_PHONE AS 'Telephone'
    D_STREET1 AS 'Address Line 1'
    D_STREET2 AS 'Address Line 2'
    D_STREET3 AS 'Address Line 3'
    D_CITY AS 'City'
    D_STATE AS 'State'
    D_ZIPCODE AS 'Zip Code'
  BY DUMMY NOPRINT
  BY FARINVA_BANK_CODE AS 'Bank'

  BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'

  BY TAX_ID AS 'Tax ID'
  BY CHECK_NUM AS 'Check #'
  BY CHK_DATE AS 'Date'
  BY FARINVA_FUND_CODE AS 'Fund'
  BY FARINVA_ACCT_CODE AS 'Account'
  BY FARINVA_ORGN_CODE AS 'Org Code'
  BY FARINVA_PROG_CODE AS 'Prog Code'
  BY INVOICE AS 'Invoice #'
  BY FABINVH_VEND_INV_CODE AS 'Vendor Inv'
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT &OPEN
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
     TITLETEXT='&X_FY - Finance Check Detail',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='VERDANA',
     SIZE=9,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     COLOR='BLACK',
     BACKCOLOR='NONE',
     STYLE=NORMAL,
$
TYPE=REPORT, COLUMN=N3, SQUEEZE=3,$
TYPE=TITLE, JUSTIFY=LEFT, STYLE=BOLD, SIZE=10,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN

-IF &FMT NE EXL2K GOTO EOJX;
-***************************************************
TABLE FILE FIN_OUT

"Fordham University"
"Finance Check Reconciliation Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"

name: hr-timesheet-not-started-report
overview:
The HR Timesheet Not Started Report provides a means for the Payroll Office to audit the TimeSheets and in a timely fashion notify the time sheets approvers of delinquent time sheets. The report contains the Calendar Year, Payroll ID, Payroll Number, Employee FIDN, Employee Name, Hire Date, Position Code, Position Title, Position Status, Position Beg and End Date, Approvers Name and Email Address.

The User select the Calendar Year and Payroll Number parameters and also the Report Output Format.

acf.overview:
The HR Timesheet Not Started Report provides a means for the Payroll Office to audit the TimeSheets and in a timely fashion notify the time sheets approvers of delinquent time sheets. The report contains the Calendar Year, Payroll ID, Payroll Number, Employee FIDN, Employee Name, Hire Date, Position Code, Position Title, Position Status, Position Beg and End Date, Approvers Name and Email Address.

The User select the Calendar Year and Payroll Number parameters and also the Report Output Format.

sql.sql_code:
-* File hrp_timesheet_not_started.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2015 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: Finance(Payroll)
-* Name: hrp_timesheet_not_started.fex
-* Purpose: Missing Timesheets
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Many
-* Execution: On Demand
-* Comments:
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20150112 | TJF - Initial development
-* |
-*******************************************************************************
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
-DEFAULTS &CAL_YR = '2015', &PAYNUM = '2', &FMT = 'EXL2K'
-SET &ECHO=ALL;
-SET &XTITLE = 'TS Not Started - #' | '&PAYNUM.EVAL' | '-' | '&CAL_YR.EVAL';
-SET &QT = '''';

SET LINES = 99998, ASNAMES = ON, BYDISPLAY = ON
-RUN

DEFINE FILE EMPLOYEE_POSITION
  POS_BEG_DATE/YYMD = HDATE(POSITION_BEGIN_DATE, 'YYMD');
  POS_END_DATE/YYMD = HDATE(POSITION_END_DATE, 'YYMD');
END
TABLE FILE EMPLOYEE_POSITION
SUM
    ID
    NAME
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
BY PERSON_UID
BY POSITION
BY POS_BEG_DATE
BY POS_END_DATE
WHERE POSITION_STATUS EQ 'A';
WHERE EDIT(POSITION,'99') EQ 'PT';
WHERE ((POS_BEG_DATE LE '&DATEYYMD')
  AND (POS_END_DATE GE '&DATEYYMD'));
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD1
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE HOLD1
PRINT
    ID
 NAME
 POSITION
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
 POS_BEG_DATE
 POS_END_DATE
  BY PERSON_UID
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD2
END
-RUN
JOIN LEFT_OUTER PERSON_UID IN HOLD2 TO ALL PERSON_UID IN EMPLOYEE AS J1
-RUN
DEFINE FILE HOLD2
  PIDM_KEY/P9 = PERSON_UID;
END
TABLE FILE HOLD2
PRINT
    ID
 NAME
 POSITION
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
 POS_BEG_DATE
 POS_END_DATE
   COMPUTE CUR_HIRE_DATE/MDYY = HDATE(CURRENT_HIRE_DATE, 'MDYY');
  BY PIDM_KEY
 ON TABLE HOLD AS MAIN_POP
END
-RUN

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE CAL_OUT FOR
SELECT
    PTRCALN_START_DATE,
    PTRCALN_END_DATE
FROM PTRCALN
WHERE PTRCALN_YEAR = '&CAL_YR'
  AND PTRCALN_PICT_CODE = 'BW'
  AND PTRCALN_PAYNO = &PAYNUM
;
END
TABLE FILE CAL_OUT
PRINT
    PTRCALN_START_DATE
    PTRCALN_END_DATE
 ON TABLE SAVE
END
-RUN
-*****************************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-*****************************************************************

-READ SAVE &XDATE1.A8. &XDATE2.A8.
-SET &YDATE1 = EDIT('&XDATE1.EVAL','9999/99/99');
-SET &YDATE2 = EDIT('&XDATE2.EVAL','9999/99/99');

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE GET_APPRV FOR
SELECT DISTINCT
   PERROUT_APPR_PIDM,
   PERROUT_APPR_POSN,
   SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME,
   SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
           FROM GOREMAL
          WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'FUEM'
            AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
            AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) APPR_EMAIL
FROM PERROUT, SPRIDEN
WHERE PERROUT_APPR_PIDM = SPRIDEN_PIDM
  AND PERROUT_APPR_ACTION_IND = 'A'
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
;
END
TABLE FILE GET_APPRV
SUM
   FST.PERROUT_APPR_PIDM
       SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
       SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
       APPR_EMAIL
  BY PERROUT_APPR_POSN
 ON TABLE HOLD AS GOT_APPVS
END
-RUN
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE EMPL_OUT1 FOR
SELECT
*
FROM PERJOBS, PERROUT
WHERE PERJOBS_SEQNO = PERROUT_JOBS_SEQNO
  AND PERJOBS_YEAR = '&CAL_YR'
  AND PERJOBS_PICT_CODE = 'BW'
  AND PERJOBS_PAYNO = &PAYNUM
  AND SUBSTR(PERJOBS_POSN,1,2) = 'PT'
;
END
TABLE FILE EMPL_OUT1
PRINT *
   BY PERJOBS_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HAVE_TS
END
-RUN

MATCH FILE MAIN_POP
PRINT
    ID
    NAME
    POSITION
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
    POS_BEG_DATE
    POS_END_DATE
 CUR_HIRE_DATE
  BY PIDM_KEY
RUN
FILE HAVE_TS
PRINT
    PIDM_KEY
  BY PIDM_KEY NOPRINT
 AFTER MATCH HOLD AS HOLD4 OLD-NOT-NEW
END
-RUN

DEFINE FILE HOLD4
  CAL_YR/A4 = '&CAL_YR.EVAL';
  PAYROLL_ID/A2 = 'BW';
  PAY_NUMBER/A2 = '&PAYNUM.EVAL';
END

TABLE FILE HOLD4
PRINT
    CAL_YR
    PAYROLL_ID
    PAY_NUMBER
    ID AS 'SPRIDEN_ID'
    NAME AS 'EMPL_NAME'
    POSITION
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
    POS_BEG_DATE
    POS_END_DATE
 CUR_HIRE_DATE
  BY E01 AS 'PIDM_KEY'
 ON TABLE HOLD AS PART_TIMERS
END
-RUN

-*******************************************************************************
DEFINE FILE FTVORGN
  XDATE1/YYMD = HDATE(FTVORGN_NCHG_DATE, 'YYMD');
  XYR1/YY = XDATE1;
END
TABLE FILE FTVORGN
PRINT
    FTVORGN_TITLE
  BY FTVORGN_ORGN_CODE
WHERE XYR1 EQ 2099;
 ON TABLE HOLD AS ORG_DATA
END
-RUN

-*******************************************************************************
-TEST1
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE EMPL_OUT FOR
SELECT
    NBRJOBS_PIDM,
    NBRJOBS_POSN,
    NBRJOBS_SUFF,
    NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE,
    NBRJOBS_STATUS,
    NBRJOBS_DESC,
    NBRJOBS_ECLS_CODE,
    NBRJOBS_PICT_CODE,
 NBRJOBS_DESC,
 NBRJOBS_ORGN_CODE_TS,
    NTRRQUE_POSN,
 NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN,
 NTRRQUE_ACTION_IND,
 NTRRQUE_APPR_SEQ_NO

FROM NBRJOBS, NTRRQUE
WHERE NBRJOBS_POSN = NTRRQUE_POSN
  AND SUBSTR(NBRJOBS_POSN,1,2) = 'PT'
  AND NBRJOBS_TIME_ENTRY_METHOD IN ('W','D')
  AND NBRJOBS_PICT_CODE = 'BW'
  AND NBRJOBS_STATUS <> 'T'
  AND TO_CHAR(NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') <= '&YDATE1'
;
END

TABLE FILE EMPL_OUT
SUM
-* NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN
    NBRJOBS_POSN
    NBRJOBS_SUFF
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE
    NBRJOBS_STATUS
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_ECLS_CODE
    NBRJOBS_PICT_CODE
 NBRJOBS_ORGN_CODE_TS
    NTRRQUE_POSN
 NTRRQUE_ACTION_IND
    NTRRQUE_APPR_SEQ_NO
 BY NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN
 BY NBRJOBS_PIDM
 BY HIGHEST 1 NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE NOPRINT
 ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
JOIN CLEAR *
JOIN LEFT_OUTER PERROUT_APPR_POSN IN GOT_APPVS TO ALL NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN IN XHOLD AS JJX
-RUN
TABLE FILE GOT_APPVS
PRINT
    PERROUT_APPR_PIDM
    NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
    APPR_EMAIL
   COMPUTE APPR_NAME/A50 = SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' | SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME;
    PERROUT_APPR_POSN
    NTRRQUE_POSN
 NTRRQUE_ACTION_IND
 NTRRQUE_APPR_SEQ_NO
    NBRJOBS_POSN
    NBRJOBS_SUFF
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE
    NBRJOBS_STATUS
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_ECLS_CODE
    NBRJOBS_PICT_CODE
 NBRJOBS_ORGN_CODE_TS
-* BY NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN
 BY NBRJOBS_PIDM AS 'PIDM_KEY'
WHERE NBRJOBS_PIDM NE 0;
  ON TABLE HOLD AS GOT_EM
END
-RUN

MATCH FILE PART_TIMERS
PRINT
    CAL_YR
    PAYROLL_ID
    PAY_NUMBER
    SPRIDEN_ID
    EMPL_NAME
-*	EMPLOYEE_CLASS
    POSITION
    JOB_SUFFIX
    POSITION_TITLE
    POSITION_STATUS
    POS_BEG_DATE
    POS_END_DATE
 CUR_HIRE_DATE
  BY PIDM_KEY
RUN
FILE GOT_EM
PRINT
    NBRJOBS_POSN
    NBRJOBS_SUFF
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE
    NBRJOBS_STATUS
    NBRJOBS_DESC
    NBRJOBS_ECLS_CODE
    NBRJOBS_PICT_CODE
 NBRJOBS_ORGN_CODE_TS
    PERROUT_APPR_PIDM
    NTRRQUE_APPR_POSN
 NTRRQUE_ACTION_IND
 NTRRQUE_APPR_SEQ_NO
    APPR_EMAIL
    PERROUT_APPR_POSN
    APPR_NAME
  BY PIDM_KEY
 AFTER MATCH HOLD AS FINAL OLD
END
-RUN
-*****************************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-*****************************************************************
-FINAL
-*******************************************************************************
DEFINE FILE FINAL
  XPOS/A10 = IF NBRJOBS_POSN NE '' THEN EDIT(NBRJOBS_POSN,'999999') || '-' | EDIT(NBRJOBS_SUFF,'99')
                  ELSE POSITION || '-' | JOB_SUFFIX;
  XTITLE/A50 = IF NBRJOBS_DESC NE '' THEN NBRJOBS_DESC ELSE POSITION_TITLE;
  XJOB_STAT/A1 = IF NBRJOBS_STATUS NE '' THEN NBRJOBS_STATUS ELSE POSITION_STATUS;
END
TABLE FILE FINAL
PRINT
    CAL_YR AS 'Calendar YR'
    PAYROLL_ID AS 'Payroll ID'
    PAY_NUMBER AS 'Payroll #'
    SPRIDEN_ID AS 'Employee ID'
    EMPL_NAME AS 'Employee Name'
    CUR_HIRE_DATE AS 'Hire Date'
    XPOS AS 'Position Code'
    XTITLE AS 'Title'
    XJOB_STAT AS 'Position Status'
    POS_BEG_DATE/MDYY AS 'Position Beg Date'
    POS_END_DATE/MDYY AS 'Position End Date'
 NTRRQUE_ACTION_IND AS 'Action Ind'
 NTRRQUE_APPR_SEQ_NO AS 'Seq #'
 APPR_NAME AS 'Approver Name'
 APPR_EMAIL AS 'Approver EMAIL'
  BY EMPL_NAME NOPRINT
  BY SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
WHERE EMPL_NAME NE '';
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT OPEN

ON TABLE SET STYLE *
UNITS=IN, FONT='ARIAL', GRID=ON, SQUEEZE=ON, ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE, SIZE=9, $
TYPE=TITLE, STYLE=BOLD, JUSTIFY=LEFT, GRID=ON, BORDER=1, $
TYPE=REPORT, COLUMN=EMPL_NAME, FONT='ARIAL UNICODE MS',$
TYPE=REPORT, TITLETEXT='&XTITLE.EVAL', GRID=ON, $
TYPE=DATA, SIZE=9, BACKCOLOR=(RGB(224 255 255) 'WHITE'), BORDER=1,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE FINAL
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"HR &XTITLE"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
" "
"Calendar Year<+0>&CAL_YR"
"Payroll #:<+0>&PAYNUM"
SUM
    SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-GOTO EOJ
-*****************************************************************
-NOREC
-INCLUDE includefiles/FORDHAM_NORECMSG
-*****************************************************************
-EOJ
-MRNOEDIT END
-EXIT

name: hr-payroll-taxable-wages
overview:
The HR Payroll Taxable Wages produces a list of Employees for review/validating by the Payroll Staff. The report is outputted in Excel and contains multiple Tabs, including a Summary payroll Validation tab, a FICA, Medicare, Federal and New York Exceptions tab. They include the Employee Name, FIDN, SSN, Birth Date Employment Status, Adjustment Service Date, Current Hire date, E-Class Code, Email address, YTD Gross , FICA, and other Imputed calculations.

The User selects the Calendar to process the report, the output format defaults to Excel.

acf.overview:
The HR Payroll Taxable Wages produces a list of Employees for review/validating by the Payroll Staff. The report is outputted in Excel and contains multiple Tabs, including a Summary payroll Validation tab, a FICA, Medicare, Federal and New York Exceptions tab. They include the Employee Name, FIDN, SSN, Birth Date Employment Status, Adjustment Service Date, Current Hire date, E-Class Code, Email address, YTD Gross , FICA, and other Imputed calculations.

The User selects the Calendar to process the report, the output format defaults to Excel.

sql.sql_code:
-* File hr_taxable_wages.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2010 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: Banner/ODS
-* Name: hr_taxable_wages
-* Purpose: Taxable Wages and Contributions Report
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Calendar Year
-* Execution: On Demand
-* Comments:
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - WHY??????????????? - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20120229 | TJF - PROD
-* |
-*******************************************************************************
-*ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
-*ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
-*SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT2X FOR
-*SELECT
-* SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) EMPL_AMT,
-* SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) EMPR_AMT,
-* SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) APPL_GRS,
-* PERDTOT_PIDM,
-* PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE
-*FROM PERDTOT
-*WHERE PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('F18','F19')
-* AND PERDTOT_YEAR = 2012
-*GROUP BY PERDTOT_PIDM, PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE
-*;
-*END
-*TABLE FILE SQLOUT2X
-*PRINT
-* EMPL_AMT
-* EMPR_AMT
-* APPL_GRS
-*BY PERDTOT_PIDM
-*ACROSS PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE
-*END
-*-EXIT
-*********************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-SET &ECHO=OFF;
-DEFAULTS &INSTANCE = 'PROD', &YEAR = '2011'
-SET &QT = '''';
-SET &SPEC_IMP = &QT | '951' | &QT |
- ',' | &QT | 'CMD' | &QT |
- ',' | &QT | 'CME' | &QT |
- ',' | &QT | 'FAD' | &QT |
- ',' | &QT | 'FAE' | &QT;
-SET &SPEC_INC = IF &YEAR EQ '2011' THEN &SPEC_IMP ELSE '';
-*************************************************************************
-* GOTO BUCKETS
-*************************************************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUTX0 FOR
SELECT
     SPRIDEN_ID,
     SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || SPRIDEN_MI NAME,
     PEBEMPL_PIDM,
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS,
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE,
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE,
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE,
     SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE,
     SPBPERS_SSN,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
           FROM GOREMAL
          WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'FUST'
            AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
            AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) STUDENT_EMAIL,
        (SELECT MAX (GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS)
            FROM GOREMAL
           WHERE GOREMAL_EMAL_CODE = 'FUEM'
             AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A'
             AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = GOREMAL_PIDM) EMPLOYEE_EMAIL

FROM SPRIDEN, PEBEMPL, SPBPERS

WHERE PEBEMPL_PIDM = SPRIDEN_PIDM
  AND PEBEMPL_PIDM = SPBPERS_PIDM
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
;
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUTX0
SUM
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
     NAME
     STUDENT_EMAIL
     EMPLOYEE_EMAIL
     SPRIDEN_ID
     SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE
     SPBPERS_SSN
   BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD0
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
-GET_VISA
-*************************************************************************
TABLE FILE GORVISA
SUM
     MAX.GORVISA_VTYP_CODE
   BY GORVISA_PIDM
   BY HIGHEST 1 GORVISA_ACTIVITY_DATE
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD1
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
JOIN PEBEMPL_PIDM IN HOLD0 TO GORVISA_PIDM IN HOLD1 AS J1
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
TABLE FILE HOLD0
PRINT
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
     NAME
     STUDENT_EMAIL
     EMPLOYEE_EMAIL
     SPRIDEN_ID
     SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE
     SPBPERS_SSN
     GORVISA_VTYP_CODE
   BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
 ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD2
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
-GROSS_EARN
-*************************************************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUTX1 FOR
SELECT
    PEBEMPL_PIDM,
 SUM(PERETOT_GRS) YTD_GROSS

FROM PEBEMPL, PERETOT

WHERE PEBEMPL_PIDM = PERETOT_PIDM
  AND PERETOT_YEAR = &YEAR
GROUP BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
;
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUTX1
PRINT
    YTD_GROSS
  BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
WHERE YTD_GROSS NE 0;
  ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD3
END
-RUN
-*****************************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-*****************************************************************
-*************************************************************************
JOIN PEBEMPL_PIDM IN HOLD3 TO PEBEMPL_PIDM IN HOLD2 AS J2
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
TABLE FILE HOLD3
PRINT
     SPRIDEN_ID
     NAME
       COMPUTE SSN/A11 = EDIT(SPBPERS_SSN,'999-99-9999');
       COMPUTE BIRTH_DATE/MDYY = SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE;
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
       COMPUTE EMAIL_1/A90 = IF STUDENT_EMAIL EQ '' THEN EMPLOYEE_EMAIL ELSE STUDENT_EMAIL; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE EMAIL/A90 = LOCASE(90, EMAIL_1, 'A90');
     GORVISA_VTYP_CODE
     YTD_GROSS
   BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
  ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD4
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
-BUCKETS
-*************************************************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT2X FOR
SELECT
     PERDTOT_PIDM,
     PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('FIM','FIN') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) FICA_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('FIM','FIN') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) FICA_ER,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('FIM','FIN') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) FICA_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('MED') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) MED_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('MED') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) MED_ER,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('MED') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) MED_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('FED') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) FED_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('FED') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) FED_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NYS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) NYS_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NYS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) NYS_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NYC') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) NYC_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NYC') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) NYC_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('YKR') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) YKR_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('YKR') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) YKR_GR,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN (&SPEC_IMP.EVAL)
                                                   THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_TUITION_1,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('ILI') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) IMP_LIFE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('LTD') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_LTD,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('LD1') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_HLTH1,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('LDA') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_HLTH2,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('MTG') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_MORT,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('VEH','VM1') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) IMP_VEH,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('ET1') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PTX_ETRAC,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('PCF','PRK') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PTX_PRK,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('AET','CIG','EMP','HIP','OXF')
                                                   THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PTX_HLTH,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('DCA','HCA') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PTX_FLEX,
     (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE, 1,2) IN ('RF','RM','RN','RP','RT','TF','TP')
                                                   THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PTX_403B,

     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NJS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) NJS_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('NJS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) NJS_GR,

     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('PAS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PAS_EE,
     (CASE WHEN PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE IN ('PAS') THEN SUM(PERDTOT_APPL_GRS) ELSE 0 END) PAS_GR,
     (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE, 1,2) IN ('RF','RP','TF','TP')
                                                   THEN SUM(PERDTOT_EMPL_AMT) ELSE 0 END) PAS_403B

FROM PERDTOT

WHERE PERDTOT_YEAR = &YEAR
GROUP BY PERDTOT_PIDM, PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE
ORDER BY PERDTOT_PIDM, PERDTOT_BDCA_CODE
;
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUT2X
SUM
     FICA_EE
     FICA_ER
     FICA_GR
     MED_EE
     MED_ER
     MED_GR
     FED_EE
     FED_GR
     NYS_EE
     NYS_GR
     NYC_EE
     NYC_GR
     YKR_EE
     YKR_GR
     IMP_TUITION_1
     IMP_LIFE
     IMP_LTD
     IMP_HLTH1
     IMP_HLTH2
     IMP_MORT
     IMP_VEH
     PTX_ETRAC
     PTX_PRK
     PTX_HLTH
     PTX_FLEX
     PTX_403B
     NJS_EE
     NJS_GR
     PAS_EE
     PAS_GR
     PAS_403B
   BY PERDTOT_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD5
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
-IF &YEAR NE '2011' GOTO SKIP_THIS;
-*************************************************************************

ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUTX3 FOR
SELECT
       PERJTOT_PIDM,
       PERJTOT_EARN_CODE,
    (CASE WHEN PERJTOT_EARN_CODE IN (&SPEC_IMP.EVAL) THEN SUM(PERJTOT_GRS) ELSE 0 END) IMP_TUITION_2011

FROM PERJTOT

WHERE PERJTOT_YEAR = &YEAR
  AND PERJTOT_EARN_CODE IN (&SPEC_INC.EVAL)
  AND PERJTOT_GRS <> 0
GROUP BY PERJTOT_PIDM, PERJTOT_EARN_CODE
ORDER BY PERJTOT_PIDM, PERJTOT_EARN_CODE
;
END
TABLE FILE SQLOUTX3
SUM
    IMP_TUITION_2011
  BY PERJTOT_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS HOLD6
END
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
-SKIP_THIS
-*************************************************************************
-*************************************************************************
JOIN PEBEMPL_PIDM IN HOLD4 TO PERDTOT_PIDM IN HOLD5 AS J3
-IF &YEAR NE '2011' GOTO SKIP_THIS_2;
JOIN PEBEMPL_PIDM IN HOLD4 TO PERJTOT_PIDM IN HOLD6 AS J4
-SKIP_THIS_2
-RUN
-*************************************************************************
DEFINE FILE HOLD4
-IF &YEAR NE '2011' GOTO NOT_2011;
   IMP_TUITION/P20.2 = IMP_TUITION_1 + IMP_TUITION_2011;
-* IMP_TUITION/P20.2 = IMP_TUITION_2011;
-GOTO IS_2011
-NOT_2011
   IMP_TUITION/P20.2 = IMP_TUITION_1;
-IS_2011

END
TABLE FILE HOLD4
SUM
     SPRIDEN_ID
     NAME
     SSN
     BIRTH_DATE
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
     EMAIL
     GORVISA_VTYP_CODE
     YTD_GROSS
     FICA_EE
     FICA_ER
     FICA_GR
     MED_EE
     MED_ER
     MED_GR
     FED_EE
     FED_GR
     NYS_EE
     NYS_GR
     NYC_EE
     NYC_GR
     YKR_EE
     YKR_GR
     IMP_TUITION
     IMP_LIFE
     IMP_LTD
     IMP_HLTH1
     IMP_HLTH2
     IMP_MORT
     IMP_VEH
     PTX_ETRAC
     PTX_PRK
     PTX_HLTH
     PTX_FLEX
     PTX_403B
     NJS_EE
     NJS_GR
     PAS_EE
     PAS_GR
     PAS_403B

       COMPUTE TOT_IMP_NY/P20.2 = IMP_TUITION + IMP_LIFE + IMP_LTD + IMP_HLTH2 + IMP_VEH;
       COMPUTE TOT_IMP_FED/P20.2 = TOT_IMP_NY + IMP_HLTH1;
       COMPUTE TOT_PTX_CALC/P20.2 = PTX_ETRAC + PTX_PRK + PTX_HLTH + PTX_FLEX;
       COMPUTE TOT_PTX_FED_CALC/P20.2 = TOT_PTX_CALC + PTX_403B;
       COMPUTE FICA_EE_CALC/P8.2 = IF &YEAR EQ 2011 OR 2012 THEN (FICA_GR * 4.2) / 100 ELSE (FICA_GR * 6.2) / 100;
       COMPUTE FICA_ER_CALC/P8.2 = IF &YEAR EQ 2011 OR 2012 THEN (FICA_GR * 4.2) / 100 ELSE (FICA_GR * 6.2) / 100;
       COMPUTE FICA_GR_TEST/P20.2C = (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_FED) - TOT_PTX_CALC; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FICA_GR_CALC/P20.2C = IF &YEAR EQ 2011 AND FICA_GR_TEST GE 106800.00 THEN 106800.00 ELSE
                                        IF &YEAR EQ 2012 AND FICA_GR_TEST GE 110100.00 THEN 110100.00 ELSE
                                        IF &YEAR EQ 2013 AND FICA_GR_TEST GE 113700.00 THEN 113700.00 ELSE FICA_GR_TEST;
       COMPUTE MED_GR_CALC/P20.2C = (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_FED) - TOT_PTX_CALC;
       COMPUTE MED_EE_CALC/P20.2C = (MED_GR * 1.45) / 100;
       COMPUTE MED_ER_CALC/P20.2C = (MED_GR * 1.45) / 100;
       COMPUTE MED_OVER_200K/P20.2C = IF &YEAR EQ 2013 AND YTD_GROSS GE 200000.00 THEN YTD_GROSS - 200000.00 ELSE 0;
       COMPUTE MED_EX_MED_TAX/P20.4C = (MED_OVER_200K * 0.9) / 100;

       COMPUTE FED_GR_CALC/P20.2C = (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_FED) - TOT_PTX_FED_CALC;
       COMPUTE NYS_GR_CALC/P20.2C = (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_NY) - TOT_PTX_FED_CALC;
       COMPUTE NYC_GR_CALC/P20.2C = IF NYC_GR EQ 0 THEN 0 ELSE (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_NY) - TOT_PTX_FED_CALC;
       COMPUTE YKR_GR_CALC/P20.2C = IF YKR_GR EQ 0 THEN 0 ELSE (YTD_GROSS + TOT_IMP_NY) - TOT_PTX_FED_CALC;

       COMPUTE NJS_GR_CALC/P20.2C = IF NJS_GR EQ 0 THEN 0 ELSE (FED_GR + PTX_403B);
       COMPUTE PAS_GR_CALC/P20.2C = IF PAS_GR EQ 0 THEN 0 ELSE (FED_GR + PAS_403B);

   BY PEBEMPL_PIDM
 ON TABLE SET HOLDLIST PRINTONLY
 ON TABLE HOLD AS FINAL_OUT
END
-RUN
SET BYDISPLAY = ON, ASNAMES = ON
-RUN
-SET &CNTR = 0;
-SET &QT = '''';
-REPEAT GEN_RPT 7 TIMES
-SET &CNTR = &CNTR + 1;
-SET &OPEN = IF &CNTR EQ 1 THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '';
-SET &RPT_NAME = DECODE &CNTR (
- 1 'Summary Payroll Validation'
- 2 'Fica Exceptions'
- 3 'Medicare Exceptions'
- 4 'Federal Exceptions'
- 5 'New York Exceptions'
- 6 'New Jersey Exceptions'
- 7 'Pennsylvania Exceptions'
- ELSE 'XXX');
-SET &RPT_WHERE = IF &CNTR EQ 1 THEN '' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 2 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_FICA NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_FEE NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_FER NE ' | '0' | ';' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 3 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_MED NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_MEE NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_MER NE ' | '0' | ';' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 4 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_FED NE ' | '0' | ';' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 5 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_NYS NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_NYC NE ' | '0' | ' OR ' |
- 'CK_YKR NE ' | '0' | ';' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 6 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_NJS NE ' | '0' | ';' ELSE
- IF &CNTR EQ 7 THEN 'WHERE TOTAL CK_PAS NE ' | '0' | ';'
- ELSE ' ';

TABLE FILE FINAL_OUT
PRINT
     SPRIDEN_ID
     SSN
     BIRTH_DATE/MDYY
     PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
     PEBEMPL_ADJ_SERVICE_DATE/MDYY
     PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE/MDYY
     PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
     EMAIL
     GORVISA_VTYP_CODE
     YTD_GROSS/P20.2C
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR GT 2 GOTO SKIP_FICA;
     FICA_EE/P20.2C
     FICA_EE_CALC/P20.2C

     FICA_ER/P20.2C
     FICA_ER_CALC/P20.2C
     FICA_GR/P20.2C
     FICA_GR_CALC/P20.2C
-SKIP_FICA
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR EQ 1 OR 3 GOTO DO_MED;
-GOTO SKIP_MED
-DO_MED
     MED_EE_CALC/P20.2C AS 'MED_EE_ER_CALC'
     MED_EE/P20.2C
     MED_ER/P20.2C
     MED_GR/P20.2C
     MED_GR_CALC/P20.2C
     MED_OVER_200K/P20.2C
     MED_EX_MED_TAX/P20.2C AS 'MED_OVER_200K_TAX'
-SKIP_MED
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR EQ 1 OR 4 GOTO DO_FED;
-GOTO SKIP_FED
-DO_FED
-****************************************
     FED_EE/P20.2C
     FED_GR/P20.2C
     FED_GR_CALC/P20.2C
-SKIP_FED
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR EQ 1 OR 5 GOTO DO_NYS;
-GOTO SKIP_NYS
-DO_NYS
-****************************************
     NYS_EE/P20.2C
     NYS_GR/P20.2C
     NYS_GR_CALC/P20.2C

     NYC_EE/P20.2C
     NYC_GR/P20.2C
     NYC_GR_CALC/P20.2C

     YKR_EE/P20.2C
     YKR_GR/P20.2C
     YKR_GR_CALC/P20.2C
-SKIP_NYS
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR EQ 1 OR 6 GOTO DO_NJS;
-GOTO SKIP_NJS
-DO_NJS
     NJS_EE/P20.2C
     NJS_GR/P20.2C
     NJS_GR_CALC/P20.2C
-SKIP_NJS
-****************************************
-IF &CNTR EQ 1 OR 7 GOTO DO_PAS;
-GOTO SKIP_PAS
-DO_PAS
     PAS_EE/P20.2C
     PAS_GR/P20.2C
     PAS_403B/P20.2C
     PAS_GR_CALC/P20.2C
-SKIP_PAS
-****************************************
     IMP_TUITION/P20.2C
     IMP_LIFE/P20.2C
     IMP_LTD/P20.2C
     IMP_HLTH1/P20.2C
     IMP_HLTH2/P20.2C
     IMP_MORT/P20.2C
     IMP_VEH/P20.2C

     TOT_IMP_NY/P20.2C
     TOT_IMP_FED/P20.2C

     PTX_ETRAC/P20.2C
     PTX_PRK/P20.2C
     PTX_HLTH/P20.2C
     PTX_FLEX/P20.2C
     PTX_403B/P20.2C
     TOT_PTX_CALC/P20.2C
     TOT_PTX_FED_CALC/P20.2C

       COMPUTE CK_FICA/P20.2C = FICA_GR_CALC - FICA_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_MED/P20.2C = MED_GR_CALC - MED_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_FED/P20.2C = FED_GR_CALC - FED_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_NYS/P20.2C = NYS_GR_CALC - NYS_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_NYC/P20.2C = NYC_GR_CALC - NYC_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_YKR/P20.2C = YKR_GR_CALC - YKR_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_FEE/P20.2C = FICA_EE_CALC - FICA_EE; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_FER/P20.2C = FICA_ER_CALC - FICA_ER; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_MEE/P20.2C = MED_EE_CALC - MED_EE; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_MER/P20.2C = MED_ER_CALC - MED_ER; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_NJS/P20.2C = NJS_GR_CALC - NJS_GR; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE CK_PAS/P20.2C = PAS_GR_CALC - PAS_GR; NOPRINT


       COMPUTE FLAG1/A1 = IF CK_FICA EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG2/A1 = IF CK_MED EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG3/A1 = IF CK_FED EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG4/A1 = IF CK_NYS EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG5/A1 = IF CK_NYC EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG6/A1 = IF CK_YKR EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG7/A1 = IF CK_FEE EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG8/A1 = IF CK_FER EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG9/A1 = IF CK_MEE EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG10/A1 = IF CK_MER EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG11/A1 = IF CK_NJS EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT
       COMPUTE FLAG12/A1 = IF CK_PAS EQ 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y'; NOPRINT

       COMPUTE FLAG99/A1 = IF FLAG1 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG2 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG3 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG4 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG5 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG6 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG7 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG8 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG9 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG10 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG11 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE
                           IF FLAG12 EQ 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N'; NOPRINT
   BY NAME AS 'Employee Name'
   BY PEBEMPL_PIDM NOPRINT
&RPT_WHERE.EVAL
  ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K &OPEN
  ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN, SQUEEZE=ON, TITLETEXT='&RPT_NAME', $
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF, FONT='ARIAL', SIZE=9, $
TYPE=TITLE,
     STYLE=BOLD, FONT=ARIAL, SIZE=10, JUSTIFY=LEFT,$
TYPE=DATA,
     FONT=VERDANA,$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = NAME, STYLE=BOLD,
     BACKCOLOR='LIGHT BLUE' , WHEN=FLAG99 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = FICA_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(255 255 153) , WHEN=FLAG1 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = MED_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(255 204 153 ) , WHEN=FLAG2 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = FED_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(0 204 255 ) , WHEN=FLAG3 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = NYS_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(0 255 255 ) , WHEN=FLAG4 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = NYC_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(255 153 204) , WHEN=FLAG5 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = YKR_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(204 153 255) , WHEN=FLAG6 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = FICA_EE_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(255 128 128) , WHEN=FLAG7 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = FICA_ER_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(153 204 255) , WHEN=FLAG8 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = MED_EE,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(204 204 255) , WHEN=FLAG9 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = MED_ER,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(204 255 255) , WHEN=FLAG10 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = NJS_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(51 204 204) , WHEN=FLAG11 EQ 'Y',$
TYPE=DATA, COLUMN = PAS_GR_CALC,
     BACKCOLOR=RGB(255 204 0) , WHEN=FLAG12 EQ 'Y',$

ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-GEN_RPT
TABLE FILE FINAL_OUT
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Taxable Wages Contributions Payroll Report"
"Selected Year:<+0>&YEAR"
SUM
    SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE

TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $

TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$

ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-GOTO EOJ

name: hr-403b-retirement-process
overview:
The HR 403B Retirement Process provides information used to audit the Retirement Plans. The output contains both Summary and Detail information. The Summary includes the Employer  and Employee contribution amounts by Payroll # with a grand Total. The Detail provides a breakdown by Employee and lists the Employee Name and FIDN, Payroll Date, 403B Plan and Account number and description and also the Employer and Employee contribution amount by Payroll Number.

The User selects via parameter dropdowns the From and To Dates, the Calendar Year, the Payroll Number, the Plan (Fidelity, Tiaa-Cref etc.), the Sub Plan(s). The output format is defaulted to Excel.

sql.sql_code:
-* File hr_ret_403b_rpt.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: Banner/ODS
-* Name: hr_ret_403b_rpt.fex
-* Purpose: Retirement Plan Audit
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Year, Pay Number, From - To Dates
-* Execution: On Demand
-* Comments:
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20120331 | TJF - PROD
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
-DEFAULTH &INSTANCE = ' '
-DEFAULTH &PRUD_NO = ' '
-DEFAULTH &TIAA_NO = ' '
-DEFAULTH &FROM_DATE = ' '
-DEFAULTH &TO_DATE = ' '
-DEFAULTH &PRUD_NO_TEXT = ' '
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-********************************************
-SET &ECHO=OFF; 
-DEFAULTS &INSTANCE = 'PROD', &FIDL_NO = 'FOC_NONE', &PRUD_NO = 'FOC_NONE', &TIAA_NO = 'FOC_NONE', &FROM_DATE = '', &TO_DATE = ''
-SET &CAL_YR = &YEAR;
-SET &PAYNUM = IF &PAYNO EQ 'ALL' THEN 'FOC_NONE' ELSE
- IF &PAYNO LT 10 THEN EDIT('&PAYNO.EVAL','$9') ELSE &PAYNO;
-SET &FROM_DATE = IF &FROM_DATE EQ ' ' THEN 'FOC_NONE' ELSE &FROM_DATE;
-SET &TO_DATE = IF &TO_DATE EQ ' ' THEN 'FOC_NONE' ELSE &TO_DATE;
-SET &PAY_TEXT = IF &PAYNUM EQ 'FOC_NONE' THEN 'All Pay Cycles' ELSE &PAYNUM;
-*******************************************************************************
SET ASNAMES = ON, BYDISPLAY = ON
-*************************************************
-SET &RPT_NAME = 'HR 403B';
TABLE FILE SPRIDEN
SUM
     SPRIDEN_ID
     COMPUTE FULL_NAME/A80 = SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME||', '||SUBSTR(60, SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,1, 20, 20,'A20');
  BY SPRIDEN_PIDM
 ON TABLE HOLD AS XHOLD
END
-RUN
-*************************************************
-INCLUDE hr_ret_403b_source.fex
-*************************************************
JOIN LEFT_OUTER ID IN ALL_DATA TO SPRIDEN_PIDM IN XHOLD AS JJ1
-RUN
TABLE FILE ALL_DATA PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS GOT_DATA
END
-RUN
-*************************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-*************************************************
-* Summary
-*************************************************
DEFINE FILE GOT_DATA
  X_SRC/A10 = IF SOURCE EQ '99' THEN 'Employer' ELSE 'Employee';
  EMPR_AMT/P20.2MC = IF SOURCE EQ '99' THEN AMT ELSE 0;
  EMPL_AMT/P20.2MC = IF SOURCE NE '99' THEN AMT ELSE 0;
  SUM_AMT/P20.2MC = EMPR_AMT + EMPL_AMT;
  DUMMY/A1 = '';
  KEY_SORT/A1 = DECODE PLAN_NAME('FIDELITY' '1' 'PRUDENTIAL' '2' ELSE '3');
  EVENT_DATE/MDYY = PHRHIST_EVENT_DATE;
END
TABLE FILE GOT_DATA
SUM
-* SUM_AMT NOPRINT
      EMPR_AMT NOPRINT
      EMPL_AMT NOPRINT
   ACROSS PLAN_NAME NOPRINT
SUM
    EMPR_AMT AS 'Employer Amt'
    EMPL_AMT AS 'Employee Amt' AND ROW-TOTAL AS 'Grand Total'
  BY PHRHIST_PAYNO AS 'Payroll #'
  BY PHRHIST_SEQ_NO AS 'Payroll Adj.'
  BY PHRHIST_PICT_CODE AS 'Pict Code'
   ACROSS PLAN_NAME AS '' ACROSS-TOTAL AS 'Total'
   ACROSS SUB_PLAN_NAME AS ''
   ACROSS PLAN_NO AS ''
ON TABLE SUMMARIZE AS 'Total'
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=TITLE, FONT='TIMES NEW ROMAN', STYLE=BOLD, JUSTIFY=LEFT,$
TYPE=REPORT, FONT='VERDANA', SIZE = 8, TITLETEXT='&RPT_NAME.EVAL Summary',$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE, STYLE=BOLD, JUSTIFY=CENTER,$
TYPE=GRANDTOTAL, STYLE=BOLD,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-*************************************************
-* Detail
-*************************************************
TABLE FILE GOT_DATA
SUM
    EMPR_AMT AS 'Employer Amt'
    EMPL_AMT AS 'Employee Amt'
  BY FULL_NAME AS 'Employee Name'
  BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'
  BY PHRHIST_PAYNO AS 'Payroll #'
  BY EVENT_DATE AS 'Payroll Date'
  BY PHRHIST_SEQ_NO AS 'Payroll Adj.'
  BY PHRHIST_PICT_CODE AS 'Pict Code'
  BY PLAN_NAME AS 'Plan'
  BY PLAN_NO AS 'Account'
  BY SUB_PLAN_NAME AS 'Account Description'
  BY DED_CODE AS 'BDCA Code'
-*WHERE SOURCE NE '99'
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=TITLE, FONT='TIMES NEW ROMAN', STYLE=BOLD, JUSTIFY=LEFT,$
TYPE=REPORT, FONT='VERDANA', TITLETEXT='&RPT_NAME.EVAL Employee Details' ,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-*************************************************
-* Parameters
-*************************************************
JOIN CLEAR *
-RUN
TABLE FILE ALL_DATA
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"HR Retirement 403B Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"Plan Selected:<+0>&PLAN_TEXT"
-IF &PLAN NE '1' GOTO CK_FIDL;
"Sub Plan:<+0>ALL"
-GOTO XDONE
-CK_FIDL
-IF &PLAN NE '2' GOTO BOTH;
"Sub Plan:<+0>&FIDL_NO_TEXT"
-GOTO XDONE
-BOTH
"Sub Plan:<+0>&PRUD_NO_TEXT"
-XDONE
"Calendar Year:<+0>&CAL_YR"
"Pay Cycle:<+0>&PAY_TEXT"
"From Date:<+0>&FROM_DATE"
"To Date:<+0>&TO_DATE"

PRINT
    PLAN_NAME NOPRINT
WHERE READLIMIT EQ 1;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN

-GOTO EOJ
-*****************************************************************
-NOREC
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_NORECMSG
-*****************************************************************
-EOJ
-INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-MRNOEDIT END
-EXIT

name: collections-account-activity-report
overview:
The Collections Account Activity Report report is used by the Finance Collections Department to create a list of students that are in arrears. The report contains the Student Id (FIDN), Student Name, Term, Entry Date, Detail Code and Description, Delinquency Code, Charge/Payment Indicator, Amount, and Balance.

The User has the option to select the From and To Date, Delinquency Code and Sort By Option. They also get to select the Output Format of the report.

acf.overview:
The Collections Account Activity Report report is used by the Finance Collections Department to create a list of students that are in arrears. The report contains the Student Id (FIDN), Student Name, Term, Entry Date, Detail Code and Description, Delinquency Code, Charge/Payment Indicator, Amount, and Balance.

The User has the option to select the From and To Date, Delinquency Code and Sort By Option. They also get to select the Output Format of the report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_154509.fex
-*****************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;

-*****************************
-SET &ECHO= OFF;

-SET &OPEN = IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '';
-*-SET &TIME1 = EDIT(&TOD,'99');
-*-SET &TIME2 = EDIT(&TOD,'$$$:99$$$$');
-*-SET &TIME3 = IF &TIME1 GT '12' THEN EDIT(&TIME1) - 12 ELSE
-*- IF &TIME1 EQ 0 THEN 12 ELSE EDIT(&TIME1);
-*-SET &TIME4 = IF &TIME1 GT 11 THEN 'PM' ELSE 'AM';
-*-SET &TIME = &TIME3 || &TIME2 || &TIME4;

-*SET &SPRI = IF &SORT EQ 'SPRI' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &FULL = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &DELIS = IF &SORT EQ 'DELIS' OR 'DELIBAL' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &BAL = IF &SORT EQ 'BAL' OR 'DELIBAL' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-SET &ADJUSTN2 = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' OR 'DELIS' THEN 'N3' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'BAL' THEN 'N4' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'DELIBAL' THEN 'N5' ELSE 'N2';
-SET &ADJUSTN5 = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' OR 'DELIS' THEN 'N6' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'BAL' THEN 'N7' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'DELIBAL' THEN 'N8' ELSE 'N5';
-SET &ADJUSTN7 = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' OR 'DELIS' THEN 'N8' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'BAL' THEN 'N9' ELSE

-SET &ADJUSTN9 = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' OR 'DELIS' THEN 'N10' ELSE

- IF &SORT EQ 'DELIBAL' THEN 'N12' ELSE 'N9';
-SET &BYSORT = IF &SORT EQ 'FULL' OR 'DELIS' THEN '2' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'BAL' THEN '3' ELSE
- IF &SORT EQ 'DELIBAL' THEN '4' ELSE '1';
-IF &FMT NE 'EXL2K' THEN GOTO NOSKIP;
SET BYDISPLAY = ON
-NOSKIP

SET PRINTPLUS=ON
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE
SQL SQLORA PREPARE MARCO FOR
SELECT SPRIDEN_ID,
         SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' '
         || (CASE
                WHEN SPRIDEN_MI IS NULL THEN ''
                ELSE SUBSTR (SPRIDEN_MI, 1, 1) || '.'
             END)
            FULLNAME,
         SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME,
         SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,
         SPRIDEN_MI,
         TBBACCT_DELI_CODE,
         TTVDELI_UPDATE_IND,
         TBBACCT_BILL_IND,
         TBBACCT_BILL_CODE,
         TO_CHAR (TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') Entry_Date,
         TBRACCD_TERM_CODE,
         TBRACCD_USER,
         TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE,
         TBBDETC_DESC,
         TBBDETC_TYPE_IND,
         TO_CHAR (TBRACCD_AMOUNT, '$999,990.99') Amount,
         TO_CHAR (ACCOUNT_BALANCE, '$999,990.99') Balance,
    (CASE
             WHEN ACCOUNT_BALANCE = 0 THEN 1
             WHEN ACCOUNT_BALANCE < 0 THEN 2
             WHEN ACCOUNT_BALANCE > 0 THEN 3
             ELSE 0
          END) SRT
  FROM SPRIDEN,
         TBBACCT,
         TTVDELI,
         TTVBILL,
         AT_AR_BALANCE_BY_ENTITY,
         (SELECT *
            FROM TBRACCD, TBBDETC
           WHERE TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE = TBBDETC_DETAIL_CODE(+))
 WHERE NVL (TBBACCT_DELI_CODE, ' ') = TTVDELI_CODE(+)
         AND NVL (TBBACCT_BILL_CODE, ' ') = TTVBILL_CODE(+)
         AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = TBBACCT_PIDM
         AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = TBRACCD_PIDM(+)
         AND SPRIDEN_PIDM = PIDM_KEY(+)
         AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
         AND TBBACCT_DELI_CODE IS NOT NULL
         AND TO_CHAR (TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') >= '&FDATE'
         AND TO_CHAR (TBRACCD_ENTRY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') <= '&TDATE';
END

TABLE FILE MARCO
PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS MARCO1 FORMAT FOCUS INDEX SPRIDEN_ID
END
-RUN



TABLE FILE MARCO1
PRINT
     AMOUNT AS 'Amount'
COMPUTE CNTR/I5 = IF CNTR EQ 2 THEN 1 ELSE CNTR+1; NOPRINT
&NEXLCND.EVAL BALANCE AS 'Balance'


&FULL.EVAL BY FULLNAME NOPRINT
&DELIS.EVAL BY TBBACCT_DELI_CODE NOPRINT
&BAL.EVAL BY SRT NOPRINT
&BAL.EVAL BY BALANCE NOPRINT

BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'Student Id'
BY FULLNAME AS 'Student Name'
BY TBRACCD_TERM_CODE AS 'Term'
BY ENTRY_DATE AS 'Entry Date'
BY TBRACCD_USER AS 'User'
BY TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE AS 'Detail, Code'
BY TBBDETC_DESC AS 'Detail Code,Desc'
BY TBBACCT_DELI_CODE AS 'Delinquency,Code'
BY TBBDETC_TYPE_IND AS 'Charge,/Payment,Type Ind'

&EXLCND.EVAL ON SPRIDEN_ID NOSPLIT
&EXLCND.EVAL SUBFOOT "Account balance =<+0> <BALANCE "
&EXLCND.EVAL ON SPRIDEN_ID NOSPLIT
-*&EXLCND.EVAL ON SPRIDEN_ID NOSPLIT
&EXLCND.EVAL HEADING
&EXLCND.EVAL "Fordham University"
&EXLCND.EVAL "Collections Account Activity Report"
&EXLCND.EVAL "&DATEMDYY"
&EXLCND.EVAL "From Date: <+0>&FDATE"
&EXLCND.EVAL "To Date: <+0>&TDATE"
&EXLCND.EVAL FOOTING
&EXLCND.EVAL "<TABPAGENO /<TABLASTPAGE "
WHERE TBBACCT_DELI_CODE EQ &DELI.(OR(FIND TTVDELI_CODE,TTVDELI_DESC IN TTVDELI)).DELI.;

name: hrs-mailing-list-report
overview:
The HRS Mailing List Report give the HRIS Staff the ability to generate Mailing Lists by Employee Category, Position Category or Benefit Category. The report contains the Employee FIDN, Employee Name, Ecls Code, Ecls Description, Department, Building and Campus the Employee is located and the Employee’s short name. Depending on the Category selected you can have the PCLS Code and Title, the BCAT Code and Description along with the ECLS Code and Description listed in the report.

The user selects the Report (Employee, Position or Benefit), Last Work Date, Employee category or ALL and the report output format to process the report.

acf.overview:
The HRS Mailing List Report give the HRIS Staff the ability to generate Mailing Lists by Employee Category, Position Category or Benefit Category. The report contains the Employee FIDN, Employee Name, Ecls Code, Ecls Description, Department, Building and Campus the Employee is located and the Employee’s short name. Depending on the Category selected you can have the PCLS Code and Title, the BCAT Code and Description along with the ECLS Code and Description listed in the report.

The user selects the Report (Employee, Position or Benefit), Last Work Date, Employee category or ALL and the report output format to process the report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File hr_mail_listing_rpt.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: BAN_HRS
-* Name: hr_mail_listing_rpt.fex
-* Purpose: Mail Listing
-* Tables/Views: Many
-* Parameters: Fiscal Year
-* Execution: On Demand
-* Comments:
-*
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20111011 | TJF - Initial development
-* 20111024 | TJF - Added Today Date if &LST_WRK_DT is NULL
-* 20120315 | TJF - Removed NOPRINT from SPRIDEN_ID
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-DEFAULTS &RPT = '2', &LST_WRK_DT = '08/01/2012', &ECLS_CODE = 'FOC_NONE', &PCLS_CODE = 'FOC_NONE', &BCAT_CODE = 'FOC_NONE', &FMT = EXL2K
-SET &ECHO=OFF; 
SET LINES=99998
-SET &LST_WRK_DT = IF &LST_WRK_DT EQ '' THEN &DATEMDYY ELSE &LST_WRK_DT;
-SET &X_LST_WRK = EDIT('&LST_WRK_DT.EVAL','$$$$$$9999/') || EDIT('&LST_WRK_DT.EVAL','99999');
-SET &OPEN = IF &FMT EQ AHTML THEN ' ' ELSE 'OPEN';
-SET &CMT = IF &FMT EQ AHTML THEN ' ' ELSE '-*';
-*******************************************************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE MAIL_OUT FOR
SELECT DISTINCT
     NBRBJOB_POSN
    ,NBRBJOB_CONTRACT_TYPE
    ,NBRBJOB_BEGIN_DATE
    ,NBRBJOB_END_DATE
    ,NBRBJOB_CONTRACT_TYPE
    ,NBBPOSN_POSN
    ,NBBPOSN_PCLS_CODE
    ,NBBPOSN_TITLE
    ,PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE
    ,PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE
    ,PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME
    ,PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE
    ,PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS
    ,SPRIDEN_ID
    ,SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
    ,SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
    ,SPRIDEN_MI
    ,PTRBCAT_CODE
    ,PTRBCAT_DESC
    ,PTRJBLN_DESC
    ,PTRJBLN_ADDRESS1
    ,PTRJBLN_ADDRESS2
    ,PTRECLS_CODE
    ,PTRECLS_LONG_DESC
    ,GOBTPAC_EXTERNAL_USER

FROM PEBEMPL, NBBPOSN, NBRBJOB, SPRIDEN, PTRECLS, PTRJBLN, PTRBCAT, GOBTPAC

WHERE PEBEMPL_PIDM = NBRBJOB_PIDM
  AND PEBEMPL_PIDM = SPRIDEN_PIDM
  AND PEBEMPL_PIDM = GOBTPAC_PIDM
  AND NBRBJOB_POSN = NBBPOSN_POSN
  AND PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME = PTRJBLN_CODE
  AND PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE = PTRECLS_CODE
  AND PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE = PTRBCAT_CODE
  AND ((TO_CHAR(PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') >= '&X_LST_WRK')
   OR (PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE IS NULL))
  AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
;
END
-*******************************************************************************
DEFINE FILE MAIL_OUT
  EMPL_NAME/A45 = SUBSTR(240,SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME,1,30,30, 'A17') || (', ' |
                  SUBSTR(240,SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,1,20,20,'A12') || ' ' |
                  SUBSTR(240,SPRIDEN_MI,1,20,20,'A10'));
  EMPL_MI/A2 = IF EDIT(SPRIDEN_MI,'9') NE '' THEN EDIT(SPRIDEN_MI,'9.') ELSE '';
  POSN_TYPE/A10 = DECODE NBRBJOB_CONTRACT_TYPE ( 'P' 'Primary' 'S' 'Secondary' 'O' 'Overload' ELSE 'Unknown');
END
TABLE FILE MAIL_OUT
SUM
    SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME AS 'Employee Last Name'
    SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME AS 'Employee First Name'
    EMPL_MI AS 'MI'
-* PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE
-* NBRBJOB_BEGIN_DATE AS 'Position Start'
-* NBRBJOB_END_DATE AS 'Position End'
-* PEBEMPL_EMPL_STATUS AS 'Status'
    PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE AS 'ECLS Code'
    PTRECLS_LONG_DESC AS 'ECLS Description'
-IF &RPT NE '3' GOTO SKIP_3;
    PEBEMPL_BCAT_CODE AS 'BCAT Code'
    PTRBCAT_DESC AS 'BCAT Description'
-SKIP_3
-IF &RPT NE '2' GOTO SKIP_2;
    NBBPOSN_PCLS_CODE AS 'PCLS Code'
    NBBPOSN_TITLE AS 'PCLS Title'
-SKIP_2
    PTRJBLN_DESC AS 'Department'
    PTRJBLN_ADDRESS1 AS 'Building'
    PTRJBLN_ADDRESS2 AS 'Campus'
    GOBTPAC_EXTERNAL_USER
  BY EMPL_NAME NOPRINT
  BY SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'
  BY HIGHEST 1 NBRBJOB_END_DATE NOPRINT
-****************************************
-GOTO DO_WHERE_&RPT
-****************************************
-DO_WHERE_1
WHERE PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE EQ &ECLS_CODE;
-GOTO DO_TABLE
-****************************************
-DO_WHERE_2

-****************************************

ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF

ON TABLE SET STYLE *

TYPE=REPORT, TITLETEXT='HR Mail Listing', GRID=ON, $
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
&CMT.EVAL -EXIT

-****************************************

-****************************************

"Fordham University"
"HR Mail Listing Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"Report:<+0>&RPT_TEXT"
"Last Work Date:<+0>&LST_WRK_DT"

-****************************************

-****************************************

"Employee Category:<+0>&ECLS_CODE"
-GOTO END_HDR
-****************************************

WHERE RECORDLIMIT EQ 1;

TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $

name: hrs-comment-report
overview: The HRS Comment Report is used mainly by the HRIS staff to keep track of information that would not fit anywhere else in Banner, (ex: retired Employees granted e-mail for life). The information includes the Employee Name, FIDN, Comment Code, Comment Text, and the Employees Short Name. it defaults to an Excel output.
