name: annual-notification-acknowledgment-report
overview:
The Annual Notification Acknowledgment Report is used to track employees who have or have not acknowledged the notification of PayRate and Payday Hourly Rate
as well as indicate who has requested to receive the notification in another language. It includes the employees FIDN, Name, Employee ORG Code, Job Description, Comp Category Description, Other language requested.

The User has the option via Parameter dropdowns to select the HR Status Date, Additional Language, All/Acknowledge/Not Acknowledge, Notification Type and Output Format.

acf.overview:
The Annual Notification Acknowledgment Report is used to track employees who have or have not acknowledged the notification of PayRate and Payday Hourly Rate
as well as indicate who has requested to receive the notification in another language. It includes the employees FIDN, Name, Employee ORG Code, Job Description, Comp Category Description, Other language requested.

The User has the option via Parameter dropdowns to select the HR Status Date, Additional Language, All/Acknowledge/Not Acknowledge, Notification Type and Output Format.

sql.sql_code:
-* File hr_ann_notif_ack.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application:
-* Name: Annual Notification Acknowledgement Report
-* Purpose: Used to track who has or has not acknowledged the notification
-*	as well as indicate who has requested to receive the notification in another language
-* Tables/Views:
-* Parameters: DATE, ACKNOWLEDGE, ADD_LANGUAGE, NOTIFICATION_TYPE
-* Execution: Content/Human Resources Payroll
-* Comments: Owners: Damarie Cardona, Marlyn Soto
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20140904 | JAH - Initial development
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-************************************
-DEFAULT &INSTANCE = 'PROD';
-************************************
-DEFAULT &DATE = ' '
-DEFAULT &YEAR	= '2014'
-DEFAULT &ACKNOWLEDGE = 'FOC_NONE'
-DEFAULT &ADD_LANGUAGE = 'N'
-DEFAULT &NOTIFICATION_TYPE = 'FOC_NONE'
-DEFAULT &FMT = 'EXL2K'
-************************************
-SET &ECHO= ALL;
SET BYDISPLAY = ON
SET PAGE-NUM = OFF
-SET &ACK_COMMENT = IF (&ACKNOWLEDGE EQ 'ACK') THEN ' ' ELSE
- IF (&ACKNOWLEDGE EQ 'FOC_NONE') THEN ' ' ELSE '-*';
-SET &ADDLANG = IF (&ADD_LANGUAGE EQ 'Y') AND (&ACKNOWLEDGE EQ 'NO_ACK') THEN 'IS-NOT' ELSE 'IS';
-SET &ACK_COMMENT2 = IF (&ACKNOWLEDGE EQ 'FOC_NONE') THEN '-*' ELSE ' ';

-SET &OPEN = IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '';
-************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION &INSTANCE.EVAL
ENGINE SQLORA SET DATETIME OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE H1 FOR
SELECT
 SPRIDEN_ID,
 SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME,
 SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME,
 SPRIDEN_PIDM,
-*	PEBEMPL_HOME_ORG,
 PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME,
 PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE,
 PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE,
 COMP_VER_HR_JOB,
 COMP_VER_HR_STATUS,
 COMP_VER_HR_EMP_ACK,
 COMP_VER_HR_EMP_ACK_LANG,
 COMP_VER_HR_STATUS_DATE,
 COMP_VER_HR_CAT_ID,
 COMP_CAT_DESC

FROM PEBEMPL, SPRIDEN, COMP_VER_HR, COMP_CATEGORY

WHERE TO_CHAR(PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') > '&DATEYYMD'
AND PEBEMPL_PIDM = SPRIDEN_PIDM
AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
AND SPRIDEN_ID = COMP_VER_HR_FIDN
AND COMP_VER_HR_YEAR = '&YEAR'
AND COMP_VER_HR_CAT_ID = COMP_CAT_ID(+)
-*AND PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE NOT IN ('MM','S1','S2','GA')
-*AND PEBEMPL_ECLS_CODE IS NOT NULL

;

END
-RUN

-*DEFINE FILE EMPL_OUT
-* LWD_YY/YYMD = PEBEMPL_LAST_WORK_DATE;
-*END

TABLE FILE H1
PRINT
   SPRIDEN_ID
   SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME
   SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME
   PEBEMPL_ORGN_CODE_HOME
   COMP_VER_HR_JOB
   COMP_VER_HR_STATUS
   COMP_CAT_DESC
&ACK_COMMENT COMP_VER_HR_EMP_ACK
   COMP_VER_HR_EMP_ACK_LANG
   COMP_VER_HR_STATUS_DATE
&ACK_COMMENT2.EVAL WHERE COMP_VER_HR_EMP_ACK_LANG &ADDLANG MISSING;
WHERE COMP_CAT_DESC CONTAINS '&NOTIFICATION_TYPE'

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT &OPEN
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
     ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
     TITLETEXT='Notification Acknowledgement',
$
TYPE=REPORT,
     GRID=OFF,
     FONT='ARIAL',
     SIZE=9,
     COLOR='BLACK',
     BACKCOLOR='NONE',
     STYLE=NORMAL,
$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-*****************************************
-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NO_RECS;
-IF &FMT NE 'EXL2K' GOTO ENDRPT;
-*****************************************
TABLE FILE h1
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Annual Notification Acknowledgement Report"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtMDYY"
"Date:<+0>&DATE"
"Acknowledgement:<+0>&ACKNOWLEDGE"
"Additional Language:<+0>&ADD_LANGUAGE"
"Notification Type:<+0>&NOTIFICATION_TYPE"

PRINT
    SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
WHERE READLIMIT EQ 1;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-GOTO ENDRPT
-*****************************************
-NO_RECS
-INCLUDE fordham_norecmsg
-*****************************************
-ENDRPT
-INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-MRNOEDIT END

name: cashier-log-report
overview:
The Cashier Log Report is used by the Finance/AR Department to reconcile the various cash deposits etc received within a date range. It contains details such as the Feed Date, Cashier,  SubTotals by Cashiers, Transactioon Date, Session #, Deposit Type (ex: Cash, Wire, Amex, Visa MC, Discover etc.) and a Grand Total of all transactions.

The User select the  Feed From and Feed To Date to select the transaction dates for their report. They also have the ability to select the Output format.

acf.overview:
The Cashier Log Report is used by the Finance/AR Department to reconcile the various cash deposits etc received within a date range. It contains details such as the Feed Date, Cashier,  SubTotals by Cashiers, Transactioon Date, Session #, Deposit Type (ex: Cash, Wire, Amex, Visa MC, Discover etc.) and a Grand Total of all transactions.

The User select the  Feed From and Feed To Date to select the transaction dates for their report. They also have the ability to select the Output format.

sql.sql_code:
-* File fin_cshrlog.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-* Application: Banner/ODS
-* Name: Cashier's Log Report for Finance Department
-* Purpose: Human resources missing tax deductions
-* Tables/Views: SPRIDEN, PEBEMPL, PTRECLS, PTRBDCA, PTRBCDN, NBRJOBS, NBRBJOB
-* Parameters: FMT, FEEDDATE FROM, FEEDDATE TO
-* Execution: On-Demand from HTML screen - called from fin_cshrlog.htm
-* Comments: This report is going against TBRACCD instead of GURFEED table
-* because Gurfeed only has TERZULLI as cashier name in it.
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* 20090710 | Khine - Initial development
-* 20091204 | Khine - Added deposit table to the report
-* 20091026 | Khine - Added Tab delimited to the output
-* 20111006 | GEN - Bug fix: should pick up P500 - added to CHCK defined field
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* 20120112 | TF Added On-Line Transactions:
-* 1. D650 & D653 Online ACH
-* 2. D651 & D654 Online Visa/ MC / Discover
-* 3. D652 & D655 Online Amex
-* 20120529 | TF Added P020 to Wire bucket
-* 20120607 | TF Added D961 to Deposit Bucket
-* 20130122 | TF Pull Effective Date for Deposits
-* Change Cashier ID based on Detail Codes
-* 20130320 | TF Add codes D300,D310,D320,D330,D606,D656 to Deposit bucket
-* Change CORCTIONS to negative
-* 20151215 | REM Added D299 to Deposit Bucket (Magic # 422574)
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-**************************************
-*APP PATH ban_stu
-INCLUDE RPTBEGIN.FEX
-SET &ECHO = OFF;
SET ASNAMES = ON
SET NODATA = ' '
SET BYDISPLAY = ON

-* FOR DATES
-****** for feed date range
-DEFAULT &FROMDT ='04/10/2013';
-DEFAULT &TODT ='04/11/2013';

-DEFAULT &FMT = 'EXL2K';

-SET &FDT1 = (EDIT (&FROMDT,'$$$$$$9999') || EDIT(&FROMDT,'99$99$'));
-SET &FDT2 = (EDIT (&TODT,'$$$$$$9999') || EDIT(&TODT,'99$99$'));

-IF &FDT1 GT &FDT2 THEN GOTO DTERR ELSE
-IF &FDT1 EQ ' ' OR &FDT2 EQ ' ' THEN GOTO DTERR ELSE GOTO FDATE;

-FDATE
-SET &FEEDT_WH = IF &FDT1 EQ &FDT2 THEN
- 'WHERE (FEED_DATE EQ ' | '''' || &FROMDT | '''' | ' ' | ');' ELSE
- 'WHERE (FEED_DATE GE ' | '''' | &FROMDT | '''' | ' ' | ')' |
- ' AND (FEED_DATE LE ' | '''' | &TODT | '''' | ' ' | ');';

-TYPE &FEEDT_WH
-SET &DTHDR = IF &FDT1 EQ &FDT2 THEN ( 'For Feed date ' | &FROMDT ) ELSE
- 'For Feed dates ' | &FROMDT | ' to ' | &TODT;

DEFINE FILE TBRDEPO
DETLCD/A04 = TBRDEPO_DETAIL_CODE_PAYMENT;
-*TRANS_DATE/MDYY = HDATE (TBRDEPO_TRANS_DATE, TRANS_DATE);
TRANS_DATE/MDYY = HDATE (TBRDEPO_EFFECTIVE_DATE, TRANS_DATE);
FEED_DATE /MDYY = HDATE (TBRDEPO_FEED_DATE,FEED_DATE);
CSHR_END_DATE/MDYY = HDATE (TBRDEPO_CSHR_END_DATE, CSHR_END_DATE);
END

TABLE FILE TBRDEPO
PRINT
   TRANS_DATE
   FEED_DATE
   CSHR_END_DATE
   TBRDEPO_AMOUNT
   TBRDEPO_DESC
   TBRDEPO_USER AS 'CSHR'
   TBRDEPO_SESSION_NUMBER AS 'SESSION_NUM'
WHERE TBRDEPO_DETAIL_CODE_PAYMENT IN ('D950','D955','D907','D951','D952','D953','D954','D955','D956','D957','D958',
                                      'D959','D960','D961','D990','D650','D651','D652','D653','D654','D655','D300',
           'D310','D320','D330','D606','D656','D299');
&FEEDT_WH
WHERE TBRDEPO_ACCT_FEED_IND EQ 'F';
  BY DETLCD
 ON TABLE HOLD AS DEPOHLD
END
-RUN

-ACCD
DEFINE FILE TBRACCD
DETLCD/A04 = TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE;
D1TLCD/A01 = EDIT (TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE,'9');
TRANS_DATE/MDYY = HDATE (TBRACCD_TRANS_DATE, TRANS_DATE);
FEED_DATE/MDYY = HDATE(TBRACCD_FEED_DATE,FEED_DATE);
CSHR_END_DATE/MDYY = HDATE(TBRACCD_CSHR_END_DATE,CSHR_END_DATE);
END

TABLE FILE TBRACCD
PRINT
    TRANS_DATE
 FEED_DATE
    CSHR_END_DATE
    TBRACCD_AMOUNT
    TBRACCD_DESC
    TBRACCD_USER AS 'CSHR'
    TBRACCD_SESSION_NUMBER AS 'SESSION_NUM'
    &FEEDT_WH
    WHERE TBRACCD_ACCT_FEED_IND EQ 'F';
    WHERE D1TLCD EQ 'A' OR 'P' OR 'T'
    OR TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE EQ 'D990' OR 'D909'
    BY DETLCD
ON TABLE HOLD AS ACCDHLD
END
-RUN
?FF ACCDHLD
-RUN

TABLE FILE ACCDHLD
PRINT *
BY DETLCD NOPRINT
ON TABLE HOLD AS ACTFED
MORE
FILE DEPOHLD
END
-RUN

JOIN DETLCD IN ACTFED TO TBBDETC_DETAIL_CODE IN TBBDETC AS JD
JOIN DETLCD IN ACTFED TO TBRACCT_DETAIL_CODE IN TBRACCT AS TACCT
-RUN
-*TABLE FILE ACTFED PRINT *
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
-*END
-*-EXIT

-* 04/23/15 -REM
-* Removed Detail Code 'A040' from CHECK calculations as requested by Melissa Scriven on 4/20/15.
-*
DEFINE FILE ACTFED
WIRE /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P002' OR 'P260' OR 'P018' OR 'P019' OR 'P020' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0 ;

CHCK /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P000' OR 'P001' OR 'P094' OR 'P095' OR 'P096' OR
                              'P097' OR 'P098' OR 'P099' OR 'P100' OR 'P101' OR
                              'P130' OR 'P131' OR 'P140' OR 'P141' OR 'P150' OR
                              'P151' OR 'P152' OR 'P197' OR 'P198' OR 'P199' OR
                              'P299' OR 'D400' OR 'D500' OR 'D705' OR 'D002' OR
                              'P245' OR 'P500' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

-*CHCK /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P000' OR 'P001' OR 'P094' OR 'P095' OR 'P096' OR
-* 'P097' OR 'P098' OR 'P099' OR 'P100' OR 'P101' OR
-* 'P130' OR 'P131' OR 'P140' OR 'P141' OR 'P150' OR
-* 'P151' OR 'P152' OR 'P197' OR 'P198' OR 'P199' OR
-* 'P299' OR 'D400' OR 'D500' OR 'D705' OR 'A040' OR
-* 'D002' OR 'P245' OR 'P500' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

X_CASHIER/A30 = IF CSHR EQ 'WWWUSER' AND DETLCD IN ('D650','D653') THEN 'WWWACH' ELSE
                IF CSHR EQ 'WWWUSER' AND DETLCD IN ('D651','D652','D654','D655') THEN 'WWWCC' ELSE CSHR;

ONL_ACH/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD IN ('D650','D653') THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

ONL_VISA_MC_DISC/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD IN ('D651','D654') THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

ONL_AMEX/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD IN ('D652','D655') THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

CASH /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P017' OR 'D430' OR 'P704' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

CCVISA_MC/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P004' OR 'D410' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

CCAMEX /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P005' OR 'D420' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

CORCTIONS/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'D990' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT * (-1) ELSE 0;

DEPOSIT/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'D907' OR 'D950' OR 'D951' OR 'D909'
                             OR 'D952' OR 'D953' OR 'D954' OR 'D955' OR 'D956'
                             OR 'D957' OR 'D958' OR 'D959' OR 'D960' OR 'D961'
                             OR 'D300' OR 'D310' OR 'D320' OR 'D330' OR 'D606'
        OR 'D656' OR 'D299'
                   THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

LBOX_CK /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P016' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

LBOX_WIRE /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P160' OR 'P161' OR 'P162' OR 'P163' OR 'P164'
                                        THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

COLADJ/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P320' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

COLCASH/D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'TBA' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

-*CREDIT CARD MASTER VISA
COLCCMV /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'TBA' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

COLAMEX /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'TBA' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

PCMC /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P006' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

PCAX /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P007' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

GWMC /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P008' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

GWVS /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P009' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

GWAX /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P010' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

ACH /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P011' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

GWDS /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P012' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

DSCV /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P013' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

DBCD /D20.2BCM = IF DETLCD EQ 'P015' THEN TBRACCD_AMOUNT ELSE 0;

LOG_TOTAL/P15.2C = (WIRE + CHCK + CASH + CCVISA_MC + CCAMEX + DEPOSIT + CORCTIONS + LBOX_CK + LBOX_WIRE + COLADJ + COLCASH + COLCCMV + COLAMEX + PCMC +
                   PCAX + GWMC + GWVS + GWAX + ACH + GWDS + DSCV + DBCD + ONL_VISA_MC_DISC + ONL_ACH + ONL_AMEX );
CHKLOG/A01 = IF LOG_TOTAL EQ .00 OR .0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y';

END

TABLE FILE ACTFED
PRINT
  DETLCD
  TBRACCD_DESC
  TBBDETC_DESC
  TRANS_DATE FEED_DATE
  CSHR_END_DATE
  TBRACCD_AMOUNT
  CSHR
  SESSION_NUM
  CHCK
  CASH
  DEPOSIT
  WIRE
-*
  CCAMEX
  CCVISA_MC
  CORCTIONS
  DEPOSIT
-*
  LBOX_CK
  LBOX_WIRE
-*
  COLADJ
-*COLCASH
-*COLCCMV
-*COLAMEX
  ONL_ACH
  ONL_VISA_MC_DISC
  ONL_AMEX
-*
  GWAX
  GWMC
  GWVS
  GWDS
  DSCV
  DBCD
-*
  PCAX
  PCMC
  ACH
-*
  LOG_TOTAL
  &FEEDT_WH
  WHERE CHKLOG EQ 'Y';
  BY FEED_DATE
  BY TRANS_DATE NOPRINT
  BY SESSION_NUM NOPRINT
  BY X_CASHIER AS 'CSHR'
-* BY CSHR AS 'Cashier'
  ON TABLE COLUMN-TOTAL
ON TABLE HOLD AS ACCDHLD
END
-RUN
-IF &RECORDS EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;
DEFINE FILE ACCDHLD
FILLER /A11 = ' ';
END

-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN GOTO GETXLS ELSE
-IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' OR 'HTML' THEN GOTO GETPDHM ELSE GOTO GETTAB;


-*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-* CREATE THE REPORT AS A COMPOUND EXL2K REPORT - THIS IS THE SUMMARY
-*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-GETXLS
SET PANEL = 200
-RUN
TABLE FILE ACCDHLD
SUM
-*CSHR_END_DATE AS 'Cshr.End.Date'
-*If these two FILLER fields are always blank, why include them - QUESTION FOR Melissa ?
  FILLER AS 'Date Sent to Bank'

-*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-* CREATE THE REPORT AS A COMPOUND EXL2K REPORT - THESE ARE THE PARAMETERS
-*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TABLE FILE ACCDHLD
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Cashier's Log (Acctfeed) Report"
"&DATEMDYY &TOD"
"Beg Feed Date:<+0>&FROMDT<+0>"
"End Feed Date:<+0>&TODT"
"Format:<+0>&FMT"
" "
PRINT
CSHR NOPRINT
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=3, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=3, COLOR=RED,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=4, COLOR=RED,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN
-GOTO GETOUT;


-*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-* CREATE THE REPORT AS A PDF

-GETPDHM

-SET &CHKFMT = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' THEN '-*' ELSE ' ';
&CHKFMT.EVAL SET LINES=999999,PAGE=OFF,MSG=OFF,PAUSE=OFF

-SET &CHKF1 = IF &FMT EQ 'PDF' THEN ' ' ELSE '-*';
&CHKF1.EVAL SET PAGE-NUM = ON

SET SPACES=1, PRINTPLUS=ON
TABLE FILE ACCDHLD

"Fordham University"

"&DTHDR"
" "
"Run Date: &DATE &TOD"
" "
&CHKF1.EVAL " Warning: This report will Panel into another page due to many columns. Best to run in XLS format!"
SUM
-*CSHR_END_DATE AS 'Cshr.End.Date'
&CHKFMT.EVAL FILLER AS 'Date,Sent,to,Bank' IN +1
&CHKFMT.EVAL FILLER AS 'Bag,num' IN +1
CHCK/D20.2CM AS 'Check' IN +1
CASH/D20.2CM AS 'Cash' IN +1
CORCTIONS/D20.2BCM AS 'Corrections'
DEPOSIT/D20.2CM AS 'Deposit'
WIRE/D20.2CM AS 'Wire' IN +1
-*
CCAMEX/D20.2CM AS 'Amex' IN +1
CCVISA_MC/D20.2CM AS 'Visa,MC' IN +1
DSCV/D20.2CM AS 'Discover' IN +1
DBCD/D20.2CM AS 'Debit,Cd' IN +1
-*
ONL_ACH AS 'On-line ACH' IN +1
ONL_VISA_MC_DISC AS 'On-line Visa/MC/Discover' IN +1
ONL_AMEX AS 'On-line Amex' IN +1
-*
LBOX_CK/D20.2CM AS 'LBox,CK' IN +1
LBOX_WIRE/D20.2CM AS 'LBox,Wire' IN +1
-*
COLADJ/D20.2CM AS 'Col.,Adj.' IN +1
-*COLCASH AS 'Col.Cash' IN +1
-*COLCCMC AS 'Col.MC' IN +1
-*COLAMEX AS 'Col.Amex' IN +1
-*
GWAX/D20.2CM AS 'GW, Amex' IN +1
GWMC/D20.2CM AS 'GW, MC' IN +1
GWVS/D20.2CM AS 'GW, Visa' IN +1
GWDS/D20.2CM AS 'GW, Gateway Discover' IN +1
-*
PCAX/D20.2CM AS 'BM, Amex' IN +1
PCMC/D20.2CM AS 'BM, MC' IN +1
ACH/D20.2CM AS 'WebCheck' IN +1
-*
LOG_TOTAL/D20.2CM AS 'Log.Total' IN +1
&CHKFMT.EVAL FILLER AS 'Over,Short' IN +1
BY FEED_DATE AS 'Feed,Date' IN 0
BY CSHR SUBTOTAL AS 'Total Cashier:' NOPRINT
BY CSHR AS 'Cashier' IN +1
BY TRANS_DATE IN +1 AS 'Trans Date'
BY SESSION_NUM IN +1 AS 'Ses.Num'
ON FEED_DATE SUBTOTAL AS 'TOTAL FeedDate:'
ON TABLE SET BYDISPLAY ON
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,
     PAGESIZE='LEGAL',
     LEFTMARGIN=0.300000,
     RIGHTMARGIN=0.3000000,
     TOPMARGIN=0.180556,
     BOTTOMMARGIN=0.180556,
     SQUEEZE=ON,
  ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE,
$
TYPE=REPORT, GRID=OFF, FONT='TIMES NEW ROMAN', SIZE=9, COLOR='BLACK',HFREEZE=TOP,
     BACKCOLOR='NONE', STYLE=NORMAL,LEFTGAP=0.02, RIGHTGAP=0.02,
     TITLETEXT='Fordham University - CashierLog Report',$
$
TYPE=HEADING, JUSTIFY=CENTER, STYLE=BOLD, SIZE=9,
$
TYPE=FOOTING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=RIGHT,
$
TYPE=FOOTING, LINE=1, OBJECT=TEXT, ITEM=1, SIZE=6,
$
TYPE=FOOTING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=RIGHT,
$

$
TYPE=FOOTING, LINE=3, JUSTIFY=RIGHT,$

$
TYPE=SUBHEAD, SIZE=10, STYLE=BOLD, JUSTIFY=LEFT,
$
TYPE=DATA,BACKCOLOR=( 'WHITE' RGB(230 255 255) ),
$

$

$
TYPE=ACROSSTITLE, STYLE=BOLD,
$

ENDSTYLE
END

-GETTAB

TABLE FILE ACCDHLD

name: fee-lookup
overview:
The Fee Lookup Report is used to research/lookup the Fees for a selected Student in a particular TERM. The report contains a Description of the Fees, Nominal Charges, Nominal Payments and Transaction Date. It also includes Total Charges, Payments Total Credit Card Payments and Net Payable by Credit Card.

The User enters the TERM, and the Student ID, they also select the Output Format of the Report.

acf.overview:
The Fee Lookup Report is used to research/lookup the Fees for a selected Student in a particular TERM. The report contains a Description of the Fees, Nominal Charges, Nominal Payments and Transaction Date. It also includes Total Charges, Payments Total Credit Card Payments and Net Payable by Credit Card.

The User enters the TERM, and the Student ID, they also select the Output Format of the Report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File ar_ccpymt_lkp.fex
-*-SET &ECHO=ALL;
-**********************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
-DEFAULTH &ID = ' '
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-**********************************
SET ASNAMES=ON
SET PAGE-NUM=OFF
SET NODATA='.00';

-*Get PIDM for the &ID
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA SET VARCHAR OFF
SQL SQLORA PREPARE PIDM_OUT FOR

select *
from spriden
where spriden_id = '&ID'
and spriden_change_ind is null
;
END
TABLE FILE PIDM_OUT
PRINT
COMPUTE
PIDM/A9= PTOA(SPRIDEN_PIDM,'(P9)','A9');
BY SPRIDEN_PIDM NOPRINT
ON TABLE SET HOLDLIST PRINTONLY
ON TABLE HOLD AS HPIDM
END
-RUN
-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;

-*hold the value of PIDM in a variable so that you can pass it to next sql queries
-READ HPIDM &PIDM.I9
-TYPE &PIDM


-*get credit card fee eligibility criteria for the student
SQL SQLORA PREPARE STU_ELIG FOR
SELECT SPRIDEN_ID STUDENT_ID,
       SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || SPRIDEN_MI STUDENT_NAME,
       A1.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF TERM_CODE_EFF,
       A1.SGBSTDN_COLL_CODE_1,
       A2.CAT1_ELIGIBLE,
       A3.CAT2_ELIGIBLE,

       CASE
        WHEN A2.CAT1_ELIGIBLE IS NULL and A3.CAT2_ELIGIBLE IS NULL THEN 'Y'
       END AS CAT3_ELIGIBLE,

      CASE
        WHEN A2.CAT1_ELIGIBLE = 'Y' THEN 'NO RESTRICTION'
        WHEN A3.CAT2_ELIGIBLE = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(A1.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF,5,2)='30' THEN 'NO RESTRICTION'
        WHEN A3.CAT2_ELIGIBLE = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(A1.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF,5,2)<> '30' THEN 'CAN ONLY PAY NOMINAL FEES'
        ELSE 'CAN ONLY PAY NOMINAL FEES'
      END AS CALCULATED_CATEGORY

  FROM SGBSTDN A1

        INNER JOIN SPRIDEN ON (A1.SGBSTDN_PIDM = SPRIDEN_PIDM AND A1.SGBSTDN_PIDM = '&PIDM' AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL)


                  LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.SORLCUR_PIDM,
                                           'Y' CAT1_ELIGIBLE
                                      FROM SORLCUR T1
                                     WHERE T1.SORLCUR_COLL_CODE IN ('LS', 'LT')
            AND T1.SORLCUR_PIDM = '&PIDM'
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_LMOD_CODE = 'LEARNER'
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_SEQNO = (SELECT MAX (T2.SORLCUR_SEQNO)
                                                                 FROM SORLCUR T2
                                                                WHERE T2.SORLCUR_PIDM = T1.SORLCUR_PIDM)
                                    UNION
                                    SELECT T1.SORLCUR_PIDM,
                                           'Y' CAT1_ELIGIBLE
                                      FROM SORLCUR T1, SGRSATT TT
                                     WHERE T1.SORLCUR_COLL_CODE = 'CB'
            AND T1.SORLCUR_PIDM = '&PIDM'
                                       AND TT.SGRSATT_ATTS_CODE = 'ACEV'
                                       AND TT.SGRSATT_TERM_CODE_EFF <= (SELECT MAX (T3.SGRSATT_TERM_CODE_EFF)
                                                                          FROM SGRSATT T3
                                                                         WHERE T3.SGRSATT_PIDM = TT.SGRSATT_PIDM)
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_LMOD_CODE = 'LEARNER'
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_PIDM = TT.SGRSATT_PIDM
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_SEQNO = (SELECT MAX (T2.SORLCUR_SEQNO)
                                                                 FROM SORLCUR T2
                                                                WHERE T2.SORLCUR_PIDM='&PIDM' AND T2.SORLCUR_PIDM = T1.SORLCUR_PIDM)) A2 ON (A2.SORLCUR_PIDM = A1.SGBSTDN_PIDM)


                  LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.SORLCUR_PIDM,
                                           'Y' CAT2_ELIGIBLE
                                      FROM SORLCUR T1
                                     WHERE T1.SORLCUR_COLL_CODE IN ('FC', 'CL','CB','GA','GR')
            AND T1.SORLCUR_PIDM = '&PIDM'
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_LMOD_CODE = 'LEARNER'
                                       AND T1.SORLCUR_SEQNO = (SELECT MAX (T2.SORLCUR_SEQNO)
                                                                 FROM SORLCUR T2
                                                                WHERE T2.SORLCUR_PIDM='&PIDM' AND T2.SORLCUR_PIDM = T1.SORLCUR_PIDM)) A3 ON (A3.SORLCUR_PIDM = A1.SGBSTDN_PIDM)


 WHERE A1.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = (SELECT MAX (A4.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF)
                                     FROM SGBSTDN A4
                                    WHERE A4.SGBSTDN_PIDM = A1.SGBSTDN_PIDM
           AND A4.SGBSTDN_PIDM = '&PIDM'
                                      AND A4.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF <= '&TERM')
-* AND A1.SGBSTDN_STST_CODE = 'AS'
;
END
TABLE FILE STU_ELIG
PRINT *
ON TABLE HOLD AS HSTU_ELIG
END
-RUN
-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC;

-*hold the fee eligibility in a variable
TABLE FILE HSTU_ELIG
BY CALCULATED_CATEGORY
ON TABLE HOLD
END
-RUN
-READ HOLD &CALCULATED_CATEGORY.A25


-*calculate charges, payments, nominal charges and nominal payments
-*nominal chgs/pymts are indicated by pay type code Z
SQL SQLORA PREPARE TBR_DET FOR
select
tbraccd_pidm,
 &TERM AS TERM_CODE, tbraccd_detail_code,tbbdetc_desc,
case when tbbdetc_type_ind ='C' then tbraccd_amount end as total_chgs,
case when tbbdetc_type_ind ='P' then tbraccd_amount end as total_pymts,
 case when (tbbdetc_type_ind ='C' and tbbdetc_payt_code = 'Z') then tbraccd_amount end as tot_nom_chgs,
case when (tbbdetc_type_ind ='P' and tbbdetc_payt_code = 'Z') then tbraccd_amount end as tot_nom_pymts,
tbbdetc_payt_code,
tbraccd_effective_date,tbraccd_trans_date, to_char(tbraccd_trans_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') as trans_date

            FROM TBRACCD, TBBDETC
         WHERE TBRACCD_DETAIL_CODE = TBBDETC_DETAIL_CODE
           AND TBRACCD_PIDM = '&PIDM'
           AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE = '&TERM'
order by TBBDETC_TYPE_IND ;
END

-*Output
TABLE FILE TBR_DET
SUM TOTAL_CHGS NOPRINT TOTAL_PYMTS NOPRINT TOT_NOM_CHGS NOPRINT TOT_NOM_PYMTS NOPRINT
-*if a student has no fee restriction, then bal is tot charges- payments
-*if a student has fee restriction, then bal would be tot charges for nominal fee - tot payments for nominal fee
COMPUTE TOT_CR_BAL/D20.2= IF '&CALCULATED_CATEGORY.EVAL' LIKE '%NOM%' THEN TOT_NOM_CHGS-TOT_NOM_PYMTS ELSE TOTAL_CHGS-TOTAL_PYMTS; NOPRINT
COMPUTE DUMMY/A1=' '; NOPRINT
BY TBRACCD_PIDM

PRINT TBBDETC_DESC AS 'Description'
TOT_NOM_CHGS AS 'Nominal Charges' TOT_NOM_PYMTS AS 'Nominal Payments'
TRANS_DATE AS 'Transaction Date'
BY TBRACCD_PIDM NOPRINT

HEADING CENTER
"Fee lookup for &ID"
"Fee calculation: &CALCULATED_CATEGORY"
"<DUMMY for term &TERM"
ON TABLE SUBFOOT
"Summary of Charges and Payments"
"Total Charges <TOTAL_CHGS"
"Total Payments <TOTAL_PYMTS"
"Total Credit Card Payments <TOT_NOM_PYMTS"
"Net Payable by Credit Card <TOT_CR_BAL"
ON TABLE COLUMN-TOTAL AS ' '
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT,SQUEEZE=ON, FONT=DEFAULT-PROPORTIONAL, TITLETEXT='Fee Lookup', ORIENTATION=LANDSCAPE, $
TYPE=HEADING,STYLE=BOLD+ITALIC,$
TYPE=TITLE, BACKCOLOR=SILVER,STYLE=BOLD,JUSTIFY=LEFT,$
TYPE=TABFOOTING,STYLE=BOLD,BORDER-TOP=LIGHT,BORDER-BOTTOM=LIGHT,HEADALIGN=BODY,BACKCOLOR=SILVER,$
TYPE=GRANDTOTAL,STYLE=BOLD,COLOR=MAROON,$
ENDSTYLE
-*ON TABLE SET EMPTYREPORT ON

-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLFMT;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
-GOTO OTHERFMTS
-EXLFMT
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-OTHERFMTS

END
-RUN

-IF &LINES EQ 0 GOTO NOREC;
-*************************************************************************
-Parameters
-*************************************************************************
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN GOTO GETXLS;
-GOTO ENDRPT

-GETXLS

TABLE FILE TBR_DET
PRINT TOTAL_CHGS NOPRINT
WHERE READLIMIT EQ 1

HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Fee Lookup"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtrMDYY"
"Term:<+0>&_TEXT"
"ID:<+0>&ID"

ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$
TYPE=REPORT, WRAP=OFF,$
ENDSTYLE
END
-RUN

-GOTO ENDRPT
-**********************
-NOREC
-**********************
-INCLUDE FORDHAM_NORECMSG
-**********************
-ENDRPT
-INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex
-MRNOEDIT END
-EXIT

name: fa-perkins-loans-disb-report
overview:
The FA Perkins Loans Disb Report is used by the Financial Aid Office, it uses the PowerFaids DB to extract information for the report. It includes information on the Loans Disbursement including the Student’s FIDN, Student Name, Loan Advance Amount Advance Daste, Student’s Separation Date, gender Ethnicity Code, Academic Level, Family Income Code, FY Commit Amount, Award Year and Permanent Address.

The User selects the AWARD YEAR parameter and Output Format for the report.

acf.overview:
The FA Perkins Loans Disb Report is used by the Financial Aid Office, it uses the PowerFaids DB to extract information for the report. It includes information on the Loans Disbursement including the Student’s FIDN, Student Name, Loan Advance Amount Advance Daste, Student’s Separation Date, gender Ethnicity Code, Academic Level, Family Income Code, FY Commit Amount, Award Year and Permanent Address.

The User selects the AWARD YEAR parameter and Output Format for the report.

name: account-detail-for-term
overview:
Overview:

The Account Detail for Term provides a detail breakdown for a student’s account for a given term. It is processed on a student by student basis. The User enters the TERM,  and the STUDENT’S FIDN, selects the Output format either PDF or HTML to process the report.

The output contains the detail CHARGES, PAYMENTS, and Account BALANCE. Also, Net Term Balance, Net Balance for other terms, and Current Amount Due

acf.overview:
Overview:

The Account Detail for Term provides a detail breakdown for a student’s account for a given term. It is processed on a student by student basis. The User enters the TERM,  and the STUDENT’S FIDN, selects the Output format either PDF or HTML to process the report.

The output contains the detail CHARGES, PAYMENTS, and Account BALANCE. Also, Net Term Balance, Net Balance for other terms, and Current Amount Due

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_ebill_lkp.fex -************************************ -MRNOEDIT BEGIN -DEFAULTH &ID = ' ' APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS -RUN -SET &FEX = &FOCFEXNAME; -INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex -************************************ -SET &ECHO=OFF; -*SET XRETRIEVAL=OFF SET PAGE-NUM=OFF -************************** ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD SQL SQLORA PREPARE ACCD_OUT FOR select pidm, tbraccd_term_code, tbbdetc_type_ind, tbbdetc_detail_code, tbbdetc_desc, sum(tbraccd_amount) AS AMT from tbvaccd where pidm = (select spriden_pidm from spriden where spriden_id = '&ID.EVAL' and spriden_change_ind is null) -*and tbraccd_term_code='201110' and TBBDETC_TYPE_IND in ('C', 'P') group by pidm, tbraccd_term_code, tbbdetc_type_ind, tbbdetc_detail_code,tbbdetc_desc order by pidm, tbraccd_term_code, tbbdetc_type_ind, tbbdetc_detail_code, tbbdetc_desc END DEFINE FILE ACCD_OUT CHARGES/D12.2= IF TBBDETC_TYPE_IND EQ 'C' AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE EQ '&TERM' THEN AMT ELSE 0; PYMTS/D12.2= IF TBBDETC_TYPE_IND EQ 'P' AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE EQ '&TERM' THEN AMT ELSE 0; CHARGES_OTHTERM/D12.2= IF TBBDETC_TYPE_IND EQ 'C' AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE NE '&TERM' THEN AMT ELSE 0; PYMTS_OTHTERM/D12.2= IF TBBDETC_TYPE_IND EQ 'P' AND TBRACCD_TERM_CODE NE '&TERM' THEN AMT ELSE 0; CURR_BAL/D12.2= CHARGES - (PYMTS); BAL_OTHTERM/D12.2= CHARGES_OTHTERM - PYMTS_OTHTERM; END TABLE FILE ACCD_OUT SUM CURR_BAL BAL_OTHTERM COMPUTE ACCT_BAL/D12.2= CURR_BAL + BAL_OTHTERM; COMPUTE NET_ACCT_BAL/D12.2= IF ACCT_BAL LT 0 THEN 0 ELSE ACCT_BAL; BY PIDM PRINT TBBDETC_DESC CHARGES PYMTS CHARGES_OTHTERM PYMTS_OTHTERM BY PIDM BY TBBDETC_TYPE_IND BY TBBDETC_DETAIL_CODE ON TABLE HOLD AS HCHGPYMT END -RUN TABLE FILE HCHGPYMT PRINT * WHERE CHARGES NE 0 OR PYMTS NE 0 ON TABLE HOLD AS HCHGSUMM END -RUN TABLE FILE HCHGSUMM SUM FST.ACCT_BAL BY PIDM ON TABLE HOLD AS HCHGFINAL END -RUN SQL SQLORA PREPARE MEMO_OUT FOR select tbrmemo_pidm, tbrmemo_term_code, tbrmemo_detail_code, tbrmemo_desc, sum(tbrmemo_amount) AS AMT from tbrmemo where tbrmemo_pidm = (select spriden_pidm from spriden where spriden_id = '&ID.EVAL' and spriden_change_ind is null) -*'160316' and (tbrmemo_expiration_date >= sysdate or tbrmemo_expiration_date is null) group by tbrmemo_pidm, tbrmemo_term_code, tbrmemo_detail_code, tbrmemo_desc order by tbrmemo_pidm, tbrmemo_term_code, tbrmemo_detail_code, tbrmemo_desc END DEFINE FILE MEMO_OUT EXP_CHGS/D12.2= IF AMT LT 0 THEN AMT ELSE 0; EXP_PYMTS/D12.2= IF AMT GT 0 THEN AMT ELSE 0; MEMO_BAL/D12.2= EXP_CHGS - (EXP_PYMTS); TYPE_IND/A1= IF AMT LT 0 THEN 'P' ELSE 'C'; END TABLE FILE MEMO_OUT SUM MEMO_BAL BY TBRMEMO_PIDM PRINT EXP_CHGS EXP_PYMTS TYPE_IND BY TBRMEMO_PIDM BY TBRMEMO_DETAIL_CODE BY TBRMEMO_DESC ON TABLE HOLD AS HMEMO END -RUN SET ALL=ON JOIN PIDM IN HCHGFINAL TO ALL TBRMEMO_PIDM IN HMEMO AS J1 TABLE FILE HCHGFINAL PRINT * COMPUTE NET_BAL/D12.2= ACCT_BAL + MEMO_BAL; COMPUTE NET_DUE/D12.2= IF NET_BAL LT 0 THEN 0 ELSE NET_BAL; BY TBRMEMO_PIDM ON TABLE HOLD AS HFINAL END -RUN -SET &SIZE=IF &FMT EQ 'HTML' THEN '10' ELSE '15'; -SET &HTMLCMT1=IF &FMT EQ 'HTML' THEN 'ON TABLE HOLD AS HLD1 FORMAT HTMTABLE' ELSE 'ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT PDF OPEN NOBREAK'; -SET &HTMLCMT2=IF &FMT EQ 'HTML' THEN 'ON TABLE HOLD AS HLD2 FORMAT HTMTABLE' ELSE 'ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT PDF CLOSE NOBREAK'; TABLE FILE HCHGSUMM SUM CHARGES AS 'Charges' PYMTS AS 'Payments' COMPUTE BLNC/A1= ' '; AS 'Balance' COMPUTE DUMMY/A1=' '; NOPRINT BY TBBDETC_TYPE_IND NOPRINT BY TBBDETC_DETAIL_CODE NOPRINT BY TBBDETC_DESC AS 'Description' HEADING "&TERM Term Detail for &ID" FOOTING "Net Term Balance :<48 !IBI.FIL.HLD1;

!IBI.FIL.HLD2; -HTMLFORM END -EXIT -IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NOREC; -EXIT -********************** -NOREC -********************** -INCLUDE FORDHAM_NORECMSG -********************** -RPTEND -ENDRPT -INCLUDE wf_stats_end.fex -MRNOEDIT END -EXIT TABLE FILE HMEMO PRINT TBRMEMO_DESC EXP_CHGS EXP_PYMTS ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT PDF NOBREAK ON TABLE SET STYLE * TYPE=REPORT, SQUEEZE=ON,$ ENDSTYLE END -RUN TABLE FILE HFNL BY PIDM NOPRINT HEADING "Net Balance:

name: accounts-payable-voucher-process
overview:
The Accounts Payable Voucher Process is mainly used by the Finance/Accounts Payable Department to track Vendors, Vouchers etc. It provides a Compound Excel Report with individual tabs containing Summary and Period Summary Information, Period Detail, Open and Paid Vouchers and Exceptions. Aside from the Compound report,  the User has the ability to generate a report for each of the TAB reports individually. (For example, they might to chose to just run a report of the “Detail – Open Vouchers” or generate 1099’s with or without Adjustments.)

The report provides optional parameters for Report, Fiscal Year, Fiscal Period and a Calendar year for the 1099’s and Output format option.

acf.overview:
The Accounts Payable Voucher Process is mainly used by the Finance/Accounts Payable Department to track Vendors, Vouchers etc. It provides a Compound Excel Report with individual tabs containing Summary and Period Summary Information, Period Detail, Open and Paid Vouchers and Exceptions. Aside from the Compound report,  the User has the ability to generate a report for each of the TAB reports individually. (For example, they might to chose to just run a report of the “Detail – Open Vouchers” or generate 1099’s with or without Adjustments.)

The report provides optional parameters for Report, Fiscal Year, Fiscal Period and a Calendar year for the 1099’s and Output format option.
