sql.sql_code:
with 
  census_pool as
    (select
      sfrstcr_pidm as census_pool_pidm,
      sfrstcr_term_code as census_term_code,
      sum(case when stvrsts_voice_type <> 'W' then sfrstcr_credit_hr end) as r_att_hrs
    from
      sfrstcr
      inner join stvrsts
        on sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
        and sfrstcr_term_code = 201610
        and stvrsts_voice_type <> 'D'
    group by sfrstcr_pidm,sfrstcr_term_code),
  max_sgbstdn as
    (select 
      sgbstdn_pidm as max_pidm,
      max(sgbstdn_term_code_eff) as max_term
     from
      census_pool
      inner join sgbstdn
        on census_pool_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
        and census_term_code >= sgbstdn_term_code_eff
     group by
      sgbstdn_pidm),
  max_visa as
    (select
      gorvisa_pidm as max_visa_pidm,
      max(gorvisa_seq_no) as max_visa_seq_no
    from
      census_pool
      inner join gorvisa
        on census_pool_pidm = gorvisa_pidm
    group by gorvisa_pidm),
  race_indicators as
    (select
      gorprac_pidm as race_pidm,
      sum(case
        when gorprac_race_cde = 'W' then 1 else 0
      end) as race_w,
      sum(case
        when gorprac_race_cde = 'I' then 1 else 0
      end) as race_i,
      sum(case
        when gorprac_race_cde = 'A' then 1 else 0
      end) as race_a,
      sum(case
        when gorprac_race_cde = 'B' then 1 else 0
      end) as race_b,
      sum(case
        when gorprac_race_cde = 'P' then 1 else 0
      end) as race_p
    from
      census_pool
      inner join gorprac
        on census_pool_pidm = gorprac_pidm
    group by gorprac_pidm),
  max_sordegr as
    (select
      sordegr_pidm as max_sordegr_pidm,
      max(sordegr_attend_to) as max_attend_to,
      max(sordegr_activity_date) as max_sordegr_activity_date,
      max(sordegr_surrogate_id) as max_sordegr_surrogate_id
    from
      census_pool
      inner join sordegr
        on census_pool_pidm = sordegr_pidm
    group by
      sordegr_pidm),
  max_addr as
    (select 
      spraddr_pidm as max_addr_pidm,
      max(spraddr_seqno) as max_addr_seqno
    from 
      census_pool
      inner join spraddr
        on census_pool_pidm = spraddr_pidm
        and spraddr_atyp_code = 'MA'
        and spraddr_status_ind is null
        and spraddr_to_date is null
    group by spraddr_pidm),
  max_w_tckg as
    (select
      shrtckg_pidm as max_w_pidm,
      shrtckn_seq_no as max_w_tckn_seq_no,
      max(shrtckg_seq_no) as max_w_tckg_seq_no
    from
      census_pool
       inner join sfrstcr
        on census_pool_pidm = sfrstcr_pidm
        and census_term_code = sfrstcr_term_code
      inner join stvrsts
        on sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
        and stvrsts_voice_type = 'W'
      inner join shrtckn
        on census_pool_pidm = shrtckn_pidm
        and census_term_code = shrtckn_term_code
        and sfrstcr_crn = shrtckn_crn
        and sfrstcr_ptrm_code = shrtckn_ptrm_code
      inner join shrtckg
        on census_pool_pidm = shrtckg_pidm 
        and census_term_code = shrtckg_term_code
        and shrtckn_seq_no = shrtckg_tckn_seq_no
    group by shrtckg_pidm,shrtckn_seq_no),
  w_regs as
    (select
      sfrstcr_pidm as w_pidm,
      sum(shrtckg_hours_attempted) as w_att_hrs
    from
      census_pool
      inner join sfrstcr
        on census_pool_pidm = sfrstcr_pidm
        and census_term_code = sfrstcr_term_code
      inner join stvrsts
        on sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
        and stvrsts_voice_type = 'W'
      inner join shrtckn
        on sfrstcr_pidm = shrtckn_pidm
        and sfrstcr_crn = shrtckn_crn
        and sfrstcr_term_code = shrtckn_term_code
        and sfrstcr_ptrm_code = shrtckn_ptrm_code
      inner join max_w_tckg
        on census_pool_pidm = max_w_pidm
        and shrtckn_seq_no = max_w_tckn_seq_no
      inner join shrtckg
        on census_pool_pidm = shrtckg_pidm
        and census_term_code = shrtckg_term_code
        and shrtckn_seq_no = shrtckg_tckn_seq_no
        and max_w_tckg_seq_no = shrtckg_seq_no
    group by sfrstcr_pidm),
  max_sgrsatt as
    (select
      sgrsatt_pidm as max_sgrsatt_pidm,
      max(sgrsatt_term_code_eff) as max_sgrsatt_term_code_eff
    from
      census_pool
      inner join sgrsatt
        on census_pool_pidm = sgrsatt_pidm
        and census_term_code >= sgrsatt_term_code_eff
    group by sgrsatt_pidm),
  attrs as
    (select 
      sgrsatt_pidm as attrs_pidm,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'FPV' then 1 else 0 end) as fpv,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'FPX' then 1 else 0 end) as fpx,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'FPN' then 1 else 0 end) as fpn,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'FPT' then 1 else 0 end) as fpt,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'FPM' then 1 else 0 end) as fpm,
      'Y' as fp_prog,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUHE' then 1 else 0 end) as heop,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ARHN' then 1 else 0 end) as arhn,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ACHN' then 1 else 0 end) as achn,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ALHN' then 1 else 0 end) as alhn,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUAF' then 1 else 0 end) as auaf,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUAY' then 1 else 0 end) as auay,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUMA' then 1 else 0 end) as auma,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUNV' then 1 else 0 end) as aunv,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ACEV' then 1 else 0 end) as acev,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'A6AA' then 1 else 0 end) as a6aa,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'A6AU' then 1 else 0 end) as a6au,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'SNL' then 1 else 0 end) as snl,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'SND' then 1 else 0 end) as snd,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'SNM' then 1 else 0 end) as snm,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'SNP' then 1 else 0 end) as snp,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUFP' then 1 else 0 end) as aufp,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUCS' then 1 else 0 end) as aucs,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AXFS' then 1 else 0 end) as axfs,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ACBG' then 1 else 0 end) as acbg,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'ACGL' then 1 else 0 end) as acgl,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUMR' then 1 else 0 end) as aumr,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUEL' then 1 else 0 end) as auel,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUTC' then 1 else 0 end) as autc,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AU12' then 1 else 0 end) as au12,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUT2' then 1 else 0 end) as aut2,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUMD' then 1 else 0 end) as aumd,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AUPL' then 1 else 0 end) as aupl,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'AULN' then 1 else 0 end) as auln,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'VET' then 1 else 0 end) as vet,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'VETD' then 1 else 0 end) as vetd,
      sum(case when sgrsatt_atts_code = 'VETG' then 1 else 0 end) as vetg
    from
      census_pool
      inner join max_sgrsatt
        on census_pool_pidm = max_sgrsatt_pidm
      inner join sgrsatt
        on census_pool_pidm = sgrsatt_pidm
        and max_sgrsatt_term_code_eff = sgrsatt_term_code_eff
        and sgrsatt_atts_code in('FPV','FPX','FPN','FPT','FPM','AUHE','ARHN','ACHN','ALHN','AUAF','AUAY','AUMA','AUNV','ACEV','A6AA','A6AU','SNL','SND','SNM','SNP','AUFP','AUCS','AXFS','ACBG','ACGL','AUMR','AUEL','AUTC','AU12','AUT2','AUMD','AUPL','AULN','VET','VETD','VETG')
    group by sgrsatt_pidm),
  max_sorhsch as
    (select
      sorhsch_pidm as max_sorhsch_pidm,
      max(sorhsch_surrogate_id) as max_sorhsch_surrogate_id
    from
      census_pool
      inner join sorhsch
        on census_pool_pidm = sorhsch_pidm
    group by sorhsch_pidm),
  tests as
    (select 
      sortest_pidm as tests_pidm,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S01' then sortest_test_score end) as max_satvb,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S02' then sortest_test_score end) as max_satm,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S03' then sortest_test_score end) as max_satw,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S07' then sortest_test_score end) as max_satr,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S08' then sortest_test_score end) as max_sate,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'S09' then sortest_test_score end) as max_satc,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A01' then sortest_test_score end) as max_acte,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A02' then sortest_test_score end) as max_actm,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A03' then sortest_test_score end) as max_actr,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A04' then sortest_test_score end) as max_actsr,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A05' then sortest_test_score end) as max_act,
      max(case when sortest_tesc_code = 'A08' then sortest_test_score end) as max_actw
    from 
      census_pool
      left outer join sortest
        on census_pool_pidm = sortest_pidm
        and sortest_tesc_code in('S01','S02','S03','S07','S08','S09','A05','A01','A02','A03','A04','A08')
    group by sortest_pidm),
  max_slrrasg as 
    (select
      slrrasg_pidm as max_slrrasg_pidm,
      max(slrrasg_activity_date) as max_slrrasg_activity_date
    from 
      census_pool
      inner join slrrasg
        on census_pool_pidm = slrrasg_pidm
        and census_term_code = slrrasg_term_code
        and sysdate < slrrasg_end_date
        and sysdate >= slrrasg_begin_date
        and slrrasg_ascd_code not in('IN','WD')
    group by slrrasg_pidm),
  crs_attrs as
    ( select 
      sfrstcr_pidm as crs_attrs_pidm,
      sum(case when ssbsect_crse_numb like 'LEAV' or ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb in('ZZGE0900', 'REGR0925', 'ZZGA0925') then 1 else 0 end) as leave_of_absence,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('ZZSA9100O01','ZZBU9178R01','ZZLU9178001','ZZRU9178R01','ZZEU9178E01','ZZBU9178O01','ZZLU9178O01','ZZRU8178O01') then 1 else 0 end) as sap_external,
      sum(case when ssbsect_seq_numb in('LD1','LD2','LD3') then 1 else 0 end) as sap_cba_london,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code like 'LODA' then 1 else 0 end) as sap_london_drama,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('INGL0900001','INGL0914001','INGL0921001') then 1 else 0 end) as sap_law,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('ZZGB0903001','ZZGB0903002','ZZGB0909001') then 1 else 0 end) as sap_gba,
      sum(case when ssbsect_seq_numb in('O01','O02','003') and ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'SAB' then 1 else 0 end) as sap_lib_arts_london,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('ECON1160R01','ENGL1002R01','ENGL1003R01', 'PHIL1001R01', 'PHIL10002R01', 'PHIL1000R08', 'PHIL1000R11', 'HIST1101R01', 'ITAL1400R01', 'THEO1003R01', 'THEO1003R02', 'ARHI1101R01', 'PHIL1003R01', 'HIST1900R02', 'ITAL1101R01', 'THEO1004R01', 'HIST1301R01') then 1 else 0 end) as manresa,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('SYMP0001R01') then 1 else 0 end) as prehealth,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code like 'SERV' or ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('AFAM4802R01', 'COMM4001L02', 'ENGL3964R01', 'HIST3940R01', 'HPRH3051R01', 'PSYC4810L01', 'SOCI4970R01', 'THEO3861R01') then 1 else 0 end) as service_learning,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb in('SWGS6901','SWGS6902','SWGS6908') then 1 else 0 end) as gss_fieldwork,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb in('IDIS800') then 1 else 0 end) as hscontact_20,
      sum(case when ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb in('IDIS1006') then 1 else 0 end) as hscontact_18
    from 
      census_pool
      inner join sfrstcr on
        census_pool_pidm = sfrstcr_pidm
        and census_term_code = sfrstcr_term_code
      inner join stvrsts on
        sfrstcr_rsts_code = stvrsts_code
        and stvrsts_voice_type <> 'D'
      inner join ssbsect 
        on sfrstcr_term_code = ssbsect_term_code
        and sfrstcr_crn = ssbsect_crn
        and sfrstcr_ptrm_code = ssbsect_ptrm_code
        and (ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb||ssbsect_seq_numb in('ZZSA9100O01',
                                                                       'ZZBU9178R01',
                                                                       'ZZLU9178001',
                                                                       'ZZRU9178R01',
                                                                       'ZZEU9178E01',
                                                                       'ZZBU9178O01',
                                                                       'ZZLU9178O01',
                                                                       'ZZRU8178O01',
                                                                       'SYMP0001R01',
                                                                       'AFAM4802R01', 
                                                                       'COMM4001L02',
                                                                       'ENGL3964R01',
                                                                       'HIST3940R01',
                                                                       'HPRH3051R01',
                                                                       'PSYC4810L01',
                                                                       'SOCI4970R01',
                                                                       'THEO3861R01',
                                                                       'ECON1160R01',
                                                                       'ENGL1002R01',
                                                                       'ENGL1003R01',
                                                                       'PHIL1001R01',
                                                                       'PHIL1002R01',
                                                                       'PHIL1000R08',
                                                                       'PHIL1000R11',
                                                                       'HIST1101R01',
                                                                       'ITAL1400R01',
                                                                       'THEO1003R01',
                                                                       'THEO1003R02',
                                                                       'ARHI1101R01',
                                                                       'PHIL1003R01',
                                                                       'HIST1900R02',
                                                                       'ITAL1101R01',
                                                                       'THEO1004R01',
                                                                       'HIST1301R01',
                                                                       'ACBU3434LD1',
                                                                       'ACBU3442LD1',
                                                                       'ARHI3480O01',
                                                                       'BLBU3443LD1',
                                                                       'BLBU3443LD2',
                                                                       'BLBU3443LD3',
                                                                       'COMM3416O01',
                                                                       'ENGL2000003',
                                                                       'ENGL2000O01',
                                                                       'ENGL2000O02',
                                                                       'ENGL3068O01',
                                                                       'ENGL3206O01',
                                                                       'FNBU3441LD1',
                                                                       'FNBU3441LD2',
                                                                       'FNBU4450LD1',
                                                                       'INGL0921001',
                                                                       'INGL0914001',
                                                                       'INGL0900001',
                                                                       'MKBU3440LD1',
                                                                       'MKBU3441LD1',
                                                                       'MKBU3442LD1',
                                                                       'MUSC2031O01',
                                                                       'PHIL3000O01',
                                                                       'PHIL3000O02',
                                                                       'THEA1100LD1',
                                                                       'THEA1100LD2',
                                                                       'ZZGB0903001',
                                                                       'ZZGB0903002',
                                                                       'ZZGB0909001',
                                                                       'ZZSA9100O01',
                                                                       'ZZSA9178O01')
            or ssbsect_crse_numb like 'LEAV' 
            or ssbsect_subj_code in('SERV','LODA')
            or ssbsect_seq_numb in('LD1','LD2','LD3')
            or ssbsect_seq_numb in('O01','O02','003') and ssbsect_ptrm_code = 'SAB'
            or ssbsect_subj_code||ssbsect_crse_numb in('ZZGE0900','ZZGA0925','SWGS6901','SWGS6902','SWGS6908','IDIS800','IDIS1006')
          )
    group by sfrstcr_pidm),
  max_tele as
    (select
      census_pool_pidm as max_tele_pidm,
      max(sprtele_seqno) as max_tele_seqno
    from
      census_pool
      inner join sprtele
        on census_pool_pidm = sprtele_pidm 
        and sprtele_status_ind is null
        and sprtele_tele_code = 'MA'
    group by census_pool_pidm),
  clas as
    (select 
      sgvclas_pidm as clas_pidm,
      sgvclas_levl_code as clas_levl_code,
      sgvclas_clas_code as clas_code
    from sgvclas 
    where sgvclas_term_code = 201610)
select
  census_term_code,
  to_char(sysdate,'MM/DD/YYYY') as file_run_date,
  census_pool_pidm as pidm,
  spriden_last_name as last_name,
  spriden_first_name as first_name,
  spriden_mi as middle_initial,
  spriden_id as university_id,
  to_char(spbpers_birth_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as birth_date,
  floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) as age,
  case
    when spbpers_birth_date is null then 199
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) <18 then 1
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 18 and 19 then 2
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 20 and 21 then 3
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 22 and 24 then 4
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 25 and 29 then 5
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 30 and 34 then 6
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 35 and 39 then 7
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 40 and 49 then 8
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) between 50 and 64 then 9
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) >64 then 10
    else -1
  end as cohortr,
  case
    when spbpers_birth_date is null then 2
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) < 25 then 0
    when floor((sysdate - spbpers_birth_date)/365.25) > 24 then 1
    else -1
  end as cohort25,
  spbpers_sex as gender,
  spbpers_ethn_code as ethnicity_code_old,
  spbpers_ethn_cde as ethnicity_code_new,
  nvl(race_w,0) as race_w,
  nvl(race_i,0) as race_i,
  nvl(race_a,0) as race_a,
  nvl(race_b,0) as race_b,
  nvl(race_p,0) as race_p,
  case when race_w+race_i+race_a+race_b+race_p >1 then 'Y' else 'N' end as race_two_or_more,
  spbpers_citz_ind as citizenship_ind,
  spbpers_citz_code as citizenship_code,
  case when spbpers_citz_code = 1 then 1 else 0 end as uscitres,
  gobintl_natn_code_legal as legal_nationality,
  case
    when spbpers_citz_code is not null and spbpers_citz_code <> 1 then 3
    else
      case
        when race_w+race_i+race_a+race_b+race_p >1 then 2
        else
          case 
            when spbpers_ethn_cde = 2 then 1
            when race_w = 1 then 8
            when race_i = 1 then 5
            when race_a = 1 then 6
            when race_p = 1 then 7
            when race_b = 1 then 4
            else 
              case
                when spbpers_ethn_cde = 1 then 4
                when spbpers_ethn_cde = 2	then 5
                when spbpers_ethn_cde = 3 then 6
                when spbpers_ethn_cde = 4	then 1
                when spbpers_ethn_cde = 5	then 8
                else
                  case
                    when spbpers_ethn_code in ('HM','HP','H') then 1
                    when spbpers_ethn_code = 'W' then 8
                    when spbpers_ethn_code = 'I' then 5
                    when spbpers_ethn_code = 'O' then 6
                    when spbpers_ethn_code = 'B' then 4
                    else 9
                  end
              end
          end
      end
  end as race_new,
  nvl(spbpers_relg_code,'NA') as relg_code,
  spraddr_atyp_code as address_type,
  sprtele_phone_area as area_code,
  sprtele_phone_number as sprtele_phone_number,
  spraddr_street_line1 as address_line1,
  spraddr_street_line2 as address_line2,
  spraddr_street_line3 as address_line3,
  spraddr_city as city,
  spraddr_stat_code as state,
  case
    when spbpers_citz_code <> 1 then 'XX'
    when spraddr_stat_code in('ON','BC','QC') then 'XU'
    else nvl(spraddr_stat_code,'XU') 
  end as state_n,
  substr(spraddr_zip,0,5) as zipcode,
  spraddr_cnty_code as county_code,
  spraddr_natn_code as nation_code,
  case
    when spbpers_citz_code <> 1 then 71
    when spraddr_stat_code = 'NY' then 69
    when spraddr_stat_code is null then 70
    else 72
  end as geog,
  sgbstdn_camp_code as campus_code,
  sgbstdn_coll_code_1 as college_code,
  sgbstdn_degc_code_1 as degree_code,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_1 as major_code,
  mj1.stvmajr_cipc_code as cip_code,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_1_2 as secondary_major_code,
  mj2.stvmajr_cipc_code as secondary_cip_code,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_minr_1 as minor,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_minr_1_2 as secondary_minor,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_conc_1 as concentration,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_conc_1_2 as secondary_concentration,
  sgbstdn_full_part_ind as x_full_part_ind,
  sfbetrm_tmst_code as time_status_code,
  case 
    when sgbstdn_levl_code = 'C' then 1
    when nvl(r_att_hrs,0) + nvl(w_att_hrs,0) >= 12 then 0
    when sfbetrm_tmst_code in('F','S') then 0 
    else 1 
  end as statussn,
  case when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = 'ES' and nvl(r_att_hrs,0) + nvl(w_att_hrs,0) = 0 then 1 else 0 end as esl,
  case 
    when nvl(r_att_hrs,0) + nvl(w_att_hrs,0) > 0 
      and nvl(leave_of_absence,0) = 0
      and sgbstdn_coll_code_1 <> 'SA' 
      and nvl(sap_external,0)+nvl(sap_cba_london,0)+nvl(sap_london_drama,0)+nvl(sap_law,0)+nvl(sap_gba,0)+nvl(sap_lib_arts_london,0) = 0 
      and nvl(a6aa,0) = 0 
      and nvl(a6au,0) = 0 
      and sfbetrm_tmst_code not in('S','SH','S3') 
      then 1 
    else 0 
  end as credstua,
  case
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('AS','AA') then 0
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('CER') then 1
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('BA','BS','BFA') then 2
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('MA','MS','MBA','MAT','MST','MSW','MPH','MSE','MFA') then 3
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('ADV','ADVN','CBL') then 4
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('LLM') then 5
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('JD') then 6
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('EDD','DSW','PHD','DMIN','SJD') then 7
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('NON') then 8
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('MJD') then 9
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('CN') then 10
    else -1
  end as cat,
  case
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('AS','AA','BA','BS','BFA','CER') then 1
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('JD') then 2
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('MA','MS','MBA','MAT','MST','MSW','MPH','MSE','MFA','ADV','ADVN','CBL','LLM','EDD','DSW','PHD','DMIN','SJD','MJD','CN') then 3
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('NON') then 4
    else -1
  end as cat_1,
  case when sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F' and sgbstdn_degc_code_1 not in('NON','CN') then 1 else 0 end as first, 
  case when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('NON') or sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = 'CN' then 0 else 1 end as degreeseek,
  case
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('MC','LT') then 2
    when sgbstdn_camp_code in('R','VR') then 0
    when sgbstdn_camp_code in('L','VL') then 1
    when sgbstdn_camp_code in('O','X') then -1
    when sgbstdn_camp_code in('H') then 3
    when sgbstdn_camp_code in('W') then 2
    else -1
  end as siterlm,
  case when slrrasg_room_number is null and slrrasg_rrcd_code is null then 1 else 0 end as resstat,
  case
    when slrrasg_bldg_code in('AN','AS','FN','HU','MCG','MCJ','MCL','OH','QCB','QCJ','QCR','TY','WA','1CA','2CA','3SA','4CO','LOS') then 0
    when slrrasg_bldg_code in('BHA2','BHAR','BHB2','BHHH','BHLP','BHN','BHT') then 1
    when slrrasg_bldg_code in('MCM') then 2
    when slrrasg_bldg_code in('WP') then 3
    else 6
  end as rescamp,
  case
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('AS','AA','BA','BS','BFA','CER') and sgbstdn_styp_code = '2' then 2
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('AS','AA','BA','BS','BFA','CER') and sgbstdn_styp_code = '4' then 4
    else 0
  end as transfer,
  case
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('ES','CP') then 5
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('FC','CB','CL','SB','LS','LT','MC','PC') and sgbstdn_degc_code_1 = 'NON' and clas_code in('FR','SO','JR','SR') then 5
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('CE','FC','CB','CL','SG','LS','LT','MC','LD','PC') and sgbstdn_levl_code = 'U' and clas_code not in('FR','SO','JR','SR') then 5
    when clas_code = 'FR' then 1
    when clas_code = 'SO' then 2
    when clas_code = 'JR' then 3
    when clas_code = 'SR' then 4
    else 6
  end as levl,
  case 
    when sgbstdn_degc_code_1 in('AS','AA','BA','BS','BFA','CER') then
      case 
        when sgbstdn_styp_code = 'F' and sgbstdn_degc_code_1 not in('NON','CN') then 1
        when clas_code = 'FR' then 2
        when clas_code = 'SO' then 3
        when clas_code = 'JR' then 4
        when clas_code = 'SR' then 5
      end
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('ES','CP') then 6
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('FC','CB','CL','SB','LS','LT','MC','PC') and sgbstdn_degc_code_1 = 'NON' and clas_code in('FR','SO','JR','SR') then 6
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 in('CE','FC','CB','CL','SG','LS','LT','MC','LD','PC') and sgbstdn_levl_code = 'U' and clas_code not in('FR','SO','JR','SR') then 6
    else 7
  end as ulevel,
  nvl(fpv,0) as fpv,
  nvl(fpx,0) as fpx,
  nvl(fpn,0) as fpn,
  nvl(fpt,0) as fpt,
  nvl(fpm,0) as fpm,
  nvl(fp_prog,'N') as fp_prog,
  nvl(heop,0) as heop,
  case when leave_of_absence > 0 then 1 else 0 end as leave_of_absence,
  case when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 <> 'SA' then 1 else 0 end as sap_non_matric,
  case when sap_external > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_external,
  case when sap_cba_london > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_cba_london,
  case when sap_london_drama> 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_london_drama,
  case when sap_law > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_law,
  case when sap_gba > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_gba,
  0 as sap_gss,
  case when sap_lib_arts_london > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sap_lib_arts_london,
  case 
    when sgbstdn_coll_code_1 = 'SA' or sgbstdn_coll_code_2 = 'SA' then 1
    when sap_external > 0 then 2
    when sap_cba_london > 0 then 3
    when sap_london_drama > 0 then 4
    when sap_law > 0 then 5
    when sap_gba > 0 then 6
    when sap_lib_arts_london > 0 then 8
    else 0
  end as study_abroad,
  case when manresa > 0 then 1 else 0 end as manresa,
  case when prehealth > 0 then 1 else 0 end as prehealth,
  case when service_learning > 0 then 1 else 0 end as service_learning,
  case when gss_fieldwork > 0 then 1 else 0 end as gss_fieldwork,
  case 
    when hscontact_20 > 0 then 20 
    when hscontact_18 > 0 then 18 
    else 0 
  end as hscontact_hours,
  case
    when arhn > 0 then 1
    when achn > 0 then 2
    when alhn > 0 then 3
    else 0
  end as honors_val,
  case
    when arhn > 0 then 'FCRH Honors'
    when achn > 0 then 'CBA Honors'
    when alhn > 0 then 'FCLC Honors'
    else 'Not in Honors Program'
  end as honors,
  case
    when auaf > 0 then 1
    when auay > 0 then 2
    when auma > 0 then 3
    when aunv > 0 then 4
    else 0
  end as rotc_val,
  case
    when auaf > 0 then 'Air Force'
    when auay > 0 then 'Army'
    when auma > 0 then 'Marines'
    when aunv > 0 then 'Navy'
    else 'Not in ROTC'
  end as rotc,
  case
    when fpt > 0 then 1
    when fpn > 0 then 2
    when acev > 0 then 3
    else 0
  end as trdtnl_prog_val,
  case
    when fpt > 0 then 'Traditional'
    when fpn > 0 then 'Non-Traditional'
    when acev > 0 then 'CBA Evening'
    else 'Unknown'
  end as trdtnl_prog,
  case when a6aa >0 or a6au >0 then 1 else 0 end as coll60,
  nvl(snl,0) as snl,
  nvl(snd,0) as snd,
  nvl(snm,0) as snm,
  nvl(snp,0) as snp,
  case
    when snl > 0 then 1
    when snd > 0 then 2
    when snm > 0 then 3
    when snp > 0 then 4
    else 0
  end as scholarship_val,
  case
    when snl > 0 then 'LaFarge'
    when snd > 0 then 'Deans'
    when snm > 0 then 'National Merit Finalist'
    when snp > 0 then 'Presidential'
    else 'Other Scholar'
  end as scholarship,
  case
    when aufp > 0 then 1
    when aucs > 0 then 2
    else 0
  end as hs_program_val,
  case
    when aufp > 0 then 'Fordham Prep Student'
    when aucs > 0 then 'C-Step'
    else 'Not in HS Program'
  end as hs_program,
  nvl(axfs,0) as fullbright,
  case
    when acbg > 0 then 1
    when acgl > 0 then 2
    when aumr > 0 then 3
    else 0
  end as prog_affl_val,
  case
    when acbg > 0 then 'CBA BS/MBA GLOBE'
    when acgl > 0 then 'CBA GLOBE'
    when aumr > 0 then 'MANRESA'
    else 'No Group'
  end as prog_affl,
  case
    when auel > 0 then 1
    when autc > 0 then 2
    when au12 > 0 then 3
    when aut2 > 0 then 4
    else 0
  end as puft_val, 
  case
    when auel > 0 then 'Teacher Cert Elementary Ed'
    when autc > 0 then 'Teacher Cert Secondary Ed'
    when au12 > 0 then 'NYC Teaching Fellow'
    when aut2 > 0 then 'Teach for America'
    else 'Not in GED Prog'
  end as puft, 
  nvl(aumd,0) as premed,
  nvl(aupl,0) as prelaw,
  nvl(auln,0) as london_drama,
  nvl(vet,0) as vetran,
  nvl(vetd,0) as vetran_dependent,
  nvl(vetg,0) as vetran_granfathered,
  clas_code as classification,
  sgbstdn_admt_code as admit_code,
  sgbstdn_styp_code as student_type,
  sgbstdn_rate_code as rate_code,
  sgbstdn_stst_code as student_status,
  sgbstdn_resd_code as residence_code,
  sgbstdn_levl_code as student_level,
  sgbstdn_term_code_grad as expected_grad_term,
  gpai.shrlgpa_hours_earned as institutional_hrs_earned,
  gpao.shrlgpa_hours_earned as overall_hrs_earned,
  gpat.shrlgpa_hours_earned as transferred_hrs_earned,
  nvl(r_att_hrs,0) + nvl(w_att_hrs,0) as attempted_hrs,
  max_act,
  max_acte,
  max_actm,
  max_actr,
  max_actsr,
  max_actw,
  max_actm+max_actr as act_tot,
  max_satvb,
  max_satm,
  max_satr,
  max_satw,
  max_sate,
  max_satc,
  sorhsch_gpa as hschool_gpa,
  to_char(sorhsch_graduation_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as hschool_grad_date,
  stvsbgi_desc as prior_college,
  sordegr_sbgi_code as prior_college_code,
  stvdegc_desc as prior_college_deg_code,
  slrrasg_bldg_code as building_code,
  slrrasg_rrcd_code as rrcd_code,
  slrrasg_room_number as room_number,
  gorvisa_vtyp_code as visa_type,
  sgbstdn_program_1 as degree_program,
  sgbstdn_term_code_matric as matriculated_term_code,
  sgbstdn_term_code_admit as admitted_term_code,
  sgbstdn_coll_code_2 as college_code_2,
  sgbstdn_term_code_admit_2 as admitted_term_code_2,
  sgbstdn_admt_code_2 as admitted_code_2,
  sgbstdn_camp_code_2 as campus_code_2,
  sgbstdn_levl_code_2 as level_code_2,
  sgbstdn_degc_code_2 as degree_code_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_2 as major_code_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_2_2 as secondary_major_code_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_minr_2 as minor_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_minr_2_2 as secondary_minor_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_conc_2 as concentration_2,
  sgbstdn_majr_code_conc_2_2 as secondary_concentration_2,
  sgbstdn_program_2 as degree_program_2
from
  census_pool
  left outer join spriden
    on census_pool_pidm = spriden_pidm
    and spriden_change_ind is null
  left outer join max_sgbstdn
    on census_pool_pidm = max_pidm
  left outer join sgbstdn
    on census_pool_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm
    and max_term = sgbstdn_term_code_eff
  left outer join spbpers
    on census_pool_pidm = spbpers_pidm
  left outer join shrlgpa gpai
    on census_pool_pidm = gpai.shrlgpa_pidm
    and gpai.shrlgpa_gpa_type_ind = 'I'
    and sgbstdn_levl_code = gpai.shrlgpa_levl_code
  left outer join shrlgpa gpat
    on census_pool_pidm = gpat.shrlgpa_pidm
    and gpat.shrlgpa_gpa_type_ind = 'T'
    and sgbstdn_levl_code = gpat.shrlgpa_levl_code
  left outer join shrlgpa gpao
    on census_pool_pidm = gpao.shrlgpa_pidm
    and gpao.shrlgpa_gpa_type_ind = 'O'
    and sgbstdn_levl_code = gpao.shrlgpa_levl_code
  left outer join gobintl
    on census_pool_pidm = gobintl_pidm
  left outer join max_visa
    on census_pool_pidm = max_visa_pidm
  left outer join gorvisa
    on census_pool_pidm = gorvisa_pidm
    and max_visa_seq_no = gorvisa_seq_no
  left outer join race_indicators
    on census_pool_pidm = race_pidm
  left outer join sfbetrm
    on census_pool_pidm = sfbetrm_pidm
    and census_term_code = sfbetrm_term_code
  left outer join max_sordegr
    on census_pool_pidm = max_sordegr_pidm
  left outer join sordegr
    on census_pool_pidm = sordegr_pidm
    and max_attend_to = sordegr_attend_to
    and max_sordegr_activity_date = sordegr_activity_date
    and max_sordegr_surrogate_id = sordegr_surrogate_id
  left outer join max_addr
    on census_pool_pidm = max_addr_pidm
  left outer join spraddr
    on census_pool_pidm = spraddr_pidm
    and spraddr_atyp_code = 'MA'
    and spraddr_status_ind is null
    and spraddr_to_date is null
    and max_addr_seqno = spraddr_seqno
  left outer join stvmajr mj1
    on sgbstdn_majr_code_1 = mj1.stvmajr_code
  left outer join stvmajr mj2
    on sgbstdn_majr_code_1_2 = mj2.stvmajr_code
  left outer join w_regs
    on census_pool_pidm = w_pidm
  left outer join attrs
    on census_pool_pidm = attrs_pidm
  left outer join stvsbgi
    on sordegr_sbgi_code = stvsbgi_code
  left outer join stvdegc
    on sordegr_degc_code = stvdegc_code
  left outer join max_slrrasg
    on census_pool_pidm = max_slrrasg_pidm
  left outer join slrrasg
    on census_pool_pidm = slrrasg_pidm
    and census_term_code = slrrasg_term_code
    and sysdate < slrrasg_end_date
    and sysdate >= slrrasg_begin_date
    and slrrasg_ascd_code not in('IN','WD')
    and max_slrrasg_activity_date = slrrasg_activity_date
  left outer join max_sorhsch
    on census_pool_pidm = max_sorhsch_pidm
  left outer join sorhsch
    on census_pool_pidm = sorhsch_pidm
    and max_sorhsch_surrogate_id = sorhsch_surrogate_id
  left outer join tests
    on census_pool_pidm = tests_pidm
  left outer join crs_attrs
    on census_pool_pidm = crs_attrs_pidm
  left outer join max_tele
    on census_pool_pidm = max_tele_pidm
  left outer join sprtele
    on census_pool_pidm = sprtele_pidm
    and max_tele_seqno = sprtele_seqno
    and sprtele_status_ind is null
    and sprtele_tele_code = 'MA'
  left outer join clas
    on census_pool_pidm = clas_pidm
    and sgbstdn_levl_code = clas_levl_code
where sgbstdn_coll_code_1 <> 'XX'
order by spriden_last_name,spriden_first_name,spriden_mi
;

name: english-language-placement-report
overview:
The English Language Placement Report provides a list of incoming freshman students, their Names, FIDN whether they are Incoming Freshmen or Transfer Students, their SAT scores, their Assessment Status and the English classes they are registered in.

The user has the ability via parameter dropdowns to select the TERM, COLLEGE, and the Output format for the report.

acf.overview:
The English Language Placement Report provides a list of incoming freshman students, their Names, FIDN whether they are Incoming Freshmen or Transfer Students, their SAT scores, their Assessment Status and the English classes they are registered in.

The user has the ability via parameter dropdowns to select the TERM, COLLEGE, and the Output format for the report.

name: advisor-freshreg-survey-report
overview:
The Diploma jacket Report mainly provides a list of graduating students to send to the printers to print the diploma jackets with student names. It also contains additional information such as FIDN, Gender, College Campus, Degree, Degree Status, Major, GPA, Graduation Status, Graduation Date, any Honors the student was awarded, any Holds that may be on the students account, and the students Permanent address.

The user has the ability via parameter dropdowns to select the TERM, COLLEGE, LEVEL (Graduate, Undergraduate etc.), Degree Status and Graduation Status as Parameters to determine the population they are interested in. They can also select the output format of the report.

acf.overview:
The Diploma jacket Report mainly provides a list of graduating students to send to the printers to print the diploma jackets with student names. It also contains additional information such as FIDN, Gender, College Campus, Degree, Degree Status, Major, GPA, Graduation Status, Graduation Date, any Honors the student was awarded, any Holds that may be on the students account, and the students Permanent address.

The user has the ability via parameter dropdowns to select the TERM, COLLEGE, LEVEL (Graduate, Undergraduate etc.), Degree Status and Graduation Status as Parameters to determine the population they are interested in. They can also select the output format of the report.

sql.sql_code:
-* File stu_diplomajack.fex
-*******************************************************************************
-* Copyright (c) 2011 Fordham University - All Rights Reserved
-*******************************************************************************
-*  Application:
-*         Name: Diploma Jacket Report
-*      Purpose:
-* Tables/Views: Many
-*   Parameters:
-*    Execution: Content/Student/Graduation Reports
-*     Comments:
-*----------------------------- Change History ---------------------------------
-* CCYYMMDD | WHO - Description - Be specific
-* -------- | --- - ------------------------------------------------------------
-* ???????? | ??? - Initial development
-* 20150423 | JAH - Added columns for Grad Application First Name, Last Name and Middle Int for each student.
-*     Also added new columns for all holds for the students listed per Anna Conte per Magic ticket #402504.
-* 20151030 | REM - modified SORT order as per Anna C.Magic #423925
-*******************************************************************************
-MRNOEDIT BEGIN
APP PREPENDPATH FOCUS_DBS
-RUN
-SET &FEX     = &FOCFEXNAME;
-INCLUDE wf_stats_start.fex
-***************************************
-SET &ECHO = ALL;
SET ASNAMES = ON
SET BYDISPLAY = ON
-***************************************
-SET &GRSTW1 = IF &GRST.LENGTH LE 4 THEN &GRST.QUOTEDSTRING ELSE STRREP(&GRST.LENGTH, &GRST, 6 , ' OR ', 6 ,',',&GRST.LENGTH, 'A&GRST.LENGTH');
-SET &DEGSW1 = IF &DEGS.LENGTH LE 4 THEN &DEGS.QUOTEDSTRING ELSE STRREP(&DEGS.LENGTH, &DEGS, 6 , ' OR ', 6 ,',',&DEGS.LENGTH, 'A&DEGS.LENGTH');
-SET &LEVLW1 = IF &LEVL.LENGTH LE 4 THEN &LEVL ELSE STRREP(&LEVL.LENGTH, &LEVL, 6 , ' OR ', 6 ,',',&LEVL.LENGTH, 'A&LEVL.LENGTH');
-SET &COLLW1 = IF &COLL.LENGTH LE 4 THEN &COLL ELSE STRREP(&COLL.LENGTH, &COLL, 6 , ' OR ', 6 ,',',&COLL.LENGTH, 'A&COLL.LENGTH');
-DEFAULT &GENCND = 'Y';
-SET &GENCMT = IF &GENCND EQ 'Y' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
TYPE &GRSTW1
-SET &HONRWH = IF &HONRSEL EQ 'Y' THEN '' ELSE '-*';
-**************************************
ENGINE SQLORA SET DEFAULT_CONNECTION PROD
SQL SQLORA PREPARE SQLOUT FOR
SELECT spriden_pidm,
         spriden_id,
         spriden_last_name,
         spriden_first_name,
         spriden_mi,
            spriden_last_name
         || ', '
         || spriden_first_name
         || ' '
         || SUBSTR (spriden_mi, 1, 1)
            stuname,
         spriden_pidm || '|' || spriden_id pidmid,
         NVL2(shbgapp_last_name, shbgapp_first_name||' '||shbgapp_mi||' '||shbgapp_last_name, spriden_first_name||' '||spriden_mi||' '||spriden_last_name)  diploma_name,
   UPPER (
            REPLACE (REPLACE (spriden_last_name || spriden_first_name, ''''),
                     ' ')) sortname,
         shbgapp_seqno,
         shbgapp_request_date,
         shbgapp_gast_code,
         shbgapp_user_id,
   shbgapp_last_name,
   shbgapp_first_name,
   shbgapp_mi,
         shbgapp_street1,
         shbgapp_street2,
         shbgapp_street3,
         shbgapp_stat_code,
         shbgapp_natn_code,
         shbgapp_city,
         shbgapp_zip,
         sorlcur_camp_code,
           (CASE
             WHEN     REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LS')
                  AND REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LT')
                  AND SORLCUR_COLL_CODE IN ('LS', 'LT')
             THEN
                'LSLT'
             ELSE
                SORLCUR_COLL_CODE
          END)
            COLL_CODE,
         sorlcur_levl_code,
         (CASE
             WHEN     REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LS')
                  AND REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LT')
                  AND SORLCUR_COLL_CODE IN ('LS', 'LT')
             THEN
                'Fordham College of Liberal Studies'
             ELSE
                stvcoll_desc
          END)
            coll_desc,
         spbpers_sex,
         shrdgmr_seq_no,
         shrdgmr_term_code_grad,
         shrdgmr_majr_code_1,
         shrdgmr_levl_code,
         TO_CHAR(shrdgmr_grad_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') GRAD_DATE,
         shrdgmr_camp_code,
         shrdgmr_majr_code_1,
         shrdgmr_grst_code,
         shrdgmr_degs_code,
         stvdegc_code,
         stvdegc_desc,
         honr_code1,
         honr_desc1,
         honr_code2,
         honr_desc2,
         honr_code3,
         honr_desc3,
         precoll_1,
         precoll_degr_code_1,
         precoll_degr_year_1,
         precoll_2,
         precoll_degr_code_2,
         precoll_degr_year_2,
         precoll_3,
         precoll_degr_code_3,
         precoll_degr_year_3,
         precoll_4,
         precoll_degr_code_4,
         precoll_degr_year_4,
         precoll_5,
         precoll_degr_code_5,
         precoll_degr_year_5,
         nvl(dh, 'N') diploma_hold,
         shrlgpa_gpa,
         spriden_pidm || '|' || spriden_id || '|' pidmid
    FROM spriden
         INNER JOIN shbgapp
            ON spriden_pidm = shbgapp_pidm
         INNER JOIN sorlcur
            ON sorlcur_pidm = shbgapp_pidm
               AND sorlcur_gapp_seqno = shbgapp_seqno
         INNER JOIN spbpers
            ON spbpers_pidm = spriden_pidm
         INNER JOIN shrdgmr
            ON shrdgmr_pidm = sorlcur_pidm
               AND shrdgmr_seq_no = sorlcur_key_seqno
         INNER JOIN stvdegc
            ON stvdegc_code = shrdgmr_degc_code
         INNER JOIN stvcoll
            ON stvcoll_code = sorlcur_coll_code
         LEFT OUTER JOIN (  SELECT shrdgih_pidm,
                                   shrdgih_dgmr_seq_no,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 1 THEN shrdgih_honr_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      honr_code1,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 2 THEN shrdgih_honr_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      honr_code2,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 3 THEN shrdgih_honr_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END) honr_code3,

                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 1 THEN stvhonr_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      honr_desc1,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 2 THEN stvhonr_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      honr_desc2,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 3 THEN stvhonr_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      honr_desc3

                              FROM (SELECT shrdgih_pidm,
                                           shrdgih_dgmr_seq_no,
                                           shrdgih_honr_code,
                                           stvhonr_desc,
                                           DENSE_RANK ()
                                           OVER (
                                              PARTITION BY shrdgih_pidm,
                                                           shrdgih_dgmr_seq_no
                                              ORDER BY shrdgih_honr_code)
                                              AS rnk
                                      FROM    shrdgih
                                           INNER JOIN
                                              stvhonr
                                           ON shrdgih_honr_code = stvhonr_code
                                     WHERE shrdgih_honr_code IN
                                              ('C', 'M', 'S', 'XH', 'Y', 'XG'))
                          GROUP BY shrdgih_pidm, shrdgih_dgmr_seq_no) f1
            ON f1.shrdgih_pidm = spriden_pidm
               AND shrdgih_dgmr_seq_no = sorlcur_key_seqno
         LEFT OUTER JOIN (  SELECT sorpcol_pidm,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 1 THEN stvsbgi_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_1,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 1 THEN sordegr_degc_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_code_1,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 1 THEN sordegr_degc_year
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_year_1,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 2 THEN stvsbgi_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_2,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 2 THEN sordegr_degc_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_code_2,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 2 THEN sordegr_degc_year
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_year_2,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 3 THEN stvsbgi_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_3,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 3 THEN sordegr_degc_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_code_3,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 3 THEN sordegr_degc_year
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_year_3,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 4 THEN stvsbgi_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_4,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 4 THEN sordegr_degc_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_code_4,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 4 THEN sordegr_degc_year
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_year_4,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 5 THEN stvsbgi_desc
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_5,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 5 THEN sordegr_degc_code
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_code_5,
                                   MAX (
                                      CASE
                                         WHEN rnk = 5 THEN sordegr_degc_year
                                         ELSE ''
                                      END)
                                      precoll_degr_year_5
                              FROM (SELECT sorpcol_pidm,
                                           stvsbgi_code,
                                           stvsbgi_desc,
                                           sordegr_degc_year,
                                           sordegr_degc_code,
                                           DENSE_RANK ()
                                           OVER (
                                              PARTITION BY sorpcol_pidm
                                              ORDER BY
                                                 sordegr_degc_year DESC,
                                                 stvsbgi_code NULLS LAST)
                                              rnk
                                      FROM sorpcol
                                           INNER JOIN stvsbgi
                                              ON sorpcol_sbgi_code = stvsbgi_code
                                           LEFT OUTER JOIN sordegr
                                              ON sorpcol_pidm = sordegr_pidm
                                                 AND sorpcol_sbgi_code =
                                                        sordegr_sbgi_code)
                          GROUP BY sorpcol_pidm) f2
            ON spriden_pidm = f2.sorpcol_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN (
                            SELECT distinct sprhold_pidm, decode(sprhold_hldd_code, 'M0', 'Y', 'N') DH
                            FROM sprhold
                             where
          sprhold_hldd_code = 'M0'
          AND sprhold_from_date <= sysdate AND sprhold_to_date >= sysdate
                    ) f3
            ON spriden_pidm = f3.sprhold_pidm
         LEFT OUTER JOIN shrlgpa
            ON shrdgmr_pidm = shrlgpa_pidm
               AND shrdgmr_levl_code = shrlgpa_levl_code
               AND shrlgpa_gpa_type_ind = 'O'
   WHERE     spriden_change_ind IS NULL
         AND sorlcur_lmod_code = 'OUTCOME'
         AND shrdgmr_term_code_grad = '&TERM'
         AND shrdgmr_grst_code IN(&GRSTW1)
         AND shrdgmr_degs_code IN (&DEGSW1)
         AND shrdgmr_levl_code IN (&LEVLW1)
         AND sorlcur_coll_code IN (&COLLW1)
         AND sorlcur_current_cde = 'Y'
         AND sorlcur_cact_code = 'ACTIVE'
ORDER BY
&GENCMT.EVAL SPBPERS_SEX,
         (CASE
             WHEN     REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LS')
                  AND REGEXP_LIKE (q'[&COLLW1.EVAL]', 'LT')
                  AND SORLCUR_COLL_CODE IN ('LS', 'LT')
             THEN
                'LSLT'
             ELSE
                SORLCUR_COLL_CODE
          END),
         STVDEGC_CODE,
         UPPER( REPLACE (REPLACE ( NVL2(shbgapp_last_name, shbgapp_last_name||shbgapp_first_name, spriden_last_name||spriden_first_name), '''' ), ' ' ) )
END
-RUN

TABLE FILE SQLOUT
SUM
  LST.SPRIDEN_ID
  LST.SHBGAPP_LAST_NAME
  LST.SHBGAPP_FIRST_NAME
  LST.SHBGAPP_MI
     LST.DIPLOMA_NAME
  LST.SPBPERS_SEX
     LST.COLL_DESC
     LST.SORLCUR_CAMP_CODE
     LST.SHRDGMR_DEGS_CODE
     LST.SHRDGMR_GRST_CODE
     LST.STVDEGC_DESC
     LST.GRAD_DATE
     LST.HONR_DESC1
     LST.HONR_DESC2
     LST.HONR_DESC3
     LST.DIPLOMA_HOLD
     LST.COLL_CODE
     LST.STVDEGC_CODE
     LST.SHRDGMR_MAJR_CODE_1
     LST.SHRLGPA_GPA
     LST.SHBGAPP_STREET1
     LST.SHBGAPP_STREET2
     LST.SHBGAPP_STREET3
     LST.SHBGAPP_CITY
     LST.SHBGAPP_STAT_CODE
     LST.SHBGAPP_ZIP
     LST.SHBGAPP_NATN_CODE
  LST.PIDMID
BY   SPRIDEN_PIDM
ON TABLE HOLD AS H1
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-******************* HOLD INFO *************************
JOIN LEFT_OUTER SPRIDEN_PIDM IN H1 TO ALL SPRHOLD_PIDM IN SPRHOLD AS J1
-RUN
-*******************************************************
DEFINE FILE H1
XTODAY/YYMD = &YYMD;
TO_DATE/YYMD = SPRHOLD_TO_DATE;
FROM_DATE/YYMD = SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE;
FLAG1/A1    = IF (FROM_DATE LE XTODAY) AND (TO_DATE GE XTODAY) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N';
END

TABLE FILE H1
PRINT
 SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE
 SPRHOLD_USER
 XTODAY
 SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE
 TO_DATE
 SPRHOLD_TO_DATE
 FLAG1
 SPRHOLD_RELEASE_IND
 SPRHOLD_REASON
 SPRHOLD_AMOUNT_OWED
 SPRHOLD_ORIG_CODE
BY  SPRIDEN_PIDM
WHERE SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE EQ 'T0' OR 'M2';
WHERE FLAG1 EQ 'Y' ;
ON TABLE HOLD AS H2
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT

TABLE FILE H2
PRINT
 SPRHOLD_USER
 SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE
 XTODAY
 TO_DATE
 SPRHOLD_TO_DATE
 FLAG1
 SPRHOLD_RELEASE_IND
 SPRHOLD_REASON
 SPRHOLD_AMOUNT_OWED
 SPRHOLD_ORIG_CODE
 SPRIDEN_PIDM
BY  SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
ON TABLE HOLD AS H3
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT
-******************* HOLD DEF *************************
JOIN LEFT_OUTER SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE IN H3 TO ALL STVHLDD_CODE IN STVHLDD AS J2
-RUN
-*******************************************************
DEFINE FILE H3
T0_HOLD/A30 = IF (SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE EQ 'T0') THEN STVHLDD_DESC ELSE ' ';
M2_HOLD/A30 = IF (SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE EQ 'M2') THEN STVHLDD_DESC ELSE ' ';
END

TABLE FILE H3
PRINT
 SPRHOLD_USER
 SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE
 SPRHOLD_TO_DATE
 FLAG1
 SPRHOLD_RELEASE_IND
 SPRHOLD_REASON
 SPRHOLD_AMOUNT_OWED
 SPRHOLD_ORIG_CODE
 SPRIDEN_PIDM
 STVHLDD_REG_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_TRANS_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_GRAD_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_GRADE_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_DESC
 STVHLDD_AR_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_ENV_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_APPLICATION_HOLD_IND STVHLDD_COMPLIANCE_HOLD_IND
 T0_HOLD
 M2_HOLD
BY  SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE
ON TABLE HOLD AS H4
-*ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K
END
-RUN
-*-EXIT

JOIN CLEAR *
-******************* HOLD INFO *************************
JOIN LEFT_OUTER SPRIDEN_PIDM IN H1 TO ALL SPRIDEN_PIDM IN H4 AS J3
-RUN
-*******************************************************
TABLE FILE H1
PRINT
     SPRIDEN_ID AS 'FIDN'
  SHBGAPP_LAST_NAME AS 'LAST NAME'
  SHBGAPP_FIRST_NAME AS 'FIRST NAME'
  SHBGAPP_MI AS 'MIDDLE INT'
     DIPLOMA_NAME AS 'DIPLOMA NAME'
&GENCMT.EVAL  SPBPERS_SEX AS 'GENDER'
     COLL_DESC AS 'COLLEGE'
     SORLCUR_CAMP_CODE AS 'CAMP CODE'
     SHRDGMR_DEGS_CODE AS 'DEGREE STATUS'
     SHRDGMR_GRST_CODE AS 'GRADUATION STATUS'
     STVDEGC_DESC AS 'DEGREE'
     GRAD_DATE AS 'GRADUATION DATE'
     HONR_DESC1 AS 'HONOR DESC1'
     HONR_DESC2 AS 'HONOR DESC2'
     HONR_DESC3 AS 'HONOR DESC3'
     DIPLOMA_HOLD AS 'DIPLOMA HOLD'
  T0_HOLD AS 'T0 HOLD'
  M2_HOLD AS 'M2 HOLD'
     COLL_CODE AS 'COLLEGE CODE'
     STVDEGC_CODE AS 'DEGREE CODE'

     SHRLGPA_GPA AS 'OVERALL GPA'
     SHBGAPP_STREET1 AS 'STREET1'
     SHBGAPP_STREET2 AS 'STREET2'
     SHBGAPP_STREET3 AS 'STREET3'
     SHBGAPP_CITY AS 'CITY'
     SHBGAPP_STAT_CODE AS 'STATE'
     SHBGAPP_ZIP AS 'ZIP'
     SHBGAPP_NATN_CODE AS 'NATION'
     PIDMID
-*    DIPLOMA_HOLD
  WHERE COLL_CODE NE 'XX';
&HONRWH.EVAL WHERE HONR_DESC1 NE '';
-*BY SPRIDEN_PIDM NOPRINT
BY COLL_DESC NOPRINT
BY GRAD_DATE NOPRINT
BY STVDEGC_DESC NOPRINT
BY SHBGAPP_LAST_NAME NOPRINT
BY SHBGAPP_FIRST_NAME NOPRINT
BY SHBGAPP_MI NOPRINT
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' GOTO EXLFMT;
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT &FMT
-GOTO OTHERFMTS
ON TABLE SET PAGE-NUM OFF
ON TABLE NOTOTAL
-EXLFMT
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K OPEN
-OTHERFMTS
ON TABLE SET HTMLCSS ON
ON TABLE SET STYLE *
     UNITS=IN,

  TITLETEXT='Diploma Jacket',

TYPE=REPORT,

$
TYPE=ACROSSVALUE,

END
-RUN

-IF &LINES EQ 0 THEN GOTO NORECS;
-IF &FMT EQ 'EXL2K' THEN GOTO GETXLS;
-GOTO ENDRPT

-GETXLS
TABLE FILE SQLOUT
PRINT SPRIDEN_ID NOPRINT
WHERE READLIMIT EQ 1
HEADING
"Fordham University"
"Diploma Jacket"
"Run Date:<+0>&DATEtMDYY"
"Expected Graduation Term:<+0>&_TEXT6"
"Level:<+0>&_TEXT3"
"College:<+0>&_TEXT4"

"Degree Status :<+0>&_TEXT2"
ON TABLE PCHOLD FORMAT EXL2K CLOSE

TYPE=REPORT, FONT=ARIAL, TITLETEXT='Parameters', $
TYPE=HEADING, HEADALIGN=BODY, STYLE=BOLD, $
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=1, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, LINE=2, JUSTIFY=CENTER, COLSPAN=2,$
TYPE=HEADING, ITEM=2, COLOR=RED, STYLE=BOLD,$

ENDSTYLE
END
